src: "Keling, Italiyaning rejalarini anglashdan boshlaymiz. Xususan, Italiya Germaniya va Yaponiyaning ""kichik ukasi"" edi. Ular shundoqqina urush boshlanishidan oldin to'rtta yangi kema qurishgan bo'lsa-da, kuchsizroq armiya va kuchsizroq dengiz flotiga ega edi. Italiyaning bosh maqsadlari Afrika davlatlari edi. Mazkur mamlakatlarni qoʻlga kiritish uchun ularga harbiy platsdarm kerak bo'lardi, shunda qo'shinlar o'rta yer dengizi bo'ylab suzib o'tib, Afrikani bosib olishlari mumkin edi. Buning uchun ular Misrdagi Britaniya bazalari hamda kemalaridan qutilishlari lozim edi. Bu harakatlardan tashqari, Italiya jangovar kemalari boshqa hech narsa qilmasligi lozim edi. Endi Yaponiya uchun. Yaponiya xuddi Britaniya kabi orol-davlat edi."
mt: "Let's begin by understanding Italy's intentions. In particular, Italy was the "little brother" of Germany and Japan. Despite building four new ships before the war, it had a weaker army and navy. Italy's main goal was the African states. To capture these states, they needed a base in the Mediterranean, from which troops could sail across the sea and conquer Africa. To do this, they needed to capture British bases in Egypt and ships. In addition to these actions, Italian warships were not to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was just like Britain, an island-state."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Keling, Italiyaning rejalarini anglashdan boshlaymiz. Xususan, Italiya Germaniya va Yaponiyaning ""kichik ukasi"" edi. Ular shundoqqina urush boshlanishidan oldin to'rtta yangi kema qurishgan bo'lsa-da, kuchsizroq armiya va kuchsizroq dengiz flotiga ega edi. Italiyaning bosh maqsadlari Afrika davlatlari edi. Mazkur mamlakatlarni qoʻlga kiritish uchun ularga harbiy platsdarm kerak bo'lardi, shunda qo'shinlar o'rta yer dengizi bo'ylab suzib o'tib, Afrikani bosib olishlari mumkin edi. Buning uchun ular Misrdagi Britaniya bazalari hamda kemalaridan qutilishlari lozim edi. Bu harakatlardan tashqari, Italiya jangovar kemalari boshqa hech narsa qilmasligi lozim edi. Endi Yaponiya uchun. Yaponiya xuddi Britaniya kabi orol-davlat edi."
mt: "Let's begin by understanding Italy's intentions. In particular, Italy was the "little brother" of Germany and Japan. Despite building four new ships before the war, it had a weaker army and navy. Italy's main goal was the African states. To capture these states, they needed a base in the Mediterranean, from which troops could sail across the sea and conquer Africa. To do this, they needed to capture British bases in Egypt and ships. In addition to these actions, Italian warships were not to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was just like Britain, an island-state."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "D-kuni operatsiyasidagi qo'shinlarning tushirilishi va keyingi janglar Fransiya shimolini ozod etgan bo'lsa-da, janub hali ham ozod emas edi. U ""Vichi"" fransuzlar tomonidan boshqarilgan. Bular 1940-yili nemislar bilan tinchlik o'rnatgan va bosqinchilarga qarshi kurashish o'rniga, ular bilan birga ishlagan fransuzlar edi. 1940-yilning 15-avgustida Ittifoqchilar Janubiy Fransiyaga bostirib kirdi, bu bosqin ""Ajdar operatsiyasi"" deb atalgan. Atigi ikki hafta ichida amerikaliklar va Ozod fransuzlar kuchlari janubiy Fransiyani ozod qildi hamda Germaniya tomonga yo'naldi."
mt: "The Allied forces' withdrawal and subsequent battles had freed the French coast, but the south was still not free. It was controlled by the "Vichy" French, who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and fought against the Germans alongside the French. On August 15, 1944, the Allies invaded Southern France, which was called the "Dragoon Operation". In just two weeks, the Americans and Free French forces freed Southern France and moved towards Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Suvosti kemalari suv ostida yurish va u yerda uzoq muddat qolishga mo'ljallangan kemalardir. Birinchi jahon urushi va Ikkinchi jahon urushida suvosti kemalaridan foydalanilgan. o'sha vaqtlarda ular juda sekin bo'lib, o't ochish masofasi juda cheklangan edi. Urushning boshida ular asosan dengiz yuzasida safar qilar edi, lekin radarlar takomillashib, aniqroq bo'la boshlagani sayin, suvosti kemalari ko'zga tashlanmaslik uchun suv ostiga shong'ishga majbur bo'lgan. Nemis suvosti kemalari U-Boats deb atalgan. Nemislar suvosti kemalarida suzish va ularni boshqarishga juda usta bo'lishgan. Suvosti kemalari bilan muvaffaqiyat qozonganliklari sababli urushdan so'ng nemislar ularning ko'pchiligiga ega deb ishonilmaydi.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to operate underwater and to stay there for long periods of time. Submarines were used in the First World War and the Second World War. At that time they were very slow and had a very limited range. At first they operated on the surface, but as radars became more accurate, submarines were forced to submerge to avoid detection. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very skilled at operating and controlling submarines. Their success with submarines led to the suspicion that they had many more than they actually did.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 1939-yil 17-sentabrga kelib, Polsha mudofaasi allaqachon parchalangan va yagona umid orqaga chekinish hamda Ruminiya platsdarmi bo'ylab qayta shakllanish edi. Lekin Sovet Ittifoqi qizil armiyasining 800 000 dan ortiq askarlari Riga tinchlik shartnomasi, Tajovuz qilmaslik to'g'risidagi Sovet-Polsha pakti hamda boshqa ikki tomonlama va ko'p tomonlama shartnomalarni buzgan holda Polshaning sharqiy hududlarini bosib olgandan so'ng Belorussiya va Ukrainaga kirishi hamda frontlar yaratganida mazkur rejalar deyarli bir kechaga eskirgandi.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense had already collapsed and the only hope was a retreat and reorganization across the Romanian front. But the Soviet Union's Red Army of 800,000 men had invaded Poland's eastern territories in violation of the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact, the Soviet–Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other bilateral and multilateral agreements, and created frontiers with Belarus and Ukraine, rendering these plans almost obsolete.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Shimoliy Amerikada italiyaliklarning ishlari deyarli boshidanoq o'ngidan kelmadi. 1940-yilning 10-iyunida Italiya urush e'lon qilgandan bir hafta o'tib, Britaniyaning 11-gussarlar polki Liviyadagi Kapuzzo qal'asini qo'lga oldi. Bardiya sharqidagi pistirmada britaniyaliklar italyanlarning o'ninchi armiyasi bosh muhandisi Genaral Lastuchchini qo'lga oldi. 28-iyun kuni Liviya general-gubernatori va Mussolinining mo'ljaldagi vorisi — marshal Italo Balbo Tobrukka qo'nish paytida o'z tarafdorlarining yanglish o't ochishi natijasida halok bo'ldi.
mt: 1940-06-10: The Italians' work in North America was off to a bad start. A week after Italy declared war, the British 11th Hussars captured the Italian garrison at Capuzzo in Libya. In the Bardia area, the British captured the Italian army's chief engineer, General Lastuchchi. On 28 June, the Italian governor-general and Mussolini's would-be successor, Marshal Italo Balbo, was killed by friendly fire as he landed at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibet buddizmi Budda ta'limotlariga asoslanadi, lekin muhabbatning mahayana yo'li bilan va hind yogasining ko'plab uslublari bilan kengaytirilgan. Aslini olganda, Tibet buddizmi juda jo'n. U Kundalini yoga, meditatsiya va barcha narsani qamrovchi muhabbat yo'lidan iborat. Kundalini Yoga bilan Kundalini quvvati (ma'rifat quvvati) yoga pozalari, nafas mashqlari, mantralar hamda vizualizatsiyalar yordamida uyg'otiladi. Tibet meditatsiyasining markazi ilohiy yoga hisoblanadi. Turli ilohlarni vizualizatsiya qilish orqali energiya kanallari tozalanadi, chakralar faollashtiriladi va ma'lifatli ong yaratiladi.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but expanded with the Mahayana path of love and the many forms of Hindu yoga.  In fact, Tibetan Buddhism is very broad. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and all-encompassing path of love.  Kundalini Yoga awakens Kundalini power (power of enlightenment) through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.  The center of Tibetan meditation is divine yoga.  Energy channels are cleaned by visualizing various deities, chakras are activated and enlightened mind is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Dastur mahalliy vaqt bilan 8:30 (TK) da (15:00 UTC) boshlandi. Mamlakat bo'ylab mashhur xonandalar Shri Shyamga bag'ishlab qo'shiqlar, bhajanlar namoyish etishdi. Kechani xonanda Sanju Sharma boshlab berdi, ortidan Jay Shankar Choudxari chiqdi. Chhappan bhog bhajan'ni ham taqdim etdi. Xonanda Raju Xandelval unga jo'r bo'layotgandi. So'ng Lakka Singx bhajanlarni kuylashda yetakchilik o'z qo'liga oldi. Baba Shyamga 108 likop Chappan Bog (hinduizmda 56 turdagi yeguliklar, masalan, tangriga taklif etiluvchi shirinliklar, mevalar, yong'oqlar, ovqatlar va h.k.) berildi. Lakkxa Singx chappan bhog bhajanni ham taqdim etdi. Qo'shiqchi Raju Xandelval unga jo'r bo'ldi.
mt: 8:30 am local time (15:00 UTC) the ceremony began. Across the country famous singers dedicated songs, bhajans to Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jay Shankar Choudhary. He performed the 'Chhappan bhog bhajan'. Singer Raju Handelval was in the lead. Then Laxmi Shankar bhajans were sung. Baba Shyam was given 108 types of Chappan Bog (56 types of Hindu offerings, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, food and so on) to Laxmi Shankar. Laxmi Shankar also performed the Chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Handelval was in the lead.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Bayram tantanalari dunyoga mashhur Cirque du Soleil guruhining maxsus shoui bilan boshlandi. Undan so'ng Istanbul Davlat Simfoniya Orkestri, Yanissar guruhi hamda qo'shiqchilar Fotih Erkoch va Muslum Gurseslar davom ettirishdi. Keyin Wherling Dervishes sahnaga chiqdi. Turk primadonnasi Sezen Aksu italyan tenori Alessandro Safina va yunon xonandasi Haris Aleksiu bilan birga ijro etdi. Yakunlash uchun Turkiyaning ""Fire of Anatolia"" raqs guruhi ""Troya"" shousini namoyish qildi."
mt: "The celebrations began with a special show by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil group. Then the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, Yanissar group and singers Fethi Erkoc and Muslum Gurses followed. Then the Whirling Dervishes took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The show ended with the Turkish dance group "Fire of Anatolia" performing "Troya"."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Yo'lovchilarga suv berildi, chunki ular 90 (F) daraja issiqda kutayotgan edi. O't o'chirish xizmati kapitani Skot Kouns: ""Santa Klarada kun issiq bo'ldi, harorat 90 daraja atrofida edi"", dedi. ""Amerika tepaliklari atrraksionida qolib ketganda o'tkazilgan har qanday vaqt juda noqulay va birinchi odamning tushishi uchun kamida bir soat vaqt ketgan""."
mt: "Passengers were given water because they were waiting in 90 (F) degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns: ""It was hot in Santa Clara today, the temperature was about 90 degrees"", he said. ""Any time spent at the American mountains attraction is very unpleasant and the first person to fall is at least an hour late""."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: "Yo'lovchilarga suv berildi, chunki ular 90 (F) daraja issiqda kutayotgan edi. O't o'chirish xizmati kapitani Skot Kouns: ""Santa Klarada kun issiq bo'ldi, harorat 90 daraja atrofida edi"", dedi. ""Amerika tepaliklari atrraksionida qolib ketganda o'tkazilgan har qanday vaqt juda noqulay va birinchi odamning tushishi uchun kamida bir soat vaqt ketgan""."
mt: "Passengers were given water because they were waiting in 90 (F) degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns: ""It was hot in Santa Clara today, the temperature was about 90 degrees"", he said. ""Any time spent at the American mountains attraction is very unpleasant and the first person to fall is at least an hour late""."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: So'ngi byulletenga ko'ra, dengiz sathi ko'rsatkichlari sunami vujudga kelganiga ishora qildi. Pago Pago va Niue yaqinida shubhasiz sunami harakati qayd etilgan. Tongada katta zarar yoki jarohatlar qayd qilinmagan, lekin elektr energiyasi vaqtincha uzilgan va bu Tonga hukumatiga PTWC tomonidan berilgan sunami ogohlantirishini qabul qilishga xalal bergani xabar qilinmoqda. Gavayidagi sohil bo'yi yoxud uning yaqinida joylashgan o'n to'rt maktabning barchasi ogohlantirishlar bekor qilinganligiga qaramasdan, chorshanba kuni yopildi.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level gauges indicated a tsunami was underway. A definite tsunami was observed near Pago Pago and Niue. There were no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but power was temporarily cut and the Tongan government was said to be receiving a tsunami warning from PTWC. Despite the schools being closed, fourteen coastal schools near the coast were closed on Monday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: "A1GP Yangi Zelandiya jamoasining ikkinchi haydovchisi Joni Rid Yangi Zelandiyadagi qurilganiga 48 yil bo'lgan Oklend ko'rfazi ko'prigidan qonuniy asosda eng katta tezlikda harakatlanish orqali bugun tarixga kirdi. Janob Rid Yangi Zelandiyaning A1GP Black Beauty avtomobilini ko'prik ustidan yetti marta 160 km/soat tezlikda haydab o'tishni uddaladi. ""Black Beauty"" avtomobilining past ekanligi tufayli Yangi Zelandiya politsiyasi janob Ridning qanchalik tez yurganligini aniqlash uchun o'zining tezlikni aniqlash radaridan foydalanishda muammoga duch keldi va politsiya faqat bir marta janob Rid tezlikni 160 km/soatga pasaytirganida uni qayd etishga muvaffaq bo'ldi."
mt: "The second driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, John Rid, today made history by driving the A1GP Black Beauty car across the Auckland Harbour Bridge, the longest bridge in New Zealand, at a legal speed of 160 km/h. Mr Rid drove the New Zealand A1GP Black Beauty car across the bridge seven times. The low profile of the Black Beauty car meant that the New Zealand police had difficulty in measuring how fast Mr Rid was driving, and the police were only able to record Mr Rid slowing down to 160 km/h once."
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Dushanba kuni tungi soat 10:08 da g'arbiy Montanada o'rtacha silkinishdagi zilzila sodir bo'ldi. Qo'shma Shtatlar Geologiya xizmati (USGS) hamda uning Zilzilalar bo'yicha Milliy Axborot markazi tomonidan yetkazilgan talafot to'g'risida hech qanday tezkor hisobot qabul qilinmagan. Zilzila markazi Dillon shahrining taxminan 20 km (15 mil) shimoli-shimoli-sharqida va Byuttdan taxminan 65 km (40 mil) janubda edi.
mt: 10:08 pm local time on Monday, a 4.0 magnitude earthquake occurred in western Montana. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center have not yet received any reports of damage. The epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iroqning Abu Graib qamoqxonasiga qo'zg'olon vaqtida o't qo'yildi. Bu qamoqxona AQSH qurolli kuchlari nazoratiga o'tgac, u yerda mahbuslarning qiynoqlarga solingani aniqlanganidan keyin tanilgan.
mt: A riot broke out at the Abu Ghraib prison, where the prison was taken over by US forces after reports of abuse of prisoners held there.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Guruh Mauidagi Urush yodgorligi stadionida 9000 kishi qatnashishi belgilangan shouni bekor qildi va muxlislaridan uzr so'radi. Guruhning menejment kompaniyasi, HK Management Inc., 20-sentabrda bekor qilganida, hech qanday dastlabki sabablarni keltirmadi, biroq bir kun o'tib logistik sabablarni aybladi.
mt: 9,000 people were expected to attend the show at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, but the group canceled the show and apologized to fans. The group's management company, HK Management Inc., initially canceled the show on September 20 without citing any initial reasons, but a day later blamed logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Xabar qilinishicha, Bishkek ko'chlarida huquqni muhofaza qiluvchi organlar xodimlari yo'qligi sababli keng ko'lamli talon-tarojlar tun bo'yi davom etgan. Bishkek bir kuzatuvchi tomonidan ""anarxiya"" holatiga cho'kib ketayotgandek tasvirlangan edi, chunki ko'chalarda to'da-to'da odamlar izg'ib yurar va iste'mol tovarlari do'konlarini talon-taroj qilardi. Bishkekda yashovchilardan bir nechtasi qonunsizliklarda janubdagi namoyishchilarni aybladi."
mt: "According to reports, law enforcement officers were absent from the streets of Bishkek, allowing widespread looting to continue through the night. Bishkek was described as being in a state of "anarchy" by an observer, as people roamed the streets in groups and looted stores selling consumer goods. A resident of Bishkek blamed the rioters in the south for the lawlessness."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: "Oldin Ring kompaniyasining bosh direktori Jeymi Siminoff kompaniya o'z garajidagi ustaxonadan eshik qo'ng'irog'i eshitilmaganidan keyin boshlanganini qayd etgandi. U WiFi eshik qo'ng'irog'ini yasadi, dedi u. Siminoffning aytishicha, shou komissiyasi startapni moliyalashtirishni rad etganidan keyin 2013-yili ""Shark Tank"" epizodidagi ko'rinishidan so'ng savdo hajmi oshib ketgan. 2017-yilning oxirida Siminoff QVC xaridlar telekanalida ko'rinish berdi. Ring xavfsizlik bo'yicha raqobatchi kompaniyasi – ADT korporatsiyasi bilan ham nizoni hal qildi."
mt: "Previously Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company started after a doorbell went unanswered at its garage workshop. He made a WiFi doorbell, he said. Siminoff said the company's sales grew after the appearance on the 2013 episode of "Shark Tank." In the end of 2017 Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring competed with security company ADT."
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS shousi yigirma to'rttadan ortiq Emmy mukofotiga ega va uning faoliyati faqat ""Sezam ko'chasi"" hamda ""Janob Rojerning mahallasi""dan qisqaroq. Serialning ham bir qismida muayyan kitobdagi mavzuga e'tibor qaratiladi, so'ng o'sha mavzu ham ko'plab hikoyalarni tadqiq qiladi. Har bir shouda bolalar o'z kutubxonalariga borganida qidirishlari kerak bo'lgan kitoblar yuzasidan tavsiyalar ham beriladi. WNED Buffalo'dan (Reading Rainbow'ning uy bekati) bo'lgan Jon Grant ""Reading Rainbow bolalarga nima uchun o'qish kerakligini,… o'qishni sevishni o'rgatdi — [shou] bolalarni biror kitobni olib, o'qishga rag'batlantirdi"", dedi. Ayrimlar, jumladan, Jon Grant ham, moliyaviy inqiroz va ta'limiy televizion dasturlar falsafasidagi o'zgarish serialning yakunlanishiga hissa qo'shdi, deb hisoblaydi."
mt: "PBS show has won twenty-four Emmys and its run was shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focuses on a particular book, and then the book is the subject of many stories. Each show also offers book recommendations for children's libraries. John Grant, from the home base of Reading Rainbow in Buffalo, New York (WNED), said, ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why they should read — it taught them to love reading — [the show] encouraged kids to read a book."" Some, including John Grant, believe that financial difficulties and changes in the educational television philosophy contributed to the show's cancellation.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdam shahri va Anne Frank muzeyi rasmiylari daraxt zamburug'lar bilan kasallangani va qulash xavfi borligini ta'kidlab, aholi salomatligiga tahdid tug'dirishini aytmoqda. Uni seshanba kuni kesish rejalashtirilgandi, biroq favqulodda sud qaroridan keyin saqlab qolindi.
mt: Authorities at Amsterdam city and the Anne Frank museum have warned that the tree is infected with a fungus and is in danger of collapsing, and pose a threat to public health. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but was saved by an emergency court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Hayvonlarni ozod qilish va hayvonlarga nisbatan shafqatsizlikning oldini olish Qirollik hamjamiyati (RSPCA) Avstraliyadagi hamma kushxonalarda CCTV kameralarini majburiy tartibda o'rnatishni talab qilishga chaqirmoqda. RSPCA Yangi Janubiy Uels bosh inspektori Devid O'Shannessi ABC kanaliga kushxonalarni kuzatish hamda tekshirish Avstraliyada odatiy holat bo'lishi lozimligini ta'kidladi. ""CCTV, shubhasiz, hayvonlar bilan ishlaydigan insonlarga ularning farovonligi eng ustuvor vazifa ekanligi haqida kuchli signal beradi""."
mt: "The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) is calling for CCTV cameras to be mandatory in all Australian poultry farms. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that it is normal practice for farms to be monitored and inspected in Australia. ""CCTV, without a doubt, sends a strong signal to people working with animals that their welfare is the top priority,"" he said."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Jeff Vayse va to'qqiz qurbondan uch nafarining dafn marosimi o'tkazilgan Red Leyk mahallasida 21-mart kungi maktabdagi otishmalar yuzasidan yana bir o'quvchi hibsga olingani haqida yangilik tarqaldi. Hukumat organlari bugungi hibsqa olishni tasdiqlashdan boshqa hech qanday rasmiy maʼlumot bermadi. Biroq, tergov haqida ma'lumotlarga ega bo'lgan manbaning Minneapolis Star-Tribune gazetasiga aytishicha, bu Qizil ko'l qabilasining boshlig'I Floyd Jurdenning 16 yashar o'g'li Luis Jurden bo'lgan. Ayni damda qanday ayblovlar qo'yilishi yoki hukumat organlarini bolaga nima yetaklagani noma'lum, lekin federal sudda voyaga yetmaganlar bo'yicha sud jarayoni boshlandi.
mt: 21 March 2005, news of another student arrested in Red Lake, Minnesota, following the school shooting, was reported. The government did not confirm the arrest, but a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the student was Luis Jurden, 16, son of the Red Lake Chippewa tribe's chief Floyd Jurden. It is unknown what charges were filed or what led the government to the student, but a juvenile court proceeding was started in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

Ayni damda qanday ayblovlar qo'yilishi yoki hukumat organlarini bolaga nima yetaklagani noma'lum, lekin federal sudda voyaga yetmaganlar bo'yicha sud jarayoni boshlandi.
mt: 21 March 2005, news of another student arrested in Red Lake, Minnesota, following the school shooting, was reported. The government did not confirm the arrest, but a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the student was Luis Jurden, 16, son of the Red Lake Chippewa tribe's chief Floyd Jurden. It is unknown what charges were filed or what led the government to the student, but a juvenile court proceeding was started in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Norozilik namoyishi tashkilotchilarining aytishicha, Germaniyaning Berlin, Kyoln, Gamburg va Gannover kabi shaharlaridan taxminan 100 000 kishi kelgan. Berlinda politsiya namoyishchilarni 6500 nafar deb taxmin qildi. Protestlar Parijda, Bolgariyaning Sofiya, Litvaning Vilnyus, Maltaning Valetta, Estoniyaning Tallin hamda Shotlandiyaning Edinburg va Glazgo shaharlarida ham bo'lib o'tdi. Londonda ayrim mualliflik huquqi egalarining asosiy ofislari oldida chamasi 200 nafar odam e'tirozlar bilan namoyishga to'plandi. o'tgan oy Polsha ACTAni imzolaganda mamlakatda yirik norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bu Polsha hukumatining hozircha mazkur kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmaslik haqida qaror qabul qilishiga sabab bo'ldi. Latviya ham, Slovakiya ham ACTAga qo'shilish jarayonlarini kechiktirdi.
mt: 100,000 people from Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover were reported to have attended the protests. Berlin police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia, Vilnius, Valletta, Tallinn, Edinburgh and Glasgow. In London, a few hundred authors' rights holders gathered in front of their main offices. Last month, protests took place in Poland after the country signed ACTA, which led to the Polish government's decision not to ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia also delayed their ACTA accession processes.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Nosoz iPod qurilmalarining qizib ketishidan iborat 60 ga yaqin holatlar haqida xabar qilingan, ular jami bo'lib 6 ta yong'in va to'rt kishining yengil kuyishlariga sabab bo'lgan. Yaponiya iqtisodiyot, savdo va sanoat vazirligi (METI) mazkur qurilmalar bilan bog'liq 27 ta holatdan xabar topganini ma'lum qildi. O'tgan hafta METI Apple kompaniyasi ""jiddiy emas"" deb atagan haddan ortiq qizib ketish bilan bog'liq 34 ta qo'shimcha holat to'g'risida xabar berganini e'lon qildi. Vazir Apple kompaniyasining hisobotni kechiktirishiga ""haqiqatda achinarli"" deb javob berdi."
mt: 60 or more incidents of overheating iPods have been reported, resulting in six fires and four minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) has been notified of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had been notified of 34 additional incidents involving overheating, which Apple had described as "not significant." METI called the delay in reporting "unfortunate."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Apple bosh ijrochi direktori Stiv Jobs qurilmani sahnada yurib, jinsi shimining cho'ntagidan iPhone'ni chiqargan holda namoyish qildi. 2 soatlik nutqi paytida u ""Bugun Apple telefonni qayta ixtiro qilmoqchi, biz bugun tarix yaratamiz"", – deya ta'kidladi."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs demonstrated the device by pulling it out of his pocket from under his genitalia. During his two-hour presentation, he declared, ""Today Apple reinvents the phone, we are creating history."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Kecha kechqurun Buenos-Ayresdan 50 km (31 mil) uzoqlikdagi La Platada amaldagi senator va Argentinaning birinchi xonimi Kristina Fernandes de Kirshner prezidentlikka o'z nomzodini qo'yishini ma'lum qildi. Kirchner xonim Argentina teatrida prezidentlikka nomzodini qo'yishni niyat qilganini e'lon qildi, xuddi shu joyda u 2005-yili Buenos-Ayres provinsiyasi delegatsiyasi a'zosi sifatida Senat uchun o'z kampaniyasini boshlagandi.
mt: 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires in La Plata, the current senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president in the same theater where she began her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a delegate of the Buenos Aires province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA, shuningdek, videoning internetda uzatilishiga qaramay, media Big Brother veb-saytida saqlanib qolmaganligi sababli Big Brother onlayn kontent senzurasi to'g'risidagi qonunlarni buzmaganini aniqladi. Teleradioeshittirish xizmatlari to'g'risidagi qonun internet kontentini tartibga solishni ko'zda tutadi, biroq internet kontenti sifatida tan olinishi uchun u jismonan jihatdan serverda joylashishi kerak.
mt: ACMA also found that the video was not saved on the Big Brother website, despite being broadcast online, as the Big Brother online content did not breach the censorship laws of the Broadcasting Services Act. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates content broadcast on television, but internet content is not regulated unless it is physically located on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Avstraliyalik g'aznachi va Bosh vazir Jon Hovarddan keyin Lebiral partiya yetakchisiga aylanish ehtimoli yuqori bo'lgan Piter Kastello Avstraliyadagi atom energetikasi sanoatini qo'llab-quvvatladi. Janob Kostelo so'zlariga ko'ra, atom energiyasini ishlab chiqarish iqtisodiy jihatdan yashovchan bo'lganidan keyin Avstraliya undan foydalanishda davom etishi kerak. ""Agar u tijoriylashtirilsa, biz uni olishimiz shart. Ya'ni, umuman olganda atom energiyasiga qarshilik yo'q"", — dedi janob Kostello."
mt: "Australian treasurer and former Prime Minister John Howard backed Liberal Party leader Peter Costello's bid to take over the Australian atomic energy industry. Mr. Costello said that Australia should continue to use atomic energy because it is economically viable. ""If it's commercialized, we'll get it. That is, in general, there is no opposition to atomic energy"", — said Mr. Costello."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Bir kunda bor-yo'g'i o'n sakkizta medal bo'lgani sababli bir qator mamlakatlar medal shohsupasiga ko'tarila olmadi. Gollandiya ham ularning orasida, kecha Anna Yoxumsen Super-G ayollar toifasi bo'yicha to'qqizinchi o'rinni egalladi, Finlandiya esa shu musobaqada Katya Saarinen bilan o'ninchi o'rinda yakunladi. Avstraliyalik Mitchel Gourli erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n birinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Chexiyalik raqibi Oldrix Yelinek erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n oltinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Meksikalik Arli Velaskes erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvida o'n beshinchi pog'onadan joy oldi. Erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini Yangi Zelandiyalik Adam Hall to'qqizinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Polshalik ko'zi ojiz chang'ichi Masiey Krezel hamda yetaklovchi Anna Ogarzinska Super-G musobaqasini o'n uchinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Janubiy Koreyalik Jong Seork Park erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G musobaqasida yigirma to'rtinchi o'rindan joy oldi.
mt: 18 medals were awarded in one day, so a number of countries were unable to move up the medal table. The Netherlands was one of them, as Anna Yoxumsen finished ninth in the women's Super-G, and Finland finished tenth with Katya Saarinen. Australian Mitchel Gourli finished eleventh in the men's Super-G. Czech Oldrix Yelinek finished eighteenth in the men's Super-G. Meksikalik Arli Velaskes finished fifteenth in the men's Super-G. New Zealander Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's Super-G. Polish visually impaired skier Masiey Krezel and leading Anna Ogarzinska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Ishni sudda ko'rib chiqish Birmingem Qirollik sudida bo'lib o'tdi va 3-avgustda qaror chiqarildi. Hodisa joyida hibsga olingan teleboshlovchi hujumni inkor etdi va o'ttiztacha kishi tomonidan unga uloqtirilayotgan shishalardan o'zini himoya qilish uchun tayoqdan foydalanganini aytdi. Shu bilan birga Bleyk adolatni qaror toptirishni xalaqit berishda ham aybdor deb topildi. Sudya Bleykka uning qamoqqa tushishi ""deyarli aniq"" ekanligini aytdi."
mt: "The case was heard at Birmingham Crown Court and a verdict was reached on August 3. The presenter denied the incident and said he was defending himself from forty people throwing bottles at him with a stick. The judge also found Blake guilty of failing to stop the verdict. The judge said Blake's imprisonment was ""almost certain""."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Balida ko'riladigan boshqa masalalar dunyoning qolgan o'rmonlarini saqlab qolish, rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarning kamroq ifloslanishlarga sabab bo'luvchi yo'llar bilan o'sishiga yordam beruvchi texnologiyalar bilan bo'lishishni o'z ichiga oladi. BMT global isishdan zarar ko'rgan mamlakatlarga ta'sirlarni yengishda yordam berish uchun jamg'arma yaratishni yakunlashga ham umid qilmoqda. Pullar toshqinga chidamli uylar, yaxshiroq suv resurslarini boshqarish tizimi va ekinlarni diversifikatsiya qilishga yo'naltirilishi mumkin.
mt: Other issues on the table include preserving the world's other forests, helping developing countries grow with less pollution, and helping the UN finish raising money to help countries recover from global warming. The funds could go toward building more resilient homes, better water management systems, and diversifying crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigeriya avvalroq sammitdan bir hafta avval AfCFTA tashkilotiga qo'shilishni rejalashtirganligini e'lon qilgan. AU savdo-sotiq hamda sanoat komissari Albert Muchanga Benin ham qo'shilmoqchi ekanini ma'lum qildi. Komissar: ""Biz hozircha kelib chiqish va tarif imtiyozlari qoidalari bo'yicha kelishuvga erishmadik, lekin holat 2020-yil 1-iyuldan savdo-sotiqni boshlashimiz uchun tayyorligimizni ko'rsatmoqda"", — dedi."
mt: "Nigeria had previously announced its intention to join the AfCFTA a week before the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin was also interested in joining. The commissioner said: "We are not yet ready to sign a deal on tariffs and market access, but we are ready to start trading by July 1, 2020.""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: "Nigeriya avvalroq sammitdan bir hafta avval AfCFTA tashkilotiga qo'shilishni rejalashtirganligini e'lon qilgan. AU savdo-sotiq hamda sanoat komissari Albert Muchanga Benin ham qo'shilmoqchi ekanini ma'lum qildi. Komissar: ""Biz hozircha kelib chiqish va tarif imtiyozlari qoidalari bo'yicha kelishuvga erishmadik, lekin holat 2020-yil 1-iyuldan savdo-sotiqni boshlashimiz uchun tayyorligimizni ko'rsatmoqda"", — dedi."
mt: "Nigeria had previously announced its intention to join the AfCFTA a week before the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin was also interested in joining. The commissioner said: "We are not yet ready to sign a deal on tariffs and market access, but we are ready to start trading by July 1, 2020.""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: "U Atlantada bo'lgan paytida tanqidchilarning e'tirofiga sazovor bo'ldi va innovatsion shahar ta'limi bilan tanildi. 2009-yilda u ""Yilning milliy nazoratchisi"" unvoni bilan taqdirlandi. Mukofotlash vaqtida Atlanta maktablarida test natijalarining ancha yaxshilangani kuzatildi. Ko'p o'tmay, Atlanta Journal-Constitution test natijalari bilan bog'liq muammolarni ko'rsatuvchi hisobotni e'lon qildi. Hisobotda test natijalari aql bovar qilmas darajada tez sur'atda oshgani va iddao qilingan maktab o'zining ichki muammolarini aniqlagani, lekin xulosalar asosida harakatlanmagani ko'rsatilgandi. Shundan keyin topilgan dalillar test varaqalari qalbakilashtirilganini ko'rsatgach Xoll va yana 34 nafar ta'lim rasmiylari 2013-yili aybdor deb topildi."
mt: "He was praised by critics while in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009, he was named "National School Administrator of the Year." At the time of the award, Atlanta schools were seeing dramatic improvements in test scores. Soon after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report detailing problems with test scores. The report showed that test scores were rising at an alarming rate and that the school district had identified its own internal problems, but had not acted on the findings. After the report, evidence was found that test scores were being manipulated, and Hall and 34 other education officials were found guilty in 2013."
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Bir bomba general-gubernatorning idorasi tashqarisida portladi. Ikki soat davomida hukumat binolari yaqinida yana uchta bomba portladi. Ayrim xabarlarda vafot etganlarning rasmiy soni sakkiz nafar ekani aytilgan va rasmiy xabarlar jarohatlanganlar soni 30 nafarga yaqinligini tasdiqladi; biroq yakuniy raqamlar hali ham aniq emas.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings over the next two hours. Official reports state that eight people died and that the number of injured is around 30; however, final numbers are still unclear.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: "21 yoshli Jezus Braziliyaning ""Plameyras"" klubidan 2017-yil yanvar oyida 27 million funt sterling evaziga ""Manchester Siti""ga kelib qo'shilgan edi. O'shandan beri braziliyalik futbolchi barcha musobaqalarda klub safida 53 ta uchrashuvda maydonga tushib, 24 ta gol muallifiga aylangan."
mt: 21-year-old Jesus was signed by Manchester City from Brazilian club Plameyras for 27 million pounds in January 2017. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club in all competitions, scoring 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Bugun ertalab mahalliy vaqt bilan soat 10 lar atrofida Islom dinining muqaddas shahri – Makkada hostel qulab tushdi. Bu binoda haj ziyorati arafasida muqaddas shaharga ziyorat uchun tashrif buyurgan ko'plab ziyoratchilar istiqomat qilgan. Ushbu hostelning aksariyat mehmonlari Birlashgan Arab Amirliklarining fuqarolari edi. Qurbonlar soni 15 ta, bu sonning o'sishi kutilmoqda.
mt: 15 people were killed when a hostel collapsed in the holy city of Mecca early this morning local time at around 10 am. The hostel was home to many pilgrims visiting the holy city for the Hajj. Most of the guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Ikkalasining og'irligi 1000 funtdan ko'proq bo'lgan hamda soatiga 17 500 mil atrofida tezlikda harakatlanayotgan sputniklar Yerdan 491 mil yuqorida to'qnashdi. Olimlar to'qnashuv oqibatida sodir bo'lgan portlash ulkan bo'lganini aytadi. Ular hali ham halokat qanchalik ulkan bo'lganligi va Yerga qanday ta'sir qilishini aniqlashga harakat qilishmoqda. AQSH Mudofaa vazirligi idorasining AQSH strategik qo'mondonligi vayronalarni kuzatyapti. Chizma tahlil natijasi ommabop veb-saytga joylashtiriladi.
mt: Two objects weighing over 1000 pounds each and traveling at 17,500 miles per hour collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the resulting explosion was massive. They are still trying to determine how large the explosion was and what effect it had on the Earth. The U.S. Defense Department's U.S. Strategic Command is monitoring the debris. The analysis of the debris will be posted on a popular web site.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Betten 2,3 milliardga baholangan boyligi bilan 2008 yilda 400 ta eng boy amerikaliklar orasida 190-o'rinni egalladi. U 1950-yilda Virjiniya universitetining San'at va fan kollejini tamomlagan va mazkur muassasaning muhim donori bo'lgan.
mt: 2008, Forbes magazine ranked him 190th on their list of the 400 richest Americans, with a net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Kaliforniya gubernatori Arnold Shvartsenegger voyaga yetmaganlarga zo'ravonlikni targ'ib qiluvchi video o'yinlarni sotishni yoki ijaraga berishni taqiqlaydigan qonun loyihasiga imzo chekdi. Qonun loyihasi Kaliforniya shtatida sotiluvchi zo'ravonlik aks etgan video o'yinlarning ""18"" maxsus yorlig'i bilan belgilanishini va ular voyaga yetmaganlarga sotilganda har bir qonunbuzarlik uchun 1000 dollar jarima bilan jazolanishini talab qiladi."
mt: "California governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games to be labeled with an ""18"" special rating and imposes a $1000 fine for each violation when sold to minors."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Oilali, ikki nafar voyaga yetgan farzandi bor Duvall voqeaga aloqador bo'lgan Millerda katta taassurot qoldirmagan. Izoh so'ralganida Miller shunday dedi: ""Mayk tinglov paytida ko'p gapiradi… Men tayyorlanayotgandim, shu sababli u nima deyotganini unchalik eshitmayotgandik""."
mt: "Duvall, who has two adult children, was not aware of Miller's involvement in the incident. When asked about Miller, Duvall said, ""She talks a lot while I'm listening. I was getting ready, so I wasn't really paying attention to what she was saying."""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Bosh vazir Stiven Xarper hukumatning ""Toza havo haqidagi qonuni""ni uning ikkinchi o'qilishidan avval seshanba kuni NDP yetakchisi Jek Leyton bilan PMOdagi 25 daqiqalik uchrashuvdan keyin barcha partiyalar qo'mitasiga ko'rib chiqish uchun jo'natishga rozilik bildirdi. Bosh vazir bilan uchrashuv paytida Layton konservatorlarning atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasini ""batafsil va to'liq qayta yozish""ni, Konservatorlar partiyasining atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasiga o'zgartishlar kiritishni so'radi. Federal hukumat Tasmaniyaning Devonport shahrida joylashgan Mersey shifoxonasini moliyalashtirishni o'z zimmasiga olishga kirishganidan beri, mamlakat hukumati va ba'zi federal parlament a'zolari ushbu harakatni Noyabr oyiga belgilangan federal saylovlar oldidan hiyla deb tanqid qildi. Lekin Bosh vazir Jon Xovardning so'zlariga ko'ra, bu chora faqat qo'shimcha 45 million AUD ajratish orqali Tasmaniya hukumati tomonidan shifoxona reytigini pasaytirishdan himoya qilishga qaratilgan."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper sent the government's "Clean Air Act" back to the House of Commons for a second reading on Monday after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at his office in Parliament Hill. Harper agreed to send the bill back to the all-party committee for review after Layton asked the prime minister to "rewrite" the Conservative Party's Clean Air Act and make changes to the NDP's Clean Air Act. The federal government has taken over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government's funding cut, and some federal parliamentarians and federal government officials have criticized this move as a "gimmick" before the November federal elections. But according to the words of Prime Minister John Howard, this measure is only to protect the state government's funding cut to the hospital rating."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Ifloslangan uy hayvonlari ozuqasini iste'mol qilgandan so'ng vafot etgan uy hayvonlarining siydik namunalarida ham siyanurik kislota, ham melamin aniqlangan. Ikkala qorishma bir-biri bilan reaksiyaga kirishadi va buyrakni faoliyatdan to'xtatib qo'yishi mumkin bo'lgan kristallarni hosil qiladi, dedi oliygoh izlanuvchilari. Tadqiqotchilar mushuk peshobida melamin hamda siyanurik kislotaning qo'shilishidan vujudga kelgan kristallarni kuzatishdi. Bu kristallarning tuzilishi infraqizil spektroskopiya (FTIR) orqali solishtirilganda ta'sirga uchragan hayvonlarning siydigidan topilgan kristallarniki bilan bir xil bo'ladi.
mt: After the contaminated pet food was consumed, the urine of the dead pets contained both melamine and cyanuric acid. The two compounds react together to form crystals that can shut down the kidneys, researchers said. The researchers found crystals in the cat litter that were similar in structure to the crystals found in the urine of affected animals, as determined by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua xabariga ko'ra, hukumat tergovchilari chorshanba kuni parvozning texnik tafsilotlarini yozib oluvchi ikkita ""qora quti"" moslamani tikladilar. Hamkasb kurashchilar ham Lunaga hurmat bajo keltirishdi. Tommi Drimer: ""Luna birinchi ekstrimlar qirolichasi edi. Mening birinchi menejerim. Luna xuddi o'zi kabi noyob ikki oy tunida vafot etdi. Kichli ayol"", dedi. Dastin ""Goldust"" Runnels ""Luna ham mendek injiq edi… balki mendan-da ko'proq… men uni sevaman va uni sog'inaman… u yaxshiroq joyda deb umid qilaman"", deya fikr bildirdi."
mt: "According to Xinhua, government investigators recovered two "black boxes" recording the technical details of the flight on Monday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer: "Luna was the first queen of the extreme. My first manager. Luna died like herself, in two months. A little girl." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was even more beautiful than me... I love her and I miss her... I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

Tommy Dreamer: "Luna was the first queen of the extreme. My first manager. Luna died like herself, in two months. A little girl." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was even more beautiful than me... I love her and I miss her... I hope she's in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Avtomobil zarbasi vaqtida uy ichida uch kishi bo'lishiga qaramay, ularning hech biriga jarohat yetkazilmagan. Ammo haydovchining boshi jiddiy shikastlangandi. Favqulodda holatlar xizmati qizil Audi TT dan haydovchini chiqarib olgan vaqtda avtohalokat yuz bergan yo'l vaqtinchalik yopiq edi. U dastlab Greyt-Yarmutdagi Jeyms Paget shifoxonasiga yotqizildi. U keyinchalik Kembrijdagi Addenbruk shifoxonasiga ko'chirildi.
mt: 3 people were in the house at the time of the crash, but none were injured. However, the driver's head was seriously injured. The emergency services had to pull the driver out of the red Audi TT, which was involved in the accident, as the road was temporarily closed. He was initially taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to the Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: O'yinlar soat 10:00 (TO) da, tezda ochilib ketgan ertalabki yog'ingarchilikdan tashqari, ajoyib ob-havo bilan boshlandi, bu 7-regbi musobaqasi uchun ajoyib kun bo'ldi. Turnirdagi eng yuqori reytingga ega Janubiy Afrika jamoasi musobaqani yaxshi boshladi va reyting bo'yicha 5-o'rindagi Zambiya jamoasini 26:00 hisobida yutdi. O'yinda o'zlarining janublik opa-singil raqiblariga nisbatan zaif ko'ringan bo'lsa-da, Janubiy Afrika jamoasi turnir jarayonida barqarorlik bilan yaxshilanib bordi. Tartibli himoyasi, to'pni boshqarish ko'nikmalari va ajoyib jamoaviy harakati ularni boshqalardan ajratib turardi va bu mag'lub etish uchun shakllangan jamoa ekani aniq edi.
mt: 7s Rugby tournament started with a great day, other than the early morning rain, the weather was amazing. The highest ranked South African team started the tournament well and beat the 5th ranked Zambia team 26:00. Although they looked weak against their sister team, the South African team improved consistently throughout the tournament. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and great team work set them apart and the team was clearly built to win.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Xitoy oxirgi o'n yilda rasmiy tarzda kommunist mamlakat bo'lib qolganiga qaramasdan, bozor iqtisodiyotini rivojlantirdi. Iqtisodiyotdagi ilk islohotlar Den Syaoping rahbarligi ostida amalga oshirilgan. O'sha vaqtlardan buyon Xitoyning iqtisodiy hajmi 90 martaga o'sdi. o'tgan yili ilk bor Xitoy Germaniyadan ko'ra ko'proq avtomobil eksport qildi va mazkur sanoat bo'yicha eng yirik bozor sifatida AQSHni ortda qoldirdi. Xitoyning YaIMi yigirma yil ichida Qo'shma Shtatlarinikidan kattaroq bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: In the last ten years, China has officially remained a communist country, but has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were implemented under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 percent. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany, and surpassed the United States as the largest market for the industry. China's GDP could be larger than that of the United States in twenty years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Biz 2020-yilgacha YaIM birligiga to'g'ri keluvchi karbonat angidrid chiqindilarini 2005-yildagiga qaraganda sezilarli darajada kamaytirishga harakat qilamiz"", dedi Hu. U kamaytirishlar bo'yicha biror raqamni keltirmadi, ularning Xitoy iqtisodiyoti natijalari asosida amalga oshirilishini aytdi. Hu rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarni ""dastlab ifloslantirish, keyinroq tozalashdan iborat eski usuldan voz kechish""ga chaqirdi. U ""biroq, ulardan imkoniyatlari, javobgarligi, rivojlanish bosqichidan tashqari bo'lgan majburiyatlarni zimmasiga olish so'ralmasligi kerak"", — deya qo'shimcha qildi."
mt: "We will strive to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 2020 to levels that are comparable to those of 2005," Hu said. He did not give a specific figure, saying the results would be based on China's economy. Hu urged developing countries to "abandon the old practice of polluting first and cleaning up later." He added, however, that "they should not be asked to take on responsibilities that are beyond their capabilities, stages of development, or obligations."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Mangola tibbiy yordam xayriya tashkiloti, Chegara bilmas shifokorlar hamda Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti buning mamlakatda qayd etilgan rekord darajadagi eng yomon epidemiya ekanini ta'kidladi. Medecines Sans Frontiere vakili Richard Virman: ""Angola boshdan kechirgan pandemiyalarning eng dahshatlisiga yaqinlashmoqda va Angolada vaziyat juda yomonligicha qolmoqda"", dedi u."
mt: "Mangola tibbiy yordam xayriya tashkiloti, Chegara bilmas shifokorlar hamda Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti buning mamlakatda qayd etilgan rekord darajadagi eng yomon epidemiya ekanini ta'kidladi. Medecines Sans Frontiere vakili Richard Virman: ""Angola boshdan kechirgan pandemiyalarning eng dahshatlisiga yaqinlashmoqda va Angolada vaziyat juda yomonligicha qolmoqda"", dedi u.""
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Davlat ayblovlari direktori Kier Starmer QC bugun tongda bayonot berib, Huhnega ham, Prisga ham jinoyat ishi qo'zg'atilganini e'lon qildi. Xyun iste'fo berdi va uning Mahkamadagi o'rnini parlament a'zosi Ed Deyvi egallaydi. Parlament a'zosi Norman Lambning Deyvi bo'shatayotgan Biznes vaziri lavozimini egallashi kutilmoqda. 16-fevral kuni Xyun va Praysning Vestminster Magistratlar sudiga kelishi belgilangan.
mt: State Attorney General Kier Starmer QC announced today that a criminal case has been brought against Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and his place in the House of Commons will be taken by Ed Davey. Business Secretary Norman Lamb is expected to take over Davey's position. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear in Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Kamilla Sen-Sans tomonidan ijro etilgan fransuz operasidagi hikoya ""hayoti giyohvand moddalar va Yaponiyaga bo'lgan muhabbat asosiga qurilgan"" rassom haqidadir. Natijada, ijrochilar sahnada kannabis o'ramalarini chekishdi va teatrning o'z tomoshabinlarni qo'shilishga undadi."
mt: "The story of the French opera performed by Kamilla Sen-Sans is "based on the life of a painter who was addicted to drugs and in love with Japan." As a result, the performers smoked marijuana on stage and encouraged the theater's audience to join in."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: """11-raqamli kosmonavt"" sifatida ham mashhur bo'lgan Leonov Sovet Ittifoqining ilk kosmonavtlar jamoasi tarkibida bo'lgan. 1965-yilning 18-martida u kosmik kema tashqarisida o'n ikki daqiqadan ortiqroq vaqt mobaynida yolg'iz qolib, ilk inson uchuvchili kemadan tashqaridagi harakat (EVA) yoxud ""kosmos sayri""ni amalga oshirdi. U mehnati uchun Sovet Ittifoqining eng yuksak — ""Sovet Ittifoqi qahramoni"" unvonini oldi. O'n yildan keyin u Kosmik poyganing yakuniga yetganini bildirgan holda Apollon-Soyuz missiyasining Sovet qismiga boshchilik qildi."
mt: 11th cosmonaut Leonov was also known as the "eleventh man". He was a member of the first group of Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extra-vehicular activity (EVA) or "spacewalk" outside a manned spacecraft for 12 minutes and 9 seconds. He received the highest Soviet award, "Hero of the Soviet Union", for his work. Ten years later, he commanded the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which marked the end of the Space Race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Hodisa yuz berganidan so'ng Gibson shifoxonaga yetkazilgan, biroq ko'p o'tmay olamdan o'tgan. 64 yoshli yuk mashinasi haydovchisi halokatda jarohatlanmadi. Avtoulovning o'zi o'sha kuni hodisa joyidan taxminan soat 12:00 GMT da olib ketilgan. Ko'ngilsiz hodisa yuz bergan joy yaqinidagi garajda ishlayotgan kishi: ""U yerda yo'lni kesib o'tmoqchi bo'layotgan bolalar bor edi va ularning barchasi qichqirib yig'layotgandi"" deb aytdi. Ularning hammasi baxtsiz hodisa yuz bergan yerdan orqaga qarab qochishdi."
mt: "After the incident Gibson was taken to hospital, but died soon after. The 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the accident. The driver himself was taken away from the scene of the incident at around 12:00 GMT on the day of the incident. A person working nearby the scene of the incident said: "There were children trying to cross the road and they were all crying." All of them ran away from the scene of the incident looking back."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Bajarilgan ishlarning aksariyati nazariy edi, biroq dastur o'qotar galaktikasidagi kuzatuvlarni simulyatsiya qilish uchun yozilgan edi. Jamoa qidirgan effektga galaktikaning qorong'i materiyasi va Somon yo'lining qorong'i materiyasi o'rtasidagi to'lqin kuchlari sabab bo'ladi. Xuddi oy to'lqinlarni yuzaga keltirgan holda yerga tortish kuchi bilan ta'sir ko'rsatgani kabi Somon yo'li ham Qavs galaktikasiga kuch bilan ta'sir qiladi. Olimlar qora materiya boshqa qora materiyaga xuddi odatiy materiya ta'sir qilgani kabi ta'sir ko'rsatadi, degan xulosaga kelishdi. ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Mazkur munozaralar Katrina to'fonidan keyingi yordam hamda qayta tiklash xarajatlari bo'yicha tortishuvlarga sabab bo'ldi; buni ba'zi moliyaviy konservatorlar buni hazilomuz tarzda ""Bushning Nyu-Orlean kelishuvi"" deb atashdi. Qayta qurish sa'y-harakatlarini erkin tanqid qilish Vashington ichidagi shaxslarga qayta qurish bitimlarini taqdim qilishga qaratilgan."
mt: "These debates were over post-Katrina relief and rebuilding costs; some fiscal conservatives derisively called it "Bush's New Orleans deal." Criticizing the rebuilding efforts was directed at Washington insiders who were pushing for the rebuilding agreements."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."
