src: "Kapsula Yerga yetib borganda va atmosferaga kirganda, taxminan soat 5 (TO) da (sharqiy vaqt bilan), Shimoliy Kaliforniya, Oregon, Nevada va Yuta aholisi uchun haqiqiy yorug'lik shou bo'lishi kutilmoqda. Kapsula osmonda uchayotgan yulduzga juda ham o'xshaydi. Kapsulaning tezligi soniyasiga 12,8 kilometr yoxud 8 milni tashkil qiladi, bunday tezlik bilan San-Fransiskodan Los-Anjelesga bir daqiqada yetib olish mumkin. Stardust 1969-yil may oyida Apollon X boshqaruv modulining qaytish vaqtidagi avvalgi rekordini yangilab, yerga qaytish bo'yicha eng tezkor kosmik kema sifatidagi yangi barcha davrlar rekordini o'rnatdi. ""U shimoliy Kaliforniyaning g'arbiy sohili bo'ylab harakatlanadi va Kaliforniyadan markaziy Oregon orqali Nevada va Aydahodan o'tib, Yutagacha bo'lgan osmonni yoritadi"", — dedi Stardust loyihasi menejeri Tom Daksberi."
mt: "When the capsule re-enters the atmosphere and returns to Earth, around 5 p.m. (Pacific time), Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah residents can expect a real light show. The capsule looks very much like a star moving across the sky. The capsule's speed is 12.8 kilometers per second, or 8 miles per second, which would get you from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust broke the previous record set by the Apollo 10 command module's return in May 1969, becoming the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth. ""It will travel along the west coast of Northern California, through central Oregon, Nevada and Idaho, and into Utah, lighting up the sky,"" said Stardust project manager Tom Dackesberry.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Pensilvaniya shtati Pittsburg shahridagi bolalar shifoxonasida ishlagan shifokor chorshanba kuni onasi uning avtomobili yukxonasidan o'lik holda topilgandan keyin, og'irlashtiruvchi holatlarda qotillik sodir etishda ayblanmoqda, deb xabar beradi Ogayo shtati rasmiylari. 29 yoshli doktor Malar Balasubramanian aftidan, dorilar bilan kuchli muolaja qilingan holatda, futbolka va ichki kiyimda yo'l yoqasida yotgan holda Sinsinnatidan taxminan 15 mil shimolda joylashgan Ogayo shtatidagi Blu-Eshdan topilgan. U zobitlarni o'zining 500 dut uzoqda joylashgan qora rangli Oldsmobile Intrigue mashinasi tomon yo'naltirdi. Ular u yerda 53 yoshli Saroja Balasubramanianning qonga bulg'angan yopinchiqlar bilan o'ralgan jasadini topishdi. Politsiya jasad u yerda taxminan bir kundan beri yotganligini aniqlanganligini aytdi.
mt: 29-year-old Dr. Malar Balasubramanian was found dead in her car trunk, overdosed on drugs, wearing a football jersey and underwear on the side of the road in Ohio, according to state officials. She was last seen in the afternoon in her 500-mile away black Oldsmobile Intrigue in Cincinnati, Ohio. Police found her 53-year-old mother Saroja Balasubramanian's body, wrapped in blood-soaked sheets, in the car trunk. The body was found there about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Bu eBay tarixidagi eng yirik xariddir. Kompaniya o'z daromadlari manbalarini diversifikatsiya qilish hamda Xitoy, Sharqiy Yevropa va Braziliya kabi Skype kuchli mavqega ega hududlarda ommalashishga umid qilmoqda.
mt: This is the largest eBay sale in history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue sources and become more popular in areas such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil where Skype is strong.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Jarohatlanganlar shifoxonaga olib borilgandan so'ng to'qnashuv tugagach, qolgan mahbuslarning taxminan 40 nafari hovlida qoldi va o'z kameralariga qaytishdan bosh tortdi. Muzokarachilar holatni to'g'rilashga harakat qilib ko'rdi, lekin mahbuslarning talablari noaniq. Soat 10:00–11:00 (TK) MDT orasida hovlidagi mahbuslar yong'in keltirib chiqardi. Ko'p o'tmay, isyonga qarshi qurollangan askarlar hovliga kirdi va mahbuslarni ko'zni yoshlantiruvchi gazlar bilan burchakka burishdi. Yong'indan qutqaruv guruhlari va nihoyat, tungi soat 11:35 da olovni o'chirishdi.
mt: After the injured were taken to the hospital, about 40 of the remaining inmates refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were unclear. At around 10:00–11:00 (TK) MDT, inmates in the yard set fire to the prison. Soon after, armed guards entered the yard and gassed the inmates into a corner. Fire rescue teams and eventually, extinguished the fire at around 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Televizorda jonli tarzda berilgan sharhlar Eronning yirik manbalari sanksiyalarning ta'sir o'tkazayotganligini tan olganligining dastlabkisi edi. Ular Yevropa Ittifoqi tomonidan Eron iqtisodiyoti 80% tashqi daromadini oladigan ishlov berilmagan neft eksportiga moliyaviy cheklovlar va taqiqlarni o'z ichiga oladi. O'zining eng so'nggi oylik hisobotida OPEC neft xom ashyosi eksportlarining yigirma yil ichida eng past darajasiga tushib, kuniga 2,8 million barrelni tashkil qilganligini aytdi. Mamlakatning oliy yetakchisi Oyatulloh Ali Xomanaiy neftga bog'lanib qolishni 1979-yildagi Islom inqilobidan avval boshlangan va mamlakat o'zini xalos qilishi kerak bo'lgan ""tuzoq"" deb atadi."
mt: "Live television commentary was the first to acknowledge the impact of sanctions on Iran's major sources. They include financial restrictions and bans on unprocessed oil exports that make up 80% of the country's foreign income. In its latest monthly report, OPEC said oil exports fell to their lowest level in 20 years, to 2.8 million barrels a day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, calls it the "stranglehold" that began before the Islamic revolution of 1979 and that the country must free itself from."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Frantsiyada ovoz berish an'anaga ko'ra past texnologiyali tajribaga ega: ovoz beruvchilar o'zlarini butkada yakkalaydilar, o'zlari tanlagan nomzod ko'rsatilgan avvaldan bosma terilgan qog'oz varag'ini konvertga joylaydilar. Rasmiylar saylovchi shaxsini tasdiqlaganidan keyin saylovchi konvertni ovoz berish qutisiga tashlaydi hamda ovoz berish varag'iga imzo chekadi. Fransuz saylov qonunchiligi mazkur jarayonlarni ancha qat'iy kodifikatsiya qiladi. 1988-yildan beri ovoz beruvchilar va kuzatuvchilar boshlanishida konvertlar mavjud emasligi va mos tarzda sanalgan va vakolat berilgan ovoz beruvchilardan tashqari hech qanday konvertlar qo'shilmasligiga guvohlik bera olishlari uchun saylov qutilarining shaffof bo'lishi talab qilinadi. Nomzodlar jarayonning barcha qismlariga guvoh bo'lish uchun vakillarini jo'natishlari mumkin. Kechki payt maxsus qoidalarga amal qilgan holda, qattiq nazorat ostida ko'ngillilar tomonidan ovozlar sanaladi.
mt: In France, voting is a low-tech affair: voters dip their fingers in ink, then place a pre-printed ballot into a ballot box. The ballot box is then sealed and the voters' fingers are checked for ink. French electoral law codifies these procedures. Since 1988, ballot boxes have been transparent, and no other ballot boxes are allowed to be added to the ballot boxes except by authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness the entire process. At night, special rules apply, and the votes are counted by volunteers under strict supervision.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Agar tasdiqlansa, topilma Allenning Musashiga oid sakkiz yillik tadqiqotlariga yakun yasaydi. Dengiz tubini xaritalashdan keyin kema qoldiqlari ROV yordamida topildi. Xabarlarga ko'ra, dunyoning eng badavlat kishilaridan biri bo'lgan Allen o'z boyligining katta qismini dengizni tadqiq qilishga sarmoya sifatida kiritgan va urushdagi azaliy qiziqishi — Musashini topish uchun qidiruvga kirishgan.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery would end eight-year research into the Musashi, which was charted on the ocean floor after the wreckage was found by ROV. Reports say Allen, one of the world's richest people, had invested a large portion of his fortune into ocean research and joined the search for the Musashi, which was his lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Agar tasdiqlansa, topilma Allenning Musashiga oid sakkiz yillik tadqiqotlariga yakun yasaydi. Dengiz tubini xaritalashdan keyin kema qoldiqlari ROV yordamida topildi. Xabarlarga ko'ra, dunyoning eng badavlat kishilaridan biri bo'lgan Allen o'z boyligining katta qismini dengizni tadqiq qilishga sarmoya sifatida kiritgan va urushdagi azaliy qiziqishi — Musashini topish uchun qidiruvga kirishgan.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery would end eight-year research into the Musashi, which was charted on the ocean floor after the wreckage was found by ROV. Reports say Allen, one of the world's richest people, had invested a large portion of his fortune into ocean research and joined the search for the Musashi, which was his lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televizion xabarlarda zavoddan chiqayotgan oq tutun tasvirlangan. Mahalliy hokimiyat organlari zavod atrofidagi aholini uyda qolish, konditsionerlarni o'chirib qo'yish hamda jo'mraklardan suv ichmaslik to'g'risida ogohlantirmoqda. Zavodda radioaktiv seziy va yod aniqlangani haqida Yaponiya yadroviy agentligi xabar bergan. Mutasaddilar organlari joydagi uran yoqilg'isi bo'lgan konteynerlar yorilgan va to'kilayotgan bo'lishi mumkinligini taxmin qilishmoqda.
mt: Television footage showed smoke billowing from the plant. Local authorities are advising residents in the area to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and refrain from drinking tap water. The Japanese nuclear agency has reported that radioactive iodine and cesium have been detected at the plant. Local officials are speculating that containers of uranium fuel may have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Janubiy Afrikaning KvaZulu-Natal viloyatida shifokor Toni Moll dori vositasiga o'ta bardoshli sil kasalligini (XDR-TB) aniqladi. Intervyuda u yangi tur ""juda yuqori o'lim darajasi tufayli juda xavotirli va qo'rqinchli bo'lganligini"" aytdi. Doktor Mollning fikriga ko'ra, bir nechta bemorlar shifoxonada kasallikni yuqtirgan bo'lishlari mumkin va eng kamida ulardan ikkitasi shifoxonadagi sog'liqni saqlash xodimlari bo'lgan. Kasallangan kishi bir yil ichida 10–15 ga yaqin odamga yuqtirishi mumkin. Ammo sil kasalligi bilan xastalangan odamlarning butun guruhida XDR-TB ulushi hali ham past ko'rinadi; Janubiy Afrikada istalgan muayyan lahzada jami 330 000 kishidan 6000 nafari kasallangan."
mt: "In South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province, physician Tony Moll identified a highly resistant strain of tuberculosis (XDR-TB). In an interview he said the new strain was "very scary and frightening because of its very high mortality rate." Dr. Moll's opinion is that several patients may have contracted the illness in the hospital, and at least two of them were hospital staff. An infected person can infect up to 10–15 other people in a year. However, the proportion of XDR-TB in the group of people with tuberculosis is still low; in South Africa, out of 330,000 people with tuberculosis, only 6,000 are infected."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: FAA da'vo qilishicha, NextGen — samolyotlarga qisqa yo'nalishda uchish va har yili millionlab gallon yonilg'ini tejash hamda uglerod chiqindilarini kamaytirish imkonini beruvchi tizimdir. U eski radiolokatsiya texnologiyalaridan farqli ravishda, sputnikka asoslangan texnologiyadan foydalanib, havo harakati nazoratchilariga samolyotlarni yanada yaxshiroq aniqlash hamda uchuvchilarga yanada aniqroq ma'lumot berish imkonini taqdim qiladi.
mt: The FAA claims that NextGen — a system that allows planes to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel and reduce carbon emissions each year — is different from older radar technologies, which use satellites to better track aircraft and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Tarixchilar agentlikning muvaffaqiyat darajasini kuchaytirish uchun osongina hal qilish mumkin bo'lgan, ayniqsa avtomobil o'g'rilanishi bo'yicha ishlarga resurslarning qaratilganligi uchun FQB agentligining o'tmishdagi siyosatlarini tanqid qildilar. Kongress 2005-moliyaviy yildan axloqsizlik bo'yicha tashabbusni moliyalashtira boshladi va FQB kattalar pornografiyasiga 10 nafar agent ajratishi lozimligini belgiladi.
mt: Historians criticized the agency's past policies for focusing resources on easily solved cases, especially those involving child pornography. Congress began funding anti-pornography efforts in the 2005 fiscal year and required the agency to assign ten agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen mahalliy vaqt bilan ertalab soat 9:30 lar (0230 UTC) atrofida uchish-qo'nish yo'lagida halokatga uchradi va portlab ketdi, shu tufayli aeroport tijoriy reyslar uchun yopildi. Uchuvchi bo'linma rahbari Dilokrit Pattava ekanligi aniqlandi. Mahalliy axborot vositalarining xabar berishicha, aeroportdagi o't o'chirish mashinasi ish vaqtida ag'darilib ketgan.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) this morning, a JAS 39C Gripen crashed and burst into flames on the runway, forcing the airport to close to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Dilokrit Pattava. Local media reported that the airport's grass-cutting machine had been pushed into the air while in operation.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 1960-yillar mobaynida Bjezinski Jon F. Kennedining maslahatchisi sifatida, so'ng Lindon B. Jonson ma'muriyatida faoliyat yuritdi. 1976-yilgi saylovlar vaqtida u Karterga tashqi siyosat borasida maslahat bergan, so'ng Genri Kissingerdan keyin 1977-yildan 1981-yilgacha Milliy xavfsizlik maslahatchisi (NSA) sifatida xizmat qilgan. NSA xodimi sifatida u Karterga 1978-yildagi Kemp-Devid shartnomasi; 1970-yillarning oxirlarida AQSH-Xitoy aloqalarini normallashtirish; 1979-yilda Eron garovi inqiroziga sabab bo'lgan Eron inqilobi; va 1979-yildagi Sovet Ittifoqining Afg'onistondagi bosqini kabi xalqaro masalalarni diplomatik tarzda hal qilishda yordam berdi.
mt: 1960s, he served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, later to Lyndon B. Johnson's administration. In the 1976 election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, later serving as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As an NSA official, he helped Carter negotiate the Camp David Accords; normalize U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, all diplomatically.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: "Xorvatiya poytaxti Zagrebda dunyoga kelgan Bobek ""Partizan Belgrad"" safida to'p surib mashhurlikka erishgan. U ularga 1945-yilda qo'shildi va 1958-yilgacha turdi. Jamoadagi faoliyati davomida u 468 ta uchrashuvda 403 ta gol urgan. Hech kim Bobekdan ko'ra ko'proq guruh uchun maydonga tushmagan yoki gol urmagan. 1995-yili u ""Partizan"" jamoasi tarixidagi eng yaxshi o'yinchi deb topildi."
mt: "In Zagreb, the capital of Croatia, Bobek, who became famous by playing for Partizan Belgrade, was born. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No one has played for a team more or scored more goals than Bobek. In 1995, he was named the best player in Partizan's history."
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonikus Elizabet — Dromaeozavrlar oilasiga mansub va Velosiraptorning yaqin qarindoshi hisoblanadi. Tanasi pat bilan to'liq qoplangan, qoni qaynoq bu yirtqich qush Velosiraptorga kabi tirnoqli ikki old oyog'ini ko'tarib tik holatda yurgan deb ishonilgan. Uning ikkinchi panjasi kattaroq bo'lib, unga ""g'arbiy changal"" ma'nosini anglatuvchi Hesperonikus nomini bergan."
mt: "Hesperonikus Elizabeth — a member of the Dromaeosauridae family and a close relative of Velociraptor. Its body was covered with feathers, its tail was warm-blooded, and it was believed to have walked on two legs with its hind legs raised like the warm-blooded Velociraptor. Its second toe was larger, and the name Hesperonikus means "western chicken" in Latin."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: O'tgan yili to'yi bo'lgan juftlik nikohining bir yilligini nishonlash uchun bazmga kamida 100 nafar odam keldi. Rasmiylar rasmiy yubiley tadbiri keyinroq o'tkazilishi rejalashtirilganini aytdilar. Juftlik bir yil avval Texasda turmush qurgan hamda do'stlari hamda qarindoshlari bilan nishonlash uchun Buffaloga kelgan edi. Buffaloda tavallud topgan 30 yoshli erkak otishmada halok bo'lgan to'rt kishidan biri edi, lekin uning rafiqasi jabrlanmadi.
mt: 100 people attended a reception to celebrate the couple's first anniversary of marriage. Officials said a formal anniversary celebration would be held later. The couple married last year in Texas and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. One of four people killed in the shooting was born in Buffalo, a 30-year-old man, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno ishdan chiqqanida, bortida 120–160 kubometr yonilg'i bor edi va kuchli shamol hamda to'lqinlar uni dengiz suviga surib yubordi. Vertolyotlar ekipajning o'n ikki a'zosi qutqardi va burun sinishi yagona jarohat bo'ldi. 100 metrlik kema odatiy o'g'it yuklarni olib kelish uchun ketayotgandi hamda dastlab mulozimlar kemaning yukni to'kib yuborishidan hayiqqandi.
mt: 120–160 cubic metres of fuel was on board when the ship was hit by strong winds and waves, throwing the ship into the sea. Helicopters rescued all twelve members of the crew and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship was carrying the usual fertiliser cargo and the crew had initially laughed at the idea of the ship being sunk.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Votyening rejissyorlikdan tashqari erishgan yutuqlariga 1973-yilda o'zi siyosiy senzura deb bilgan narsasiga qarshi ochlik e'lon qilgani ham kiradi. Fransuz qonuni o'zgartirildi. Uning faoliyati 15 yoshligiga, u Ikkinchi jahon urushi davrida Fransiya qarshiligi harakatiga qo'shilgan davrga taqaladi. U o'zini 1998-yilgi kitobga kiritdi. 1960-yilda u kino rejissyorligidan dars berish uchun endigina mustaqil bo'lgan Jazoirga yo'l oldi.
mt: 1973 saw him achieve a number of other successes, including the release of a film he had been banned from making for political reasons. The French law was changed. His career began at 15, during World War II, when he joined the French Resistance. He wrote about it in a book in 1998. In 1960, he went to independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Dafn marosimida ishtirok etish uchun to'rt milliondan ko'proq kishi Rimga tashrif buyurdi. Kelganlar soni shu qadar ko'p ediki, barchaning Avliyo Peter maydonidagi dafn marosimiga kirishi imkonsiz edi. Odamlarga marosimni ko'rishlariga imkon berish uchun Rimning turli joylarida bir nechta katta ekranli televizorlar o'rnatilgan edi. Italiyadagi boshqa ko'pgina shaharlarda hamda dunyoning qolgan qismida, xususan, Polshada ko'p sonli kishilar tomonidan tomosha qilingan shunga o'xshash konstruksiyalar o'rnatildi.
mt: 4 million people came to Rome for the funeral. So many people came that it was impossible for everyone to get into St. Peter's Square for the funeral. Large screens were set up in various parts of Rome and Italy, and in many other parts of the world, especially Poland, where many people watched the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Xabar qilinishicha, Makbet ko'chasida joylashgan xonadon gaz sizib chiqishi tufayli portlagan. Gaz kompaniyasi rasmiysi qo'shnilaridan biri telefonda sizib chiqayotgani haqida xabar qilganidan so'ng voqea joyiga xabar berayotgan edi. Mutasaddi yetib kelganida kvartira portladi. Og'ir jarohatlar to'g'risida xabar berilmagan, biroq portlash paytida voqea joyida bo'lgan kamida besh kishi shok simtomlariga qarshi davolangan. Xonadon ichkarisida hech kimsa yo'q edi. o'sha vaqtda qariyb 100 ga yaqin aholi hududdan evakuatsiya qilindi.
mt: A house on Makbet Street exploded after a gas leak. A gas company official was informed by a neighbor that the house was leaking gas, and he went to the scene. When the official arrived, the house exploded. At least five people were treated for shock symptoms. No one was inside the house at the time. About 100 people were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: 25 yoshli Nikolas Alden va 21 yoshli Zakari Kaddebek halok bo'ldi. Kaddebek haydovchi bo'lgan. Edgar Veguilla qo'li va jag'idan jarohat oldi, Kristofer Shnayderning yuzi esa qayta tiklash jarrohlik operatsiyasini talab etadi. Ukaning beshinchi odam boshiga o'qtalgan quroli ishlamay qoldi. Shnayder beto'xtov og'riq sezar, bir ko'zi ko'r, bosh suyagining bir qismi yo'q va yuzi titandan qayta tiklangan edi. Shnayder o'z yurtidagi USAF bazasidan turib video havola orqali guvohlik berdi.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Kadembe were killed. Kadembe was driving. Edgar Veguilla suffered injuries to his hand and ribs, Christopher Schnayder's face required a second reconstructive surgery. The fifth man was hit in the head by a blunt object. Schnayder gave testimony via video link from his home base in the USAF.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Golf ham, regbi ham Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytish arafasida. Xalqaro olimpiya qo'mitasi bugun Berlindagi ijroiya kengashi yig'ilishida mazkur sport turlarini kiritishga ovoz berdi. Ko'rib chiqilishi kerak bo'lgan boshqa beshta sport turlaridan ko'ra, regbi, xususan, regbi yunion va golf Olimpiada o'yinlarida ishtirok etish uchun tanlangan. Sqvosh, karate va rolikda uchish 2005-yil Olimpiada o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol singari Olimpiada dasturiga kiritilishiga harakat qilgan sport turlaridir. Ovoz hali ham to'liq XOQ tomonidan oktyabr oyida Kopengagenda bo'lib o'tadigan yig'ilishida tasdiqlanishi kerak.
mt: Golf and rugby are on the comeback trail. The International Olympic Committee voted today to bring back the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin. Of the five sports under consideration, rugby, in particular rugby union, and golf were selected to compete in the Olympic Games. Squash, karate and roller skating are among the sports that have tried to get back into the Olympic program, like baseball and softball were removed from the Olympic program in 2005. The vote is still pending IOC approval at its meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 1759-yil 24-sentabrda Artur Ginnes Irlandiyaning Dublin shahridagi Avliyo Jeyms darvozasi pivo zavodini 9 ming yilga ijaraga olish bo'yicha shartnomaga imzo chekdi. 250 yildan keyin Ginnes har yili 10 milliard yevro (14,7 milliard AQSH dollari) foyda olib keluvchi global biznesga aylandi.
mt: 1759 On September 24, Arthur Guinness signed a lease for St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for 9,000 years. 250 years later, Guinness became a global business making 10 billion euros (14.7 billion U.S. dollars) in profit every year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Fransiyaning sharqidagi Lion yaqinida joylashgan botqoqdan dushanba kuni topilgan o'lik o'rdak insonlar uchun halokatli bo'lgan parranda grippining H5N1 turi bilan kasallangani tasdiqlandi. Fransiya Avstriya, Germaniya, Sloveniya, Bolgariya, Gretsiya va Italiyadan so'ng, ushbu virsdan aziyat chekkan Yevropa Ittifoqidagi yettinchi mamlakatdir. Xorvatiya va Daniyada H5N1 bilan kasallanishda gumon qilinayotgan holatlar hamon tasdiqlanmagan.
mt: A dead goose found Monday near Lyon in eastern France was confirmed to have been infected with the H5N1 strain of bird flu, which has been fatal to humans. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be affected by this virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 infection are also being investigated in Croatia and Denmark.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 2010-yildagi zilziladan so'ng Gaitiga yetib kelgan BMT tinchlikparvar kuchlari harbiylar qarorgohi yaqinida boshlangan kasallikni tarqatishda ayblanmoqda. Sudga kiritilgan da'voga ko'ra, BMT lageridagi chiqindilar munosib tarzda sanitarizatsiya qilinmagan bo'lib, bakteriyaning Gaitining eng yirik daryolaridan biri — Artibonit daryosi irmog'iga kirib kelishiga sabab bo'lgan. Qo'shinlar yetib kelishidan avval, Gaitida 1800-yillardan buyon mazkur kasallik bilan bog'liq muammolar kuzatilmagan. Gaiti Adolat va Demokratiya Instituti Nepalning BMT tinchlikparvar bataloni o'zi bilmagan holatda Gaitiga xastalikni olib kelganligini ko'rsatuvchi mustaqil izlanishlarga murojaat etdi. BMTning mazkur kasallik bo'yicha mutaxassisi Deniel Lantan epidemiyaga tinchlikparvar kuchlar sabab bo'lgan bo'lishi mumkinligini ta'kidladi.
mt: 2010 earthquake aid workers are being blamed for the outbreak of a disease near the military base. According to the charges, the waste from the base was not properly sanitized, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, the country's largest river. The disease had not been seen in Haiti since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute of Justice and Democracy in Nepal appealed to independent research to show that the peacekeepers brought the disease to Haiti. Daniel Lantana, a disease expert for the UN, said that the outbreak could have been caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Irlandiya hukumati vaziyatni o'nglash uchun parlament qonunchiligining zarurligida urg'u bermoqda. Hukumat so'zchisining aytishicha, ""hozirda qonunning imkon qadar tezroq qabul qilinishi ham aholi salomatligi, ham jinoiy adliya nuqtayi nazaridan muhim"". Sog'liqni saqlash vaziri mazkur moddalarning vaqtincha qonuniyligidan foydalanuvchi shaxslarning salomatligi yuzasidan hamda endilikda konstitutsiyaga zid bo'lgan o'zgarishlar kuchga kirishi bilan chiqarilgan giyohvand moddalarga oid hukmlar borasida ham tashvishda ekanini bildirdi."
mt: "The Irish government is urging parliament to pass emergency legislation to allow the use of medicinal cannabis. The government's spokesman said, ""It is important for public health and criminal justice that the legislation be passed as soon as possible"". The health minister said he was concerned about the legality of the use of the drugs and the changes to the constitution that would allow the use of the drugs."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Los-Anjeles politsiya boshqarmasi vakili Kristofer Garsiya so'zlariga ko'ra, gumon qilinayotgan erkak jinoyatchi vandalizmda emas, mulkiy daxlsizlikni buzish bo'yicha tergov qilinmoqda. Belgiga moddiy zarar yetkazilmagan; moslashtirish kichkina ""e"" harfini o'qish uchun ""O""ni o'zgartirish maqsadida tinchlik hamda yurak belgilari bilan bezatilgan qora brezentlar yordamida amalga oshirilgan."
mt: "A Los Angeles Police Department spokesman Christopher Garcia said the suspected vandal is being investigated for misdemeanor trespassing, not vandalism. No property damage was reported; the modification was to change the letter "O" to read "E" for the word "heart" using black fabric with peace and heart symbols."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "Karno mashhur, lekin o'zi ta'kidlaganidek faoliyatining cho'qqisida 9000 nafar talabasi bo'lgan ""Modern Education"" va ""King's Glory"" ta'lim markazlarida dars bergan munozarali ingliz tili o'qituvchisidir. Qaydlarida u ayrim ota-onalar qo'pol deb hisoblaydigan so'zlardan foydalangan va uning sinfda behayo so'zlardan foydalangani xabar qilingan. Modern Education uni ruxsatsiz katta hajmdagi reklamalarni avtobuslarda chop qilish va o'zini ingliz tili bo'yicha katta o'qituvchisi deb aytish orqali yolg'on gapirishda aybladi. U ilgari mualliflik huquqini buzganlikda ham ayblangan, lekin unga ayblov e'lon qilinmagan. Sobiq talaba ""darsda jargondan foydalangani, eslamarda tanishish ko'nikmalarini o'rgatgani va shunchaki, talabalarning do'stidek bo'lganini"" aytdi."
mt: "Karno is a controversial English teacher who taught at the peak of her career at the 'Modern Education' and 'King's Glory' educational centers, which had 9,000 students. She was accused of using some words that some parents considered rude and of using foul language in her class. Modern Education accused her of unauthorized large-scale advertising in buses and of falsely claiming to be a large English teacher. She was previously accused of copyright infringement, but no charges were filed. A former student said that she used 'jargon' in class, taught'social skills' and was 'just like a friend' to the students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Filippinlik sobiq politsiyachi Filippin poytaxti Manila shahrida Gonkonglik sayyohlar avtobusini olib qochib, ularni garovda ushlab turdi. Rolando Mendoza M16 avtomatida sayohatchilarni o'qqa tutdi. Garovdagilarning bir nechtasi qutqarib olindi va hozirga qadar kamida olti kishi o'lgani tasdiqlangan. Olti nafar garovga olinganlar, jumladan, bolalar va keksalardan, filippinlik suratkashlar kabi, erta ozod qilindi. Keksa ayol hojatxonaga muhtoj bo'lgani tufayli keyinchalik suratkashlar uning o'rnini egallashgan. Mendozaga o'q uzilgan.
mt: A former Philippine police officer hijacked a bus full of Hong Kong tourists in the Philippine capital Manila. Rolando Mendoza opened fire on the tourists with an M16 rifle. At least six hostages were killed and six others were injured. Six of the hostages, including children and elderly, were freed early. An elderly woman was later freed by the press, who took her place. Mendoza was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Braziliya dunyodagi eng katta Rim-katolik mamlakatidir va Rim-katolik cherkovi mamlakatda bir xil jinsli nikohlarning qonuniylashtirilishiga doimiy ravishda qarshilik qilib keladi. Braziliya Milliy Kongressi 10 yildan buyon qonuniylashtirish masalasini muhokama qilib kelmoqda hamda bu kabi fuqarolik nikohlari hozirgi kunda faqatgina Rio Grand de Sulda qonuniydir. Qonun loyihasining asl nusxasini San Pauloning sobiq meri Marta Suplifi ishlab chiqqan. Taklif etilgan qonun, o'zgartirilgandan keyin, hozirda Robert Jeffersonning qo'lida. Namoyishchilar Milliy Kongressga taqdim qilish uchun 1,2 million imzoga ega petitsiyani to'plashga umid qilishmoqda.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage. The Brazilian National Congress has been debating the legalization issue for 10 years and such civil unions are only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original draft of the bill was written by former mayor of São Paulo Marta Suplicy. The proposed law, as amended, is now in the hands of Robert Jefferson. Demonstrators hope to present a petition with 1.2 million signatures to the National Congress.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Ko'rgazmadan besh daqiqa o'tib, shamol esa boshladi, taxminan bir daqiqadan so'ng, shamolning tezligi 70 km/s ga yetadi… undan keyin yomg'ir yog'ishni boshladi, shunaqangi qattiq va shiddatli yog'adiki, tanaga ignadek sanchiladi, shundan keyin osmondan do'l yog'iladi, odamlar vahimaga tushgan va qichqirib, bir-birining ustiga yugura boshladi. ""Men singlim va uning do'stini yo'qotib qo'ydim, yo'limda nogironlik aravachasidagi ikki nogiron kishi uchradi, odamlar shunchaki ularning ustidan sakrab va ularni itarib o'tayotgandi"", dedi Armand Versache."
mt: 5 minutes after the show started, the wind started, about a minute later, the wind speed reached 70 km/h… then it started to rain, it was so hard and strong that it stung like needles, then it started to hail, people panicked and started to jump on each other. "I lost my girlfriend and her friend, I saw two disabled people in my way, people were just running over them and leaving them behind", said Armand Versache.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Sinoptiklarning ta'kidlashicha, Kabo-Verde orollaridan 645 mil (1040 km) g'arbda joylashgan bo'ron quruqlik hududlariga xavf solishidan oldin tinishi mumkin. Fred hozirda soatiga 105 mil (165 km/s) tezlikka ega va u shimoliy-g'arb tomon harakatlanmoqda. Fred sun'iy yo'ldosh orqali tasvirga olish ixtiro qilinganidan beri Atlantika okeanining janubi va sharqida hozirgacha qayd etilganeng kuchli tropik siklondir va sharqdan 35 daraja kenglikda qayd etilgan uchinchi yirik to'fondir.
mt: Fred is expected to pose a threat to land areas before it dissipates. Fred is currently moving north-northwest at 105 mph (165 km/h) and is the third major hurricane to form in the Atlantic since the invention of satellite imagery and the third to form east of 35 degrees north latitude.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n standarti 2,4 Gs va 5,0 Gs chastotalarining ikkalasida ham ishlaydi. Agar tayanch stansiyada qo'sh radio bo'lsa, bu uning 802.11a, 802.11b va 802.11g bilan orqaga qarab mos kelishiga imkon beradi. 802.11n tezligi eng yuqori nazariy ishlab chiqarish quvvati 600 Mbit/s bo'lgan o'zining avvalgi avlodlaridan ko'ra ancha tezroq.
mt: 802.11n works on both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies. If the base station has two radios, this allows it to fall back to 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g. 802.11n has a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbit/s, faster than its predecessors.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Olimpiada o'yinlarining oltin medali sovrindori 100 va 200 metrga erkin usulda suzish bahslari hamda uch karra Hamdo'stlik o'yinlarida uchta estafetada qatnashishi kerak edi, biroq shikoyatlari sababli uning salomatligi shubha ostida qolayotgandi. U og'riqlarini yengish uchun zarur bo'lgan dori-darmonlarni ololmay qoldi, chunki ular o'yinlarda ta'qiqlandi.
mt: 100 and 200 meter freestyle gold medalist and three-time Commonwealth Games competitor was to compete in three relays, but was sidelined due to injury. He refused to take necessary painkillers, as they were banned in competition.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Qo'shma Shtatlar Geologik xizmatining xalqaro zilzilalar xaritasi bir hafta avval Islandiyada zilzila bo'lmaganini ko'rsatdi. Islandiyaning meteorologiya xizmati Xekla xududida so'nggi 48 soat ichida hech qanday zilzila sodir bo'lmaganligi haqida xabar berdi. Fazaning o'zgarishiga olib keligan sezilarli zilzila 10-mart kuni vulqonning cho'qqi kalderasining shimoliy-sharqiy tomonida yuz berdi. Biror bir vulqon harakatiga aloqador bo'lmagan qora bulutlar tog' yonbag'rida qayd etilgan edi. Bulutlar haqiqatan ham portlash sodir bo'lgan yoki yo'ligi haqidagi ehtimoliy chalkashlikni keltirib chiqardi.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's  international earthquake map showed no earthquake in Iceland in the week before. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reported that there had been no earthquake in the vicinity of Hekla in the last 48 hours. A significant earthquake, which caused the volcano's summit caldera to shift, occurred on March 10 in the northeast of the volcano's peak. Dark clouds were reported over the mountain's slopes, which could have been mistaken for an earthquake-related eruption.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Uchuvchisiz oy orbital apparati Chandrayaan-1 oy kosmik zondi (MIP) chiqarib yuborildi va Oy sirti bo'ylab soniyasiga 1,5 km (3000 mil/soat) tezlik bilan uchib, Oyning janubiy qutbiga yaqin joyda muvaffaqiyatli qo'ndi. Oy zondi uchta muhim ilmiy asbobdan tashqari barcha tomonlaridan bo'yalgan Hindiston milliy bayrog'i tasvirini ham olib yurgan.
mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 lunar probe was launched and successfully landed near the southern pole of the Moon at 1.5 km (3000 mph) per second, carrying a tricolor Indian national flag and three important scientific instruments.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

Oy zondi uchta muhim ilmiy asbobdan tashqari barcha tomonlaridan bo'yalgan Hindiston milliy bayrog'i tasvirini ham olib yurgan.

src: Bu mavsumdagi dastlabki kasallik holatlari haqida iyul oyining oxirida xabar qilindi. Mazkur kasallikni cho'chqalar tashiydi, keyinchalik chivinlar orqali insonlarga o'tadi. Epidemiya Hindiston hukumatini jiddiy zararlangan hududlarga cho'chqa tutuvchilarni joylashtirish, minglab chivinga qarshi pardalarni tarqatish hamda pestitsidlarni sepish singari chora-tadbirlar ko'rishga undadi. Hukumat tomonidan ensefalitga qarshi bir necha million shisha vaksina va'da qilingan va bu sog'liqni saqlash agentliklarini keyingi yilga tayyorlashga yordam beradi. Tarixiy jihatdan eng ko'p zararlangan hududlarga vaksinalar yetkazib berish bo'yicha rejalar bu yil mablag' yetishmasligi va boshqa kasalliklarga nisbatan ahamiyat past bo'lganligi sababli kechiktirildi.
mt: The first cases of the disease were reported in July. The disease is spread by pigs, and then by mosquitoes to humans. The epidemic prompted the government to deploy pig farmers to affected areas, distribute millions of glass vials of vaccine against encephalitis, and to help health agencies prepare for the next year. Historically, the areas most affected were delayed in receiving vaccines this year due to lack of funding and other diseases being of lower priority.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Taklif qilingan tuzatish 2011-yilda allaqachon ikkala palata tasdig'idan ham o'tgan edi. o'zgartirish mazkur qonunchilik sessiyasida amalga oshirildi, avval ikkinchi gap Vakillar Palatasi tomonidan o'chirildi va keyin dushanba kuni xuddi shu shaklda Senat tomonidan qabul qilindi. Bir jinsli fuqarolik uyushmalarini taqiqlash taklif etilgan ikkinchi gapning muvvaffaqiyatsizligi kelgusida fuqarolik uyushmalariga eshiklarni ochib berishi mumkin. Jarayondan keyin jarayonda qolishi uchun HJR-3 keyingi saylangan qonunchilik organi tomonidan 2015 yoki 2016-yilda qaytadan ko'rib chiqiladi.
mt: 2011, the proposed amendment had already passed both houses of the legislature. The amendment was passed in the same form on Monday, the second reading was removed by the second chamber of the House of Representatives and then accepted by the Senate in the same form. The failure of the second reading of the proposal to ban same-sex marriage could open the door to civil society organizations. After the process, the process is left for the next elected legislative body to review in 2015 or 2016.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

The amendment was passed in the same form on Monday, the second reading was removed by the second chamber of the House of Representatives and then accepted by the Senate in the same form. The failure of the second reading of the proposal to ban same-sex marriage could open the door to civil society organizations. After the process, the process is left for the next elected legislative body to review in 2015 or 2016.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """Panama hujjatlari"" — Panamaning Mossack Fonseca yuridik kompaniyasining 2016-yili matbuotga sizdirilgan o'n millionga yaqin hujjatlar uchun umumiy atamadir. Hujjatlar o'n to'rtta bankning badavlat mijozlariga soliqlar va boshqa tartib-qoidalardan qochish uchun milliardlab AQSH dollariga teng boyliklarini yashirishga yordam berganini ko'rsatdi. Britaniyaning The Guardian gazetasi Germaniya banki buni amalga oshirish uchun foydalanilgan 1200 ta soxta kompaniyaning taxminan uchdan birini nazorat qilishini aytadi. Dunyo bo'ylab norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bir qancha jinoiy ta'qiblar amalga oshirildi va Islandiya hamda Pokiston hukumatlari rahbarlari iste'fo berdi."
mt: """Panama Papers""" — A collective term for over 11 million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca that were leaked to the public in 2016. The documents showed that the firm helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars from tax authorities and other regulations. The Guardian reports that the German bank used the firm to help create about 1,200 fake companies, about a third of which were under its control. Protests took place around the world, several criminal investigations were launched, and the leaders of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Ham fuqarolik, ham harbiy operatsiyalar uchun texnik soz holatda saqlanmagan eski flotga ega bo'lgan Eronda aviahalokatlar tez-tez sodir bo'ladi. Xalqaro sanksiyalar yangi samolyotlarni xarid qila olmaslikni anglatadi. Joriy hafta boshida politsiya vertolyotining halokati uch nafar kishini hayotiga zomin bo'ldi va yana uch kishi jarohatlandi. O'tgan oy Armanistonga yo'l olgan samolyot qulab tushib, bortdagi 168 nafar kishining umriga zomin bo'lganida Eron yillar mobaynidagi eng yomon havo halokatini boshdan kechirdi. Aynan shu oyda boshqa bir samolyot uchish-qo'nish yo'lagidan chiqib ketib, devorga urilgan va o'n yetti kishi vafot etgandi.
mt: Civilian and military operations are often plagued by crashes of aging fleets of aircraft that are not properly maintained. International sanctions prevent the purchase of new aircraft. Last week a police helicopter crashed killing three people and injuring three others. Last month a plane bound for Armenia crashed killing all 168 people on board, marking the worst air disaster in Iran's history. In the same month another plane veered off the runway, crashed into a building and killed seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Iroqni o'rganish guruhi bugun soat 12:00 GMT da o'z hisobotini taqdim etdi. Bu mazkur holatda Iroqdagi hech bir harakat mazhablararo qurolli kurashni, oshib borayotgan zo'ravonlikni yoxud tartibsizlik sari siljishni to'xtatishga hech kim kafolat bermasligidan ogohlantiradi. Hisobot Yaqin Sharqqa nisbatan siyosat haqida AQSHda umumiy kelishuvni shakllantirish hamda ochiq muhokama uchun da'vo bilan ochiladi. Hisobot Iroqqa nisbatan Ijroiya siyosatining deyarli har bir jihatini qattiq tanqid ostiga oladi va zudlik bilan yo'nalishni o'zgartirishga undaydi. Uning 78 tavsiyasidan birinchisi shuki, shu yil oxiriga qadar Iroq chegaralarini tajovuzlardan himoya qilish va qo'shnilar bilan diplomatik aloqalarni qayta tiklashga oid yangi diplomatik choralarni boshlash lozim.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraq Study Group released its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that the sectarian violence, chaos, and civil war in Iraq will not escalate. The report calls for a new consensus in the United States on Middle East policy and open debate. It criticizes almost every aspect of the Iraq policy and urges a change of direction. Its first recommendation is to begin new diplomatic initiatives to secure Iraq's borders from attacks and to reestablish diplomatic relations with neighbors by the end of this year.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Ansa nashriga ko'ra, ""politsiya bir nechta yuqori darajadagi yollanma qotillardan xavotirda edi, ular vorislik urushining boshlanib ketish ehtimolidan qo'rqqan. Politsiya u Palermoda Provensanoning o'ng qo'li bo'lgani va tajribasi kattaroqligi bilan Provensanoning imkon qadar panada yurish siyosatini davom ettirishni ko'zlayotgan keksa avlod xo'jayinlarining hurmatini qozongani sababli Lo Pikkoloning qo'li baland kelganini aytdi. 1992-yili Provensano Riina olib borgan va mafia faollari Jovanni Falkone va Paolo Borsellinolarning hayotini olib ketgan davlatga qarshi urushga chek qo'yganidan so'ng ushbu xo'jayinlarni jilovlab olgandi""."
mt: "According to the newspaper, "police were concerned about several high-ranking mafiosi, who were worried about the start of a succession war. Police said that the old bosses of the Provenzano family, who were trying to continue the Provenzano family's policy of as much as possible, had shown their respect for the Provenzano family's old bosses, who had been kidnapped by Riina in 1992, after the state had been declared a war against the mafia, and had been taken away by the mafia bosses Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino.""
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Yaponiyalik dzyudochi, ikki karra Olimpiada o'yinlari oltin medali sovrindori Hitoshi Saito 54 yoshida olamdan o'tdi. Jigar ichi safro yo'llari saratoni o'lim sababi deb e'lon qilindi. U seshanba kuni Osakada olamdan o'tdi. Sobiq olimpiada o'yinlari va jahon chempioni Saito vafot etgan vaqtida Butun Yaponiya dzyudo federatsiyasining o'quv qo'mitasi raisi bo'lgan.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoist, two-time Olympic gold medalist Hitoshi Saito died. Liver cancer was announced as the cause of death. He died on Monday in Osaka. Former Olympic Games and world champion Saito was the chairman of the education committee of the All Japan Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: O'z sayohati mobaynida Ivasaki ko'p vaziyatlar muammoga ro'baro' kelgan. Uni qaroqchilar tunagan, unga Tibetda quturgan kuchuk hamla qilgan, Nepalda nikohdan qochib ketgan hamda Hindistonda hibsga olingan.
mt: During his journey, Ivasaki encountered many difficulties. He was kidnapped by bandits, attacked by a mob in Tibet, escaped a forced marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Jankarlo Fizikella avtomashinasi boshqaruvini yo'qotdi va startdan keyin tezda musobaqani yakunladi. Uning jamoadoshi Fernando Alonso poyganing aksariyat qismida peshqadamlik qildi, biroq pit-stopdan keyin bu darhol yakun topdi, ehtimol, old o'ng g'ildirak yomon tiqilib qolgani sabablidir. Maykl Shumaxer poyga davomidagi bir qancha kurashlarda ilgaklarga yetgan zarar tufayli Alonsodan ko'p o'tmay, poygani yakunladi.
mt: 2006 Italian Grand Prix: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and finished the race immediately after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but was quickly overtaken after the pit-stop, possibly due to a damaged front right wheel. Michael Schumacher retired from the race after several collisions with other cars.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Oxirgi 3 oy ichida 80 dan ortiq hibsga olingan kishi rasmiy tarzda biror ayblov qo'yilmasdan tergov izolyatoridan ozod qilindi. Shu yilning aprelida sudya Glinn tomonidan hibsga olinganidan so'ng 24 soatdan ortiq sud komissari ishtirokida tinglov o'tkazilmasdan ushlab turilganlarni ozod qilinishini kuchga kiritish maqsadida muassasaga nisbatan vaqtinchalik taqiqlovchi sud buyrug'i chiqarilgan. Agar ruxsat berilsa komissar garov pulini belgilaydi va hibsga oluvchi ofitser qo'ygan ayblovlarni rasmiylashtiradi. Bundan so'ng ayblovlar ish kuzatib boriladigan shtat kompyuter tizimiga kiritiladi. Eshituv gumonlanuvchining ishni sudda tezkor ko'rib chiqish huquqi uchun sanani ham belgilashi kerak.
mt: 80 people arrested in the last three months have been released without charges. In April, a judge ordered the release of those held for more than 24 hours without a hearing before a commissioner, who can set bail and the arresting officer can file charges. Once charges are filed, they are entered into the state computer system. The commissioner also sets a date for a speedy hearing of the defendant's right to have the charges reviewed in court.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin, shuningdek, rasmiylarning afg'onlarni yana bir saylov xarajati va xavfsizlikka tahdiddan saqlash maqsadida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini bekor qilishga qaror qilganini aytdi. Diplomatlar Afg'oniston konstitutsiyasida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini keraksiz degan qarorga kelish uchun yetarlicha noaniqlik topishganini aytdi. Bu saylovning ikkinchi turini bekor qilish konstitutsiyaga xilof bo'lar edi, deyilgan oldingi xabarlarga zid.
mt: Lodin also said the government had decided to cancel the second round of the election, which was to be held to ensure the security of the voters and to prevent the waste of resources. Diplomats said there was insufficient clarity in the constitution to allow the cancellation of the second round of the election. This would be contrary to the constitution, according to previous reports.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "1947-yilda Pokiston Britaniya hukmronligidan mustaqil bo'lgan vaqtdan buyon, Pokiston prezidenti hududlar ustidan deyarli to'liq avtonom nazoratni amalga oshiradigan FATAni boshqaruvchi ""Siyosiy agentlar""ni belgilaydi. Bu vakillar Pokiston Konstitutsiyasining 247-moddasiga ko'ra hukumat va adliya xizmatlarning ko'rsatilishiga mas'uldirlar."
mt: 1947, when Pakistan gained independence from British rule, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to oversee the administration of the territories under almost complete autonomy. These representatives are responsible for the implementation of the government and judicial services in accordance with Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: "Rayan Gosling va Emma Stoun ishtirokidagi kinofilm hamma asosiy yo'nalishlar bo'yicha nominatsiyalarni qo'lga kiritdi. Gosling va Stoun mos ravishda ""Eng yaxshi aktyor va aktrisa"" nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritishdi. Boshqa nominatsiyalar eng yaxshi film, rejissyor, kinematografiya, kiyim dizayni, filmni montaj qilish, o'ziga xos rol, mahsulot dizayni, ovoz montaji, ovozlarni aralashtirish va o'ziga xos ssenariylarni o'z ichiga oladi. Kinoning ikki ashulasi — ""Tinglov"" (""Orzu qiladigan ahmoqlar"") hamda ""Yulduzlar shahri"" eng yaxshi original qo'shiq nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritdi. Lionsgate studiyasi boshqa har qanday studiyadan ko'ra ko'proq – 26 ta nominatsiyaga sazovor bo'ldi."
mt: "The film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone took home nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone took home nominations for best actor and actress, respectively. Other nominations include best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, makeup and hairstyling, original score, sound mixing, sound editing and original screenplay. The film's two songs — "City of Stars" and "Til It Happens to You" — took home nominations for best original song. Lionsgate took home more nominations than any other studio — 26."
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK, shuningdek, Niigata prefekturasidagi Kashivazaki Kariva atom elektrostansiyasi odatdagi tarzda ishlayotganini xabar qildi. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. kompaniyasi zilzilaning ta'sir qilmaganligini va o'zining Shika atom elektr stantsiyasidagi 1- va 2-raqamli reaktorlarining o'chirilganligini xabar qildi. Mintaqadagi 9400 ta uy suvsiz va taxminan 100 ta uy elektr tokisiz ekanligi xabar qilinadi. Zararlangan hududlarda ayrim yo'llarga zarar yetgan, temir yo'l xizmati uzilib qolgan hamda Ishikava prefekturasida joylashgan Note aeroporti yopiqligicha qolmoqda.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashivazaki Kariva nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that the earthquake had not affected its Shika nuclear power plant's 1st and 2nd reactors, which were shut down. There are 9,400 homes without water and about 100 homes without electricity in the affected area. Some roads were damaged and train service was suspended in Ishikawa Prefecture, and the Note airport was closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Sizdirilgan ma'lumotlarga ko'ra, hujjat 1967-yilgi Yaqin Sharq urushidan avval chegaralarga asoslangan, Falastin xohlagan chegara mojarosiga ishora qiladi. Aytilishicha, ikkala millat uchun ham muqaddas hisoblangan bo'lajak Quddus mamlakati hamda Iordaniya vodiysi masalasi ham qamrab olingan. Isroil shartnoma imzolanganidan keyin vodiyda o'n yil davomida harbiy qismlarini muntazam saqlab qolishni talab qilmoqda, PA esa bunday harbiy qismlarni faqat besh yil davomida qoldirishga rozi.
mt: The document reportedly predates the 1967 Six-Day War and refers to the Palestinian desired border dispute. It is said to include the future state of Jerusalem and the Jordan Valley, both considered holy to both nations. Israel demands to keep military forces in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while PA is willing to keep them for only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Gonkongda tug'ilgan Ma Nyu-York Universiteti va Garvard yuridik maktabida o'qidi va bir vaqtlar AQSHda doimiy yashash huquqini beruvchi ""grin karta""ga ega bo'ldi. Hsie saylov vaqtida Ma inqiroz davrida mamlakatdan qochib ketishi mumkinligiga ishora qildi. Se, shuningdek, fotogenik Ma moddadan ko'ra, ko'proq uslub ekanini qayd etdi. Ushbu ayblovlarga qaramay, Ma Xitoyning materikdagi hududi bilan yaqinroq aloqalarni himoya qiluvchi platformada oson g'alaba qozondi."
mt: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and was once eligible for a "green card" that allows permanent residence in the United States. Ma hinted at leaving the country during the election, and also noted that she was more of a style than substance. Despite these allegations, Ma won easily on a platform that supports closer ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Ko'pgina oilalar ko'chirishga qarshi kurashish maqsadida yuridik yordam so'rayotgani ma'lum bo'lganidan keyin, 20-mart kuni Shariy Ko'rfaz hamjamiyati huquqiy markazida uy-joy firibgarligi qurbonlari uchun uchrashuv bo'lib o'tdi. Ijarachilar ular bilan yuz bergan narsalarni baham ko'ra boshlaganlarida ishtirok etgan oilalarning ko'pchiligi OHA vakili Karolin Uilson ularning garov pullarini og'irlaganini va shahardan chiqib ketganini angladilar. Lokvud Gardensdagi ijarachilar yana 40 yoki undan ko'proq oilalarning ko'chirilishi mumkinligiga ishonadilar, chunki ular OHA politsiyasining boshqa jamoat turarjoy mulklarining uy-joy bilan bog'liq firibgarlikka aralashgan bo'lishi mumkinligini ham o'rganayotganligini bildilar.
mt: 20 March 2007, a meeting was held at the Sharjah Community Legal Center for victims of housing fraud. Many families who had fought against eviction were present, and many of them were shocked to learn that the rent they had paid had been squandered by the UNHCR representative, Carol Wilson. The landlords of the apartment complex in Lakewood Gardens believe that another 40 or more families may be evicted, as they are investigating the possibility that the UNHCR police have been involved in other community housing frauds.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Musobaqaning yakuniy natijalariga ko'ra, Keselovski 2250 ochko bilan Poygachilar chempionati yetakchilikni saqlab kelmoqda. Yetti ochko ortda qolgan Jonson 2243 ochko bilan ikkinchi o'rinda joylashgan. Uchinchi o'rindagi Hemlin yigirma ochkoga ortda qolyapti, biroq Boyerdan besh ochko oldinda. Kane va kichik Trueks 2220 va 2207 ochko bilan mos ravishda beshinchi hamda oltinchi o'rinda bormoqda. Styuart, Gordon, Kenset hamda Garvik mavsumda to'rttagina poyga qolgan bir paytda Haydovchilar chempionatidagi yuqori o'ntalikni yakunlab berdi.
mt: 1. Keselovski 2250 2. Johnson 2243 3. Hemlin 2200 4. Boyer 2195 5. Kane 2220 6. Trueks 2207 7. Styuart 2190 8. Gordon 2185 9. Kenset 2180 10. Garvik 2175
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
