src: Bu kimyoviy jihatdan tasdiqlangan Marsga tegishli modda yerga tushishi hodisasi odamlar tomomidan beshincha marta kuzatilishi deb hisoblanadi. Yerga tushgan taxminan 24 000 ta ma'lum meteoritdan atigi 34 ga yaqini Marsdan ekanligi tasdiqlangan. Ushbu xarsang toshlardan o'n beshtasi o'tgan iyul oyidagi meteorit yomg'iriga aloqador. Yer yuzida nihoyatda kamyob bo'lgan ayrim toshlarning bir unsiyasi 11 000 AQSH dollaridan 22 500 AQSH dollarigacha sotilmoqda, bu oltin narxidan o'n baravar ko'p.
mt: This is the fifth time a Martian meteorite has been found on Earth. Only about 34 of the estimated 24,000 known meteorites are known to be Martian. Of these, 11 were associated with the July 2002 meteor shower. One of these rare rocks is selling for between $11,000 and $22,500, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Formula 1 chempionatida yetti karra g'olib bo'lganida keyin 2006-yili nafaqaga chiqqan Shumaxer jarohatlangan Filipe Massaning o'rniga kelishi kerak edi. 2009-yildagi Vengriya Gran prisi vaqtidagi avtohalokatdan keyin braziliyalik jiddiy bosh jarohati olgan. Massa kamida 2009-yilgi mavsumning qolgan qismini o'tkazib yuborishi kerak.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Schumacher was set to replace injured Felipe Massa, who was injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury. Massa is expected to miss at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Hozirga qadar Qo'shma Shtatlar bo'ylab keng miqyosda foydalanilishi sababli AOL IM bozorini o'z tezligida harakatlantira oldi hamda rivojlantirdi. Ushbu kelishiv kuchga kirishi bilan ozodlik nihoyasiga yetishi mimkin. Yahoo! hamda Microsoft xizmatlari foydalanuvchilari soni birgalikda AOL mijozlari soniga raqib bo'ladi.
mt: AOL IM has been widely used in the United States, and has been growing and developing rapidly. This agreement will likely lead to AOL's freedom. Yahoo! and Microsoft's services will compete with AOL's users.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Kecha ertalab Turkiyaning Gaziantep shahridagi politsiya shtab-kvartirasi yaqinida mashinada bomba portlatilishi natijasida ikki politsiya xodimi halok bo'ldi va yigirmadan ortiq kishi jarohatlandi. Gubernator idorasi jarohatlanganlarning o'n to'qqiz nafari politsiya xodimlari bo'lganini ma'lum qildi. Politsiya Daish (ISHID) jangarisi hujum uchun javobgarlikda gumon qilinayotganini aytdi.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 20 injured when a bomb exploded in a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, early this morning. The governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS) militant group was suspected of being responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Sobiq Massachusets shtati gubernatori Mitt Romni seshanba kuni Florida Respublikachilar partiyasida o'tkazilgan boshlang'ich prezidentlik saylovida 46 foizdan ko'proq ovoz bilan g'alaba qozondi. AQSH Vakillar Palatasining sobiq spikeri Nyut Gingrich 32 foiz bilan ikkinchi o'rinni egalladi. g'olib butun shtatni qo'lga kiritadi, degan qoidaga ko'ra, Florida ellikta delegatning barchasini Romniga taqdim qilib, uni respublikachilar partiyasi nomzodligi uchun kurashda yetakchi sifatida oldingi o'ringa chiqardi.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's presidential nomination in the first primary of the 2012 election cycle, winning 46 percent of the vote in Florida. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. The winner takes all the state's delegates, which puts Romney ahead of Gingrich in the race for the Republican Party's nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Vakillar palatasining sobiq spikeri Nyut Gingrich, Texas gubernatori Rik Perri hamda kongressmen Mishel Baxman mos ravishda to'rtinchi, beshinchi va oltinchi o'rinlarni egalladi. Natijalar chiqqanidan keyin Gingrich Santorumni maqtadi, lekin Romni haqida keskin so'zlar aytdi, Ayovada uning nomidan Gingrichga qarshi salbiy kompaniya reklamalari namoyish qilingandi. Perri ""bu kecha o'tkazilgan partiyaning saylovoldi kengashi natijalarini baholash, mazkur kurashda o'zim uchun oldinga boradigan yo'l bor-yo'qligini aniqlash uchun Texasga qaytaman"" dedi, lekin keyinroq u kurashda qolishini hamda 21-yanvarda Janubiy Karolina shtatidagi ilk saylovlarda qatnashishini bildirdi. Avgust oyidagi Ames Strow so'rovnomasida g'olib bo'lgan Baxman o'z kampaniyasiga yakun yasashga qaror qildi."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished fourth, fifth and sixth respectively. Gingrich praised Santorum after the results came in, but was harsh on Romney, who was targeted by anti-Gingrich ads run by Santorum's campaign in Iowa. Perry said he was "going to go back to Texas and assess the results of last night's caucus and decide whether or not I'm going to continue to move forward in this race," but later decided to continue and participate in the first primaries in South Carolina on January 21. Bachmann ended her campaign after finishing first in the Ames Straw Poll in August."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Stansiya veb-sayti shouni ""yangi va g'azablantiruvchi g'alati aylanishga ega bo'lgan eski maktab radio teatri!"", deya ta'rifladi. Ilk kunlarida shou faqatgina suhbat efiriga e'tibor qaratadigan, uzoq vaqtdan beri faoliyat yuritib kelayotgan internet radiosi TogiNet Radio'da efirga uzatildi. 2015-yil oxirida TogiNet yordamchi stansiya sifatida AstroNet Radioni tashkil qildi. Shouda dastlab Sharqiy Texasdan bo'lgan havaskor dublyaj aktyorlari qatnashgan."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as "a new and exciting old school radio drama with a twist! The show originally aired on TogiNet Radio, an internet radio station that has been around for a long time and focuses on conversations with attention to the long-running internet radio station TogiNet Radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a supporting station. The show originally featured amateur dubbing actors from Eastern Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: "Mumbayga hujum uyushtirganlar 2008-yilning 26-noyabr kuni qayiqda granata, avtomat qurollari bilan yetib kelgan hamda bir qancha nishonlarga, jumladan, gavjum Chatrapati Shivaji Terminus temir yo'l bekati va mashhur Toj Mahal mehmonxonasiga zarba bergan. Devid Hedlining razvedkasi hamda axborot yig'ishi Pokistonning ""Laskhar-e-Taiba"" jangari guruhidan 10 nafar qurollangan shaxsning operatsiyasini amalga oshirishga yordam berdi. Bu hujum Hindiston bilan Pokiston o'rtasidagi munosanatlarni juda taranglashtirdi."
mt: 2008 November 26, terrorists arrived by boat with grenades and automatic weapons and struck several targets, including the busy Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's intelligence and information gathering helped the operation by the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba, which involved ten armed men. This attack greatly strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Nadalning kanadalikka qarshi birga-bir rekordi 7–2. U yaqindagina Brisben shahrida o'tkazilgan Ochiq musobaqada Raonichga mag'lub bo'lgan edi. Nadal birinchi uzatmada 76 ochko to'plagan holda musobaqada 88% sof ochkoni qo'lga kiritdi. o'yindan keyin tuproqli kortlar shohi: ""Men eng muhim tadbirlarning yakunlovchi turlarida qatnashayotganimdan juda xursandman. Men bu turnirga g'alaba qozonish uchun kelganman"", dedi."
mt: "Nadal's record against the Canadian is 7–2. He lost to Raonic last week in Brisbane. Nadal won 76% of his first serve points in the match. Post-match, the home court favorite: ""I'm very happy to be playing the big events. I came here to win this tournament"", he said."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: o'tgan hafta Naked News dasturi uchta yangi ko'rsatuv bilan o'zining xalqaro til vakolatini yangiliklarni xabar qilishga keskin ravishda oshirishini e'lon qildi. Allaqachon ingliz va yapon tillarida lavhalar berayotgan хalqaro idora TV, internet va mobil qurilmalar uchun ispan, italyan va koreys tilidagi dasturlarni boshlamoqda.
mt: Last week, the Naked News program announced that it would be expanding its international language rights to deliver news reports in Spanish, Italian and Korean, in addition to the English and Japanese language shows it already offers. The international division of TV, Internet and mobile devices is now broadcasting in Spanish, Italian and Korean.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "Karpanedo chorshanba tadbiridan tashqari, chempionatda ikkita yakkalik poyga musobaqalarida ishtirok etdi. Uning birinchisi Slalom edi, u yerda birinchi yugurishda ""Tugamadi"" natijasini olgan. Ushbu yugurish musobaqasida 116 raqibdan 36 tasi bir xil natijaga erishgan. U o'zining boshqa poygasi Gigant slalomda ayollar joylashgan guruhda birinchi o'rinni egallagan avstriyalik Klaudiya Loesning natijasi 4:41.30 ga solishtirganda 2:11.60 daqiqa sekinroq va to'qqizinchi o'rinni egallagan vengriyalik Kyongyi Danidan 1:09.02 daqiqaga sekinroq kelib, o'ninchi o'rinni egalladi. Ayollarning startda qo'yilgan guruhidan to'rtta chang'ichi o'z masofasini tugata olmadilar va Katta Slalomdagi jami 117 ta chang'ichidan 45 tasi poydaga o'rin ola olmadi."
mt: "In addition to the Wednesday event, she competed in two individual slalom races. In the first, she finished ""Did not finish"". This race had 116 competitors, 36 of whom finished with the same result. She finished her other race, Giant slalom, in 2:11.60, 1:09.02 slower than the Austrian Claudia Lössl, who finished first in the women's group, and 9 seconds slower than the Hungarian Königyi Danica, who finished eighth. Four of the women's group did not finish their distance, and 45 of the 117 competitors in the Giant slalom did not finish the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Chorshanbada Qo'shma Shtatlar Milliy basketbol uyushmasi (NBA) professional basketbol mavsumini COVID-19 ga oid xavotirlar sababli to'xtatib qo'ydi. NBA qarori Yuta o'yinchisining COVID-19 virusiga topshirgan testi ijobiy chiqqanidan so'ng qabul qilindi.
mt: On Wednesday, the United States National Basketball Association (NBA) professional basketball season was suspended due to concerns over the COVID-19 virus. The NBA decision was made after a Utah player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: "Bugunning kun o'yinchisi ""Washington Capitals"" jamoasidan Aleks Ovechkin bo'ldi. U ""Washington"" jamoasi ""Atlanta Thrashers"" jamoasi ustidan 5:3 hisobda g'alaba qilgan o'yinda 2 gol urdi va 2 ta to'p uzatishni amalga oshirdi. Ovechkinning kechadagi ilk golli uzatmasi jamoaga yangi qo'shilgan Niklas Bekstormning g'alaba keltirgan goliga aylandi. uning o'sha tundagi ikkinchi goli mavsumdagi 60-goli bo'lib, u 1995–96 yilgi mavsumdan buyon Jaromir Jagr va Mario Lemyonlarning har biri ushbu marraga yetganidan beri bir mavsumda 60 yoki undan ko'p gol urgan birinchi o'yinchi edi."
mt: "Today's player of the day was Alexander Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in a 5–3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's second assist was on a goal by new addition Niklas Backstrom, which was the game-winning goal. His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux both did it in the 1995–96 season."
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "Shimoliy Rok banki 2008-yilda Birlashgan Qirollik hukumati tomonidan favqulodda yordamni qabul qilganligi fosh bo'lganidan keyin davlat mulkiga aylantirildi. Shimoliy Rok 2007-yildagi ikkilamchi ipoteka inqirozi davomida inqirozidan zarar ko'rgani sababli yordam talab qildi. Janob Richard Brensonning ""Virgin Group"" kompaniyasining bank uchun taklifi bank milliylashtirilishidan oldin rad etilgandi. 2010-yilda, milliylashtirilganida, hozirgi yuqori ko'chadagi bank — Nothern Rock plc ""yomon bank"" Nothern Rock (Asset Management) dan ajratildi. Virgin faqat Shimoliy Rokning ""yaxshi banki""ni sotib oldi, aktivlarni boshqarish kompaniyasini emas."
mt: "Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after it was revealed to have accepted state aid from the British government. Northern Rock had suffered losses in the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. Richard Branson's Virgin Group had previously offered to buy the bank before it was nationalised. In 2010, when it was nationalised, the current high street bank - Northern Rock plc was split from Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought Northern Rock's "good bank", not the asset management company."
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Janob Rudning Kioto iqlim kelishuvini imzolash haqidagi qarori hozirda kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmagan yagona rivojlangan mamlakat Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlarini yakkalab qo'ydi. Avstraliyaning sobiq konservativ hukumati Hindiston va Xitoy kabi davlatlar zaharli gazlar chiqindisini kamaytirish rejasi bilan o'zlarini cheklamayotgan bir paytda uning ko'mir eksportiga qattiq suyanib qolishi iqtisoiyotga zarar yetkazadi deya Kyoto protokolini ratifikatsiya qilishni rad etdi.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate treaty leaves the United States as the only developed country not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government was angered by the treaty's failure to curb emissions of greenhouse gases by countries such as India and China while its coal exports were being hit hard by the treaty's restrictions.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Janob Rudning Kioto iqlim kelishuvini imzolash haqidagi qarori hozirda kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmagan yagona rivojlangan mamlakat Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlarini yakkalab qo'ydi. Avstraliyaning sobiq konservativ hukumati Hindiston va Xitoy kabi davlatlar zaharli gazlar chiqindisini kamaytirish rejasi bilan o'zlarini cheklamayotgan bir paytda uning ko'mir eksportiga qattiq suyanib qolishi iqtisoiyotga zarar yetkazadi deya Kyoto protokolini ratifikatsiya qilishni rad etdi.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate treaty leaves the United States as the only developed country not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government was angered by the treaty's failure to curb emissions of greenhouse gases by countries such as India and China while its coal exports were being hit hard by the treaty's restrictions.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Sinov monitoring qilinishi va uning samaradorligi baholanishi sababli qo'shimcha zararkunandalarga qarshi kurash sinovida o'q uzuvchilar qo'riqchilar tomonidan yaqindan nazorat qilinishi lozim edi. NPWS va Sports Shooters Association Australiya (NSW) Inc. kompaniyasi bilan hamkorlikda malakali ko'ngillar Sportiv o'q otish uyushmasining ovlash dasturi ustida yollandilar. NPWS bilan bog' muhofazasi va merosi bo'yicha direktor vazifasini bajaruvchi Mik o'Flinning so'zlariga ko'ra, dastlabki o'q otish amaliyoti uchun tanlangan to'rt nafar mergan keng qamrovli xavfsizlik va o'quv mashg'ulotidan o'tgan.
mt: The trial was being monitored and its effectiveness evaluated, so shooters were required to be closely supervised by the guard force. The NPWS and the NSW Sporting Shooters Association Inc. worked together to train volunteers in the NPWS shooting program. According to the words of the NPWS director of conservation and heritage, Mike O'Flannagan, four volunteers were selected for the initial shooting exercise after completing a comprehensive safety and training program.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Mazkur qazilmaga asoslangan holda, bu bo'linish molekulyar dalillar tomonidan kutilganidan ancha ertaroq bo'lganini anglatadi. ""Bu hammasi orqaga qaytarilishi kerak degani"", dedi Efiopiyadagi Rift vodiysi tadqiqotlar xizmati taqdidotchisi va tadqiqot hammuallifi Berxan Asfav."
mt: "This suggests that the split occurred much earlier than expected based on molecular evidence. ""This is all going backwards"", said Berhanu Asfaw, a researcher with the Rift Valley Research Service and co-author of the study, in Ethiopia."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Tokio o'yin shouning payshanba kungi asosiy taqdimotida Nintendo prezidenti Satoru Ivata kompaniyaning yangi Nintendo Revolution konsolining boshqaruv dizaynini taqdim etdi. Televizor pultiga o'xshab, boshqaruv pulti foydalanuvchi televizori yaqinida joylashgan ikkita sensordan uning uch o'lchamli bo'shliqdagi joylashuvini aniqlash uchun foydalanadi. Bu qurilmani havoda harakatlantirish orqali o'yinchilarga video-o'yinlardagi harakatlar va siljishlarni boshqarish imkoniyatini taqdim etadi.
mt: At the Thursday opening ceremony of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. The controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to determine the location of the controller in three dimensions. This device allows players to control video games by moving the controller in the air, giving them the ability to control movements and slides in video games.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Oldinroq Xitoyning Xinhua axborot agentligi samolyot olib qochib ketilishi to'g'risida xabar bergandi. Keyinchalik hisobotlarda aytilishicha, samolyotda bomba xavfi borligini qabul qilishgan va ortga — Afg'onistonga yo'naltirilgan hamda Qandahorga qo'ngan. Dastlabki xabarlarga ko'ra, samolyotning Urumchiga favqulodda qo'nishi rad etilgandan keyin u ortga — Afg'onistonga yo'l olgan.
mt: Earlier, China's Xinhua news agency reported that the plane was hijacked. Later reports said that a bomb threat was accepted and the plane was turned back — to Afghanistan and landed in Kandahar. Initial reports said that the plane was denied an emergency landing in Urumchi and was turned back — to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Dushanba kuni Shvetsiya Fanlar akademiyasi adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti qo'mitasining doimiy kotibasi Sara Danius Shetsiyaning Sveriges radiosidagi dastur davomida qo'mitaning adabiyot bo'yicha 2016-yili Nobel mukofotini yutganlik to'g'risida to'g'ridan-to'g'ri Bob Dilan bilan bog'lana olmagandan keyin u bilan bog'lanish bo'yicha urinishlarini to'xtatganligini ommaviy tarzda e'lon qildi. Danius ""Biz hozirda hech nima qilmayapmiz. Men uning yaqin hamkoriga qo'ng'iroq qildim hamda elektron xatlar yubordim va do'stona javoblar oldim. Hozircha, shuning o'zi yetarli"", dedi."
mt: "On Monday, the secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, Sara Danius, announced on the Swedish Radio program that she had stopped trying to contact Bob Dylan after he refused to accept the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. Danius said, ""We are doing nothing right now. I called his close associate and sent emails and got friendly responses. For now, that's enough."""
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "AQSH prezidenti Jorj V. Bush bu xabarni mamnuniyat ila qabul qildi. Bushning matbuot kotibi Gordon Jondro Shimoliy Koreya va'dasi to'g'risida quyidagicha fikr bildirdi: ""Koreya yarim orolining yadrosizlantirilishini tekshirilishiga erishish yo'lidagi yirik qadam""."
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed this news with satisfaction. Bush's press secretary Gordon Johndroe said the following about the North Korean promise: ""A major step toward the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "Slaniya 1956-yil Shvetsiyaga ko'chib o'tib, uch yildan keyin Shvetsiya pochtasida ishlay boshladi va u yerning bosh naqqoshiga aylandi. U Shvetsiya va boshqa 28 davlat uchun mingdan ortiq markalar ishlab chiqargan. Uning ishi shunchalik tan olingan sifatga ega va batafsilki, u filatelistlar orasidagi juda kam sonli ""mashhur nomlardan"" biridir. Ba'zilar faqat uning ishini kolleksiya qiladi. Uning 1000-markasi 2000-yilda David Klyoker Erenstrahl tomonidan yaratilgan, Dunyo rekordlari Ginnes kitobiga kiritilgan ulug'vor ""Shved shohlariningbuyuk ishlari"" bo'lgan edi. Shuningdek, u ko'p davlatlar uchun kupyuralar yaratish bilan shug'ullangan, Kanadaning yangi 5$ va 100$ lik kupyuralari old tomonidagi bosh vazir suratlari uning so'nggi ishlaridan namunalar sirasiga kiradi."
mt: 1956, he moved to Sweden, and three years later he started working at the Swedish Post Office, and became the country's chief engraver. He designed stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is so well known and detailed, that he is one of the very few ""famous names"" in philately. Some collectors collect only his work. His 1000 stamp was created in 2000 by David Klockar Erenstrahl, and was entered into the Guinness Book of World Records as the ""Great Works of the Swedish Kings"". He also designed many cupro-nickels for many countries, including the new Canadian 5$ and 100$ bills, with the prime minister's portraits on the front, are examples of his latest work.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 millik Trans-Alyaska quvur liniyasi tizimi Alyaskadagi Fairbanks janubida minglab barrel tozalanmagan neft to'kilganidan keyin yopildi. Olovni boshqarish tizimi sinovidan keyin elektr quvvatining uzilishi xavfsizlik klapanlarning ochilishiga sabab bo'lgan va 9-sonli Fort-Grili nasos stansiyasi yaqinida ishlov berilmagan neft toshib ketgan. Klapanlarning ochilishi tizim bosimning pasayishiga olib keldi hamda moy taglik bo'ylab 55 000 barrel (2,3 million gallon) sig'imga ega bakka oqib tushdi. Chorshanba kuni tushdan keyinga kelib bak teshikaridan hali ham oqib ketmoqda edi, sababi bak ichidagi issiqlikdan kengayish bo'lishi mumkin. 104 500 barell sig'imga ega baklar pastidagi boshqa ikkilamchi saqlash hududi hali sig'imiga qadar to'lmagan.
mt: 800-mile Trans-Alaska pipeline system was shut down after a million barrels of unprocessed oil leaked from a pipeline near Fairbanks, Alaska. A power outage caused by a test of the fire suppression system opened safety valves and allowed unprocessed oil to flow into a 55,000-barrel (2.3 million gallon) storage tank. The tank was still leaking into the ground on Wednesday morning, as the heat from the oil could cause the tank to expand. A second, 104,500-barrel storage tank was still empty.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: AQSH muhandislar korpusi 6 duymli yog'ingarchilik oldin zararlangan to'g'onlarni buzishi mumkin deya taxmin qildi. Katrina bo'roni vaqtida 20 fut balandlikdagi toshqinga guvoh bo'lgan to'qqizinchi bo'linma, suv yaqindagi to'g'ondan oshib o'tgani sababli, hozirda belgacha keladigan suv ostida qolgan. Suv damba ustudan 100 fut kenglikdagi bo'limdan toshib ketmoqda.
mt: 6 feet of water is expected to breach levees damaged by Hurricane Katrina. The 9th division, which witnessed a 20 foot high wall of water, is now submerged in water up to the roof of a levee near a waterway. Water is flowing through a 100 foot wide section of levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton Xovard universiteti kasalxonasi barqaror holatdagi bemorni qabul qilganligini tasdiqladi. Bemor ba'zi Ebola holatlari qayd etilgan Nigeriyada bo'lgan. Kasalxona yuqumli kasalliklarni nazorat qilish protokoliga, jumladan infeksiyaning boshqalarga yuqishining oldini olish uchun bemorni boshqalardan ajratishga amal qildi.
mt: The Hamilton Health Sciences hospital confirmed it had admitted a stable patient. The patient had been in Nigeria, where some Ebola cases have been reported. The hospital followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent the spread of infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kometalar oqsillarni hosil qilishi va hayotni ta'minlashi mumkin bo'lgan organik moddalar bilan bir qatorda yerga suv yetkazib berish manbai bo'lgan bo'lishi mumkin. Olimlar sayyoralar qanday qilib shakllanishini, ayniqsa, Yer qanday shakllanganini tushunishga umid qiladilar, chunki kometalar ancha avval Yer bilan to'qnashgan.
mt: Comets may have seeded life on Earth with organic materials that could have formed living organisms, as well as being a source of water to the planet. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially Earth, as comets have collided with Earth in the past.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Hokimiyat organlarining tahdidning mavjudligiga ishonchlari komil bo'lmasada, Merilend transport ma'muriyati FQB talabiga ko'ra yopishni amalga oshirdi. Metroga kirishni to'sib qo'yish uchun samosvallardan foydalanildi va avtoulovchilarni aylanma yo'llarga yo'naltirish uchun 80 ta politsiyachi yordam berdi. Shaharning muqobil yo'nalishi hisoblanuvchi halqa yo'lida kuchli qatnov kechikishlari qayd etilmagan.
mt: Authorities were confident the threat was real but closed the subway system in compliance with the FBI's request. Turnstiles were used to block access to the subway and 80 police officers helped direct traffic around the loop. There were no reports of major delays on the city's alternate route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotosuratchi Ronald Reygan nomidagi UCLA Tibbiyot Markaziga yetkazilgan va keyinchalik u yerda vafot etgan. Aytilishicha, u 20 yoshlarda bo'lgan. Biber bayonotida ""Ushbu fojiali baxtsiz hodisa vaqtida [b]o'lmagan, unda bevosita ishtirok ham etmagan bo'lsam-da, o'y-xayollarim va duolarim qurbonning oilasi bilan birga"", dedi. TMZ ko'ngilochar yangiliklar veb-sayti tushunishiga ko'ra, suratkash o'z avtomobilini Sepulveda bulvarining boshqa tomonida to'xtatgan va politsiya to'xtatgan mashinani suratga olishga harakat qilgan, keyin ko'chani kesib o'tib harakatida davom etgan, bu mashinani to'xtatgan Kaliforniya yo'l harakati politsiya zobiti ikki marotaba uni qaytishini so'rashiga sabab bo'lgan. Politsiyaning aytishicha, suratkashni urib yuborgan avtoulov haydovchisining jinoiy javobgarlikka tortilish ehtimoli kam."
mt: "Photographer Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center was taken and later died there. It is said that he was in his twenties. In a statement, "This tragic incident occurred at a time when I was not involved, but I was directly involved in the game and prayers for the family of the victim," he said. TMZ entertainment news website said that the photographer stopped his car on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and took a picture of the police car, then crossed the road and continued to move, which caused the police officer to stop the car twice to ask him to return. The police said that the photographer was shot by the driver of the car, and the possibility of criminal liability was low."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Fotosuratchi Ronald Reygan nomidagi UCLA Tibbiyot Markaziga yetkazilgan va keyinchalik u yerda vafot etgan. Aytilishicha, u 20 yoshlarda bo'lgan. Biber bayonotida ""Ushbu fojiali baxtsiz hodisa vaqtida [b]o'lmagan, unda bevosita ishtirok ham etmagan bo'lsam-da, o'y-xayollarim va duolarim qurbonning oilasi bilan birga"", dedi. TMZ ko'ngilochar yangiliklar veb-sayti tushunishiga ko'ra, suratkash o'z avtomobilini Sepulveda bulvarining boshqa tomonida to'xtatgan va politsiya to'xtatgan mashinani suratga olishga harakat qilgan, keyin ko'chani kesib o'tib harakatida davom etgan, bu mashinani to'xtatgan Kaliforniya yo'l harakati politsiya zobiti ikki marotaba uni qaytishini so'rashiga sabab bo'lgan. Politsiyaning aytishicha, suratkashni urib yuborgan avtoulov haydovchisining jinoiy javobgarlikka tortilish ehtimoli kam."

src: "Ariasdagi test virusning yengil shakliga ijobiy natija berdi, dedi prezident vaziri Rodrigo Arias. Prezidentning holati barqaror, biroq u bir necha kun davomida uyida isolyatsiya qilinadi. Isitma va tomoq og'rig'ini hisobga olmaganda, ishimni masofadan turib bajara oladigan darajada o'zimni yaxshi va tetik his qilyapman. ""Men dushanbada hamma vazifalarimga qaytishni kutyapman"", — dedi Arias bayonotida."
mt: "The test for the mild strain of the virus was positive, said President's Chief of Staff Rodrigo Arias. The President's condition is stable, but he will be in isolation at home for a few days. I feel well enough to carry out my duties from a distance. ""I am looking forward to returning to all my duties on Monday"", — said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Maldiv tilida bir qop palma barglari sharafiga nomlangan tropik Gonu sikloni o'zining eng kuchli holatida soatiga 240 kilometr (soatiga 149 mil) barqaror shamol tezligiga yetdi. Bugun erta tongda shamol tezligi 83 km/s atrofida edi va uning susayishi kutilayotgan edi.
mt: A tropical cyclone named Gonu in the Maldivian language for "palm frond" reached its peak intensity with sustained winds of 240 km/h (149 mph). Early Monday morning the winds were around 83 km/h and were expected to subside.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Qizil oqim tabiiy tarzda yuz beruvchi bir hujayrali dengiz organizmi hisoblangan Karenia brevisning me'yordan ortiq to'planishi sababli yuzaga keladi. Tabiiy omillar kesishib, suv o'tlari sonining keskin ko'payishiga imkon beradigan ideal muhitni hosil qilishi mumkin. Suvo'tlari odamlarning ham, baliqlarning ham asablarini ishdan chiqaruvchi neyrotoksin ishlab chiqaradi. Aksar holatlarda baliqlar suvdagi toksik moddalarning yuqori darajasi sababli o'ladi. Insonlar shamol yoki to'lqinlar havoga olib chiqqan ifloslangan suvdan nafas olish orqali kasallanishi mumkin.
mt: Red tides are caused by an overabundance of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism. Ideal conditions can be created by the interaction of natural factors that allow the organism to proliferate. It produces neurotoxins that can affect both humans and fish. In many cases, fish die from the high levels of toxic material in the water. Humans can become ill by inhaling the contaminated water through the wind or waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Bir vaqtlar Saffir-Simpson dovul shkalasida 4-toifa bo'roni bo'lgan Felisia seshanba kuni tarqalishidan avval zaiflashib, tropik depressiyaga aylandi. Uning qoldiqlari orollarning katta qismida jalalarni yuzaga keltirdi, biroq hozirgacha hech qanday zarar yoki toshqinlar haqida xabarlar olinmadi. Oaxudagi yo'lakda 6,34 duymga yetgan yog'ingarchilik miqdori ""foydali"" deb tavsiflandi. Yomg'irlarning ayrimlari momaqaldiroq va tez-tez chaqmoq chaqishlar bilan kuzatildi."
mt: "Once a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, Felicia weakened to a tropical depression before landfall. Its remnants brought heavy rains to much of the islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported. Oahu received 6.34 inches of rain, which was described as "beneficial." Some of the rain fell in heavy bursts and was accompanied by lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Kichik Pike 2008-yilgi Singapur gran-prisida Fernando Alonso uchun xavfsizlik mashinasini olib chiqishda erta pit-stopdan keyin halokatga uchradi. Alonsodan oldinda ketayotgan avtomobillar xavfsizlik avtomobili ortidan yonilg'i quyishga kirdi, u g'alabani qo'lga kiritish uchun to'daning oldiga o'tib oldi. Piket Jr 2009-yilgi Vengriya Gran-prisidan keyin ishdan bo'shatildi.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix: Fernando Alonso's safety car was hit by a following car during an early pit-stop. Alonso was overtaking the safety car to take the lead when the car behind him hit the safety car. Pitet Jr was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Science jurnalining payshanba kungi nashrida Ekvador Galapagos orollarida yangi qush turlari paydo bo'lgani haqida xabar chop etilgan. Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlaridagi Prinston universiteti va Shvetsiyadagi Uppsala universiteti tadqiqotchilari atigi ikkita avlodda rivojlangan yangi turlar haqida xabar qildilar, biroq bu jarayon endemik Darvin zyabligi bo'lgan Geospiza fortes va immigrant kaktus zyabligi bo'lgan Geospiza conirostris o'rtasidagi nasl berish tufayli anchagina uzoqroq vaqtni olishiga ishonib kelingan.
mt: A new species of bird was discovered in the Galapagos Islands, according to a Thursday issue of the journal Science. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported two generations of new species, but the process was expected to take much longer due to crossbreeding between the endemic Darwin's finch Geospiza forbesi and the immigrant cactus finch Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Badiiy tadbir Buxarest shahar meriyasining Ruminiya poytaxtining ijodiy va rang-barang metropolis obrazini qayta tiklash kampaniyasining bir qismi hamdir. Shahar joriy yilning iyun va avgust oylari orasida Yevropaning janubi-sharqida birinchi bo'lib dunyoning eng yirik jamoat san'at tadbiri — Sigirlar paradiga mezbonlik qiladi.
mt: The event is part of a campaign to rebrand Bucharest as the artistic and colorful metropolis of Romania's capital. The city will host the first major public art event in Europe's south-eastern region in June and August this year, the largest public art event in the world.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Samolyot Irkutsk tomon yo'l olgan va ichki qo'shinlar tomonidan boshqarilayotgan edi. o'rganish uchun surishtiruv tayinlandi. Il-76 samolyoti 1970-yillardan buyon Rossiya hamda Sovet harbiy kuchlarining asosiy komponenti bo'lib kelgan va u bilan o'tgan oyda Rossiyada jiddiy halokat yuz berdi. 7-oktabr havoga ko'tarilish vaqtida dvigatel ajralib ketdi, jarohatlar kuzatilmadi. Rossiya mazkur voqeadan so'ng II-76 samolyotlari parvozini qisqa muddatga taqiqlab qo'ydi.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being controlled by the Russian military. An investigation has been ordered. The Il-76 has been the main component of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s and another one crashed in Russia last month. On October 7, the engine failed during takeoff, no injuries were reported. Russia temporarily banned Il-76 flights after this incident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: """Simpsonlar""dan oldin Simon bir necha seriallarda turli lavozimlarda ishlagan. U 1980-yillarda ""Taxi"", ""Cheers"" va ""The Tracy Ullman Show"" singari shoular ustida ish olib borgan. 1989-yili u Brooks va Gryoning bilan birgalikda The Simpsons serialini yaratishga yordam berdi va u shouning birinchi yozuvchilar jamoasini yaratishga mas'ul edi. Shouni 1993-yili tark etganligiga qaramasdan, u ijrochi prodyuser unvonini saqlab qoldi hamda har mavsumda o'nlab million dollar goronar olishda davom etdi."
mt: "Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on several series in various capacities. He worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show in the 1980s. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for creating the show's first writing staff. He left the show in 1993, but retained the title of executive producer and continued to earn millions of dollars per season."
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Flyukning yozishicha, ayrimlarning ayollarni ayollar sog'lig'i haqida gapirishdan to'xtatishga bo'lgan harakatlari muvaffaqiyatsiz tugagan. U ayollar va erkaklarni kontrasepsiya vositalarini tibbiy ehtiyoj deb hisoblashga undovchi ko'pgina ijobiy fikrlar va rag'bat sababli shunday xulosa chiqargan.
mt: Flyuk wrote that some people's attempts to stop women from talking about women's health have failed. She concluded that many positive attitudes and encouragement towards women and men using contraceptives as medical needs.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "Bu xuddi suvga o'xshaydi. Suv qanday shaffof bo'lsa, u ham xuddi shunday shaffof. Shunday qilib, agar siz qirg'oq yoqasida turgan bo'lsangiz, pastga qarab, uning tubidagi har qanday toshlar yoki balchiqni ko'rishingiz mumkin. ""Bizga ma'lumki, Titandan ko'ra ko'proq dinamizm namoyon bo'ladigan yagona sayyoraviy jism bor va uning nomi Yerdir"", — dedi Stofan."
mt: "It's like water. Water is transparent, so if you're standing on the shore and looking down, you can see any rocks or pebbles on the bottom. ""We know of only one celestial body besides Earth whose surface is, to some measurable degree, transparent to visible light and yet able to support a resistive atmosphere,"" said Stofan.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Bu faqat allaqachon keng tarqalgan nazariya — hech bo'lmaganda ayrim dinozavrlarda tuk bo'lganini tasdiqlabgina qolmay, balki rangli va uch o'lchamli joylashuv kabi odatda qoldiqlar berolmaydigan tafsilotlarni taqdim etadi. . Olimlarning aytishicha, mazkur hayvonning ustki patlari kashtan-jigarrang, pastkilari esa och yoki karatenoid rangda bo'lgan. Topilma qushlardagi patlar evolyutsiyasi to'g'risida ham tushuncha beradi. Dinozavrlarning patlarida raxis deb ataluvchi yaxshi shakllangan pat o'zagi mavjud bo'lmagani, biroq patlarning boshqa xususiyatlari — soqolcha va tukchalarga ega bo'lgani bois tadqiqotchilar, hoynahoy, raxis boshqa xususiyatlarga qaraganda kechroq paydo bo'lgan evolyutsion rivojlanish, degan xulosaga kelishdi. Patlarning tuzilishi shuni ko'rsatadiki, ulardan uchish uchun emas, balki haroratni nazorat qilish yoxud ko'z-ko'z qilish maqsadida foydalanilgan. Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, bu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa ham, namuna jo'janing patini emas, balki voyaga yetganning tuklarini ko'rsatadi. Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, garchi ushbu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa-da, namuna jo'janing patlarini emas, balki katta turning tukini ko'rsatadi.
mt: This is only a theory — it not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also presents details such as the color of the feathers, which were reddish-brown on top and either white or carotenoid on the underside. The theory also applies to the evolution of feathers in birds. The feathers of dinosaurs had no rachis, a well-defined shaft, but other features — downy and fluffy — suggest that rachis evolved later than other features. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were used for thermoregulation or display, not flight. The researchers say that this young dinosaur's tail shows the feathers of an adult, not a juvenile. The researchers say that this young dinosaur's tail shows the feathers of an adult, not a juvenile.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Birgina tajriba vaksinasi Eboladan o'lish xavfini kamaytira olishga qodir ko'rinsa ham, shu vaqtga qadar mavjud infeksiyani davolash uchun mos keladigan aniq birorta dori vositasi ko'rsatilmagan. Antitanacha kokteyl ZMapp preparati dastlab bu sohada samaradorlik va'da qilgandi, biroq rasmiy tadqiqotlar uning o'limning oldini olish bo'yicha izlanishlarga qaraganda kamroq foyda keltirishini ko'rsatdi. PALM sinovida ZMapp nazorat sifatida xizmat qildi, bu olimlarning undan asos sifatida foydalangani va u bilan boshqa uchta davolash usulini taqqoslaganini anglatadi.
mt: While a single experimental vaccine has shown promise in preventing death from Ebola, no specific drug has yet been shown to cure the infection. The antiviral cocktail ZMapp was initially touted as a breakthrough in this field, but official trials showed it to be less effective than the placebo in preventing death. ZMapp was used as a control in the PALM trial, which means that researchers used it in addition to other three treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Dushanba kuni Stenford Universitetining Tibbiyot maktabi olimlari hujayralarni turlariga qarab saralay oladigan yangi tashxis vositasi ixtirosini e'lon qildi: har biri taxminan bir AQSH senti atrofida bo'lgan standart rangli printerlardan foydalangan holda ishlab chiqarish mumkin bo'lgan ingichka bosma chip. Yetakchi tadqiqotchilarning aytishicha, bu kam daromadli davlatlarda bemorlarning saraton, sil, OIV va bezgakni erta aniqlash imkonini berishi mumkin bo'lib, bunday davlatlarda ko'krak bezi saratoni kabi kasalliklardan omon qolish darajasi boyroq davlatlardagi ko'rsatkichning yarmiga teng.
mt: On Monday, researchers at Stanford University's School of Medicine announced the development of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a standard-sized, inkjet-printed chip that costs about a dollar. The lead researchers say the device could help people in low-income countries detect cancer, HIV, and smallpox early, which could help them survive at rates closer to those in wealthier countries, where breast cancer survival rates are twice as high.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Olimlar yassi qiyaliklar deb ataladigan, oy yuzasi bo'ylab sochilib yotgan, aftidan oyning juda sekinlik bilan kichrayishi natijasida yuzaga kelgan relyef shakllarini topishdi. Mazkur jarliklar butun Oy bo'ylab topilgan va ob-havo ta'sirida minimal darajada yemirilgan, bu ularni yuzaga keltirgan geologik hodisalar anchagina yaqinda bo'lganligini ko'rsatadi. Mazkur nazariya Oyning geologik faoliyatdan to'liq mahrum bo'lganligi to'g'risidagi da'voga zid.
mt: Scientists have discovered that the flat-topped mountains, which are called lunar domes, are the result of the slow shrinking of the Moon's surface. These formations have been found all over the Moon and are minimally eroded by the weather, indicating that the geological events that created them are very recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the Moon is completely geologically inactive.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "O'shandan buyon Adekoya Edinburg Sherif sudida o'g'lini o'ldirganlikda ayblanmoqda. U ayblov xulosasi va sud muhokamasiga qadar hibsda bo'ladi, biroq guvohlarning istalgan dalili yanglish bo'lishi mumkin, chunki uning rasmi keng chop etilgan. Bu Birlashgan Qirollikning boshqa joylarida umumiy amaliyotdir, biroq Shotlandiya adliyasi boshqacha ishlaydi va sudlar fotosuratlarning chop qilinishini ziddiyatli deb qaraydi. Dandi universitet professori Pamela Ferguson qayd etishicha, ""gumon qilinuvchilarning suratlar va boshqalarni chop etayotgan bo'lsa, jurnalistlar chindan ham xavfli yo'lakdan yurayotganga o'xshaydi"". Prokuraturaning umumiy ayblovida bo'lgan Crown Office kamida ayblov xulosasigacha jurnalistlarga boshqa izoh berilmasligini bildirdi."
mt: "Since then Adekoya has been charged with murdering her son in Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She will remain in custody until the verdict and trial, but any evidence from witnesses could be unreliable, as her official mugshot has been widely published. This is common practice in other parts of the United Kingdom, but Scottish courts view the publication of photographs as controversial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of Dundee University said, ""if suspects are having their pictures and other things published, journalists are walking a very dangerous tightrope"". The Crown Office, in its general guidance, said that journalists would not be given any other information until the verdict and trial."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Maydalangan muzga qo'shilib keskin ob-havo sharoiti ham qutqaruv ishlariga xalal bermoqda. Pittman sharoitlar keyingi haftaning ma'lum vaqtigacha o'nglanmasligini taxmin qildi. Pittmanning so'zlariga ko'ra, pakli muzning miqdori hamda qalinligi tyulen ovlovchilar uchun oxirgi 15 yildagi eng yomonidir.
mt: The extreme weather conditions are also hampering rescue efforts. Pittman said the conditions are expected to worsen over the next week. Pittman said the amount and thickness of the ice is the worst in the last 15 years for the trappers.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts abort qilish etikasini ko'rib chiqishda muhim bo'lgan savol — u hayot qachon boshlanadi, deb ishonishi to'g'risida gapirishdan qat'iy bosh tortdi va bunday holatlarning o'ziga xos xususiyatlari haqida fikr bildirish axloqsizlik bo'ladi, dedi. Biroq u o'zining ""Rou Ueytga qarshi"" ""mamlakatning o'rnatilgan qonuni"" ekani haqida aytganlarini takrorlab, Oliy sud qarorlarining izchil bo'lishi muhimligini ta'kidladi. U yana Rouning qarori bog'liq bo'lgan, ko'zda tutilgan dahlsizlik huquqiga ishonishini ham tasdiqladi."
mt: "Roberts said the important question in considering the ethics of abortion is not whether she believes life begins at conception, but that she refused to say so and that it would be wrong to express an opinion on the unique characteristics of such situations. However, she reiterated the country's "established law" on the matter, and emphasized the importance of the Supreme Court's rulings. She also reaffirmed her belief in the right to privacy associated with the ruling."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Aynan soat 8:46 (TO) da, aniqroq aytadigan bo'lsak, birinchi samolyot nishoniga zarba bergan vaqtda butun shahardagi sokinlik buzildi. Ikkita yorug'lik nuri tunda osmondagi nuqta tomon yo'naltirildi. Qurilish maydonida transport markazi va xotira bog'i bilan birgalikda beshta yangi osmono'par bino qurilishi olib borilmoqda.
mt: 8:46 AM (TO) precisely, the first plane hit its target and the entire city was shaken. Two beams of light were aimed at a point in the sky at dawn. A construction site is being built with a transportation center and a memorial park, along with five new skyscrapers.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: """Yetti opa-singillar"" deb ataluvchi g'orga kirish joylarining barchasining diametri kamida 100 dan 250 metrgacha (328 dan 820 futgacha). Infraqizil tasvirlar shuni ko'rsatadiki, kecha-yu kunduz haroratning o'zgarib turishi ularning g'or bo'lishi mumkinligini ko'rsatib turibdi. Ular kunduzi atrofdagi yuzadan sovuqroq, tunda iliqroqdir. ""Ularning issiqlik harakati ko'pincha muayyan haroratni doimiy saqlab turuvchi Yerdagi g'orlarga o'xshab barqaror emas, lekin yerdagi chuqur tuynuklar bilan mos keladi"", dedi AQSH Geologik tadqiqotlar qo'mitasi astrologiya jamoasi va Arizonaning Flagstaff shahrida joylashgan Shimoliy Arizona universiteti vakili Glen Kushing."
mt: "The seven sisters" are named for their resemblance to the Pleiades star cluster. They are all between 100 and 250 meters (328 and 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that their surface temperatures vary throughout the day, suggesting that they may be caves. They are cooler during the day and warmer at night. "Their thermal behavior is not constant like the caves on Earth, but it is similar to the deep pits on Earth," said Glen Cushing, a member of the U.S. Geological Survey's Astrogeology team and a geologist at Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Erkak portlovchi moddalar bilanto'ldirilgan uch g'ildirakli transport vositasini olomon ustiga tomon haydagani gumon qilinmoqda. Bombani portlatganlikda gumon qilingan erkak portlash oqibatida jarohatlar olganidan keyin qo'lga olindi. Hukumat organlari uning uyg'ur etnik guruhi a'zosi ekanini bilsa-da, uning ismi haligacha ularga ma'lum emas.
mt: A man suspected of driving a three-wheeled vehicle loaded with explosives into a crowd is believed to have detonated the bomb. The man was arrested after being injured in the blast. Government officials say he is a member of the Uyghur ethnic group, but his name is still unknown to them.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

Bombani portlatganlikda gumon qilingan erkak portlash oqibatida jarohatlar olganidan keyin qo'lga olindi. Hukumat organlari uning uyg'ur etnik guruhi a'zosi ekanini bilsa-da, uning ismi haligacha ularga ma'lum emas.
mt: A man suspected of driving a three-wheeled vehicle loaded with explosives into a crowd is believed to have detonated the bomb. The man was arrested after being injured in the blast. Government officials say he is a member of the Uyghur ethnic group, but his name is still unknown to them.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: "Janubiy Afrikaning Rustenburg shahrida joylashgan Royal Bafokeng stadionida o'tkazilgan Uch Millat Seriyasi doirasidagi o'yinda Janubiy Afrika All Blacks (Yangi Zelandiya) jamoasini mag'lub etdi. Oxirgi ochko 21 ga 20 ko'rinishdagi bir ballik g'alabani keltirdi va ""All Blacks""ning 15 ta g'alabali o'yinlar seriyasiga barham berdi. Bu Springboks uchun besh o'yindan iborat mag'lubiyatlar seriyasiga yakun yasadi. Bu ikki hafta avval sovrin yutgan ""All Blacks"" jamoasi uchun oxirgi o'yin edi. Turkum musobaqalarning final o'yini kelgusi hafta Yoxannesburgning Ellis Park stadionida bo'lib o'tadi, unda Springbooks Avstraliya bilan bellashadi."
mt: "In the match played at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, the Springboks defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in the Tri Nations Series. The final score was 21-20, and the Springboks ended the All Blacks' 15-game winning streak. The Springboks ended a five-game losing streak. The All Blacks' last game was two weeks ago, when they won the trophy. The final match of the series will be next week at Ellis Park in Johannesburg, where the Springboks will play Australia."
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Kosmik stansiya missiyasida avvalroq giroskopning yo'qolganiga qaramay, stansiya ochiq kosmosga chiqish jarayoni oxiriga qadar o'z yo'nalishini saqlab qoldi. Chiao va Sharipovlarning balandlikni sozlovchi uloqtirish qurilmalaridan xavfsiz masofada ekanligi xabar qilindi. Rossiya yer usti nazorati samolyotlarni faollashtirdi hamda stansiyaning odatdagi munosabati qayta tiklandi.
mt: The space station's orientation remained stable despite the earlier loss of a gyroscope, and the crew of Chiao and Sharipov were reported to be safely out of the range of the high-risk docking mechanisms. Russia's ground control reactivated the station's normal operations.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Ish Virjiniyada olib borildi, chunki u yerda ayblovlarni qo'zg'atgan kompaniya — yetakchi internet provayder AOL joylashgan. Bu ommaviy elektron pochta xabarlarining — spam nomi bilan ham mashhur — foydalanuvchilar pochta qutilariga nomaqbul tarqatilishini cheklash maqsadida 2003-yilda qabul qilingan qonunga tayanib chiqarilgan ilk hukmdir.
mt: The suit was filed in Virginia, where the company that sparked the suit — leading Internet provider AOL — is based. It was the first suit filed under the 2003 law, which was enacted to curb unwanted distribution of electronic mail — spam — to recipients' mailboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28 yoshli Vidal uch mavsum avval Sevilya jamoasidan Barsa jamoasiga kelib qo'shildi. Kataloniya poytaxtiga ko'chib o'tganidan beri Vidal klub uchun 49 ta o'yinda qatnashdi.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barcelona from Sevilla three seasons ago. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: "Jarke o'sha kun avvalida Italiyadagi Koverchanoda mavsumoldi mashg'ulotida mashq qilayotgandi. U ""Boloniya""ga qarshi rejalashtirilgan yakshanba kungi o'yindan oldin jamoa bilan mehmonxonada qolgandi. U yakshanba kuni rejalashtirilgan Boloniyaga qarshi o'yindan oldidan jamoa mehmonxonasida qolayotgandi."
mt: "Jarke was on a preseason training camp in Coverciano, Italy, on the day of the crash. He was scheduled to play in the match against Bologna on Sunday, but was staying with the team at a hotel in Coverciano on Saturday. He was scheduled to play in the match against Bologna on Sunday, but was staying with the team at a hotel in Coverciano on Saturday."

src: Sunami to'g'risida hech qanday ogohlantirish berilmagan hamda Jakarta geofizika agentligiga ko'ra, 6,5 ballik talabga mos kelmaganligi sababli sunami to'g'risida ogohlantirish berilmaydi. Sunami xavfi yo'qligiga qaramay, aholi vahimaga tushdi va o'z uylari va bizneslarini tark eta boshladi.
mt: 6.5 magnitude earthquake was not strong enough to warrant a tsunami warning, according to the Indonesian Geophysics Agency. Despite the lack of a tsunami threat, people panicked and began evacuating their homes and businesses.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Ular Quyosh boshqa yulduzlarga o'xshagan asosiy tamoyillar asosida harakatlanganini aniqlashdi: tizimdagi barcha yulduzlar faolligi ularning yorug'ligi, aylanishidan boshqa hech narsaga bog'liq emasligi aniqlandi. Yorug'lik va aylanish yulduzning plazma oqimi bilan bog'liq bo'lgan Rossbi raqamini aniqlash uchun birgalikda foydalaniladi. Rossbi soni qancha kichik bo'lsa, yulduzning magnetik o'zgarishlarga nisbatan faolligi shuncha past bo'ladi.
mt: They found that all stars in the cluster move in the same way, based on the same basic principles as the Sun: the brightness and rotation of a star are related to its plasma flow, which is measured by the Rossby number. The lower the Rossby number, the less active a star is magnetically.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 2010-yilgi federal saylovga qadar o'tkazilgan so'rovnomalarda qatnashgan 1400 kishidan Avstraliyaning respublika bo'lishiga qarshi chiqqanlar soni 2008-yildan beri 8 foizga oshdi. Vaqtincha Bosh vazir vazifasini bajarayotgan Juliya Gillard 2010-yilgi federal saylovlar kampaniyasi chog'ida Qirolicha Yelizaveta II hukmronligidan keyin Avstraliya respublika bo'lishi kerak, deb hisoblashini aytdi. So'rovnomada ishtirok etganlarning 34 foizi qirolicha Yelizaveta II ning Avstraliyaning oxirgi monarxi bo'lishini xohlagan holda shu fikrni bildirgan. So'rovnomaning eng ko'zga tashlanadigan natijalariga ko'ra, ishtirokchilarning 29 foizi Avstraliya imkon qadar tezroq respublika bo'lishi kerak, 31 foizi esa Avstraliya hech qachon respublika bo'lmasligi kerak deb hisoblaydi.
mt: 1400 people polled in pre-election surveys since the 2010 federal election have been against Australia becoming a republic. Acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic after Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34% of those polled wanted Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. The most notable results of the survey show that 29% of those polled believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believe Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Komen fondi vakili Lesli Aunning so'zlariga ko'ra, tashkilot qonuniy tergov o'tkazilayotgan tashkilotlarning grant yoki pul mablag'lari bilan mukofotlanishini taqiqlaydigan yangi qoidani qabul qilgan. Vakil Kliff Stirns tomonidan Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkiloti mablag'larni qay tarzda sarflashi va bu haqda hisobot berishi yuzasidan olib borilishi kutilayotgan tergov sababli Komen siyosati Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkilotini diskvalifikatsiya qildi. Sterns Uy energiyasi va tijorat qo'mitasi qoshidagi Nazorat va surishtiruvlar quyi qo'mitasining raisi sifatida o'z vazifasida Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik federatsiyasi orqali abortni moliyalashtirish uchun soliqlardan foydalanilayotganligi yoki yo'qligini o'rganmoqda.
mt: A spokesperson for the Susan G. Komen Foundation said the organization has banned grants or funding to organizations involved in legal investigations, citing a new policy that prohibits organizations receiving grants or funding from the organization from being involved in legal investigations. The investigation is being conducted by Cliff Sterns, chairman of the board of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America, who is investigating whether the organization is using tax dollars to fund abortions through the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. Sterns is chairman of the board of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
