src: "Madxya-Pradesh politsiyasi o'g'irlangan noutbuk hamda mobil telefonni qaytardi. ""Shveytsariyalik ayolni zo'rlagan besh kishini hibsga oldik hamda mobil telefoni va noutbukni egasiga qaytardik"", deb aytdi bosh inspektor o'rinbosari D. K. Arya. Ayblanuvchilar Baba Kanjar, Buta Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar hamda Vishnu Kanjar deb atalgan. Politsiya boshlig'i Chandra Shekxar Solanki so'zlariga ko'ra, ayblanuvchi sudga yuzi berkitilgan holda kelgan."
mt: "The Madhya Pradesh police returned a stolen laptop and mobile phone. ""We arrested five men who raped a Swiss woman and returned her mobile phone and laptop"", said Deputy Inspector General D. K. Arya. The accused were named as Baba Kanjar, Buta Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police chief Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused had been brought to court."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: "Avvalroq iqtisodiy tejamkorlik va funksionallik omillari uchun dunyo bo'ylab ishlab chiqarila boshlangan ASUS Eee PC 2007-yili Taypeydagi IT oyligida dolzarb mavzuga aylandi. Biroq ASUS 2007-yilgi ""Tayvan barqarorlik mukofoti"" taqdirlash marosimida Xitoy Respublikasi boshqaruvchisi Yuan tomonidan taqdirlanganidan keyin noutbuk kompyuterlari iste'molchilari bozori nihoyatda xilma-xil bo'ladi va o'zgaradi."
mt: 2007, the ASUS Eee PC was launched worldwide as a cost-effective and functional device. However, after being awarded the "Taiwan Sustainable Development Award" by the President of the Republic of China, Yuan, the market for notebook computers will be very diverse and change.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Bu muammo 1-yanvar kuni o'nlab mahalliy rezidentlarning Obanazava pochta idorasiga an'anaviy va doimiy Yangi yil otkritkalarini olmaganidan shikoyat qilishi bilan boshlandi. Kecha pochta bo'limi mo'ljallangan qabul qiluvchilariga yetkazib berilmagan 600 dan ortiq pochta hujjatlarini, jumladan, 429 ta Yangi Yil otkritkalarini bolakay tomonidan yashirilganligini aniqlaganidan keyin, fuqarolar hamda ommaviy axborot vositalaridan uzr so'radi.
mt: 1 January saw dozens of local residents complain to the Obanazava post office that they had not received their traditional and annual New Year's greetings. The previous evening, the post office discovered that 600 or more letters, including 429 New Year's greetings, had been hidden by a postal worker, and apologized to the public and the media.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Bu muammo 1-yanvar kuni o'nlab mahalliy rezidentlarning Obanazava pochta idorasiga an'anaviy va doimiy Yangi yil otkritkalarini olmaganidan shikoyat qilishi bilan boshlandi. Kecha pochta bo'limi mo'ljallangan qabul qiluvchilariga yetkazib berilmagan 600 dan ortiq pochta hujjatlarini, jumladan, 429 ta Yangi Yil otkritkalarini bolakay tomonidan yashirilganligini aniqlaganidan keyin, fuqarolar hamda ommaviy axborot vositalaridan uzr so'radi.
mt: 1 January saw dozens of local residents complain to the Obanazava post office that they had not received their traditional and annual New Year's greetings. The previous evening, the post office discovered that 600 or more letters, including 429 New Year's greetings, had been hidden by a postal worker, and apologized to the public and the media.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Ikkala erkakning har biri setdagi har bir to'p uzatishni qaytarganidan so'ng, Murrey birinchi setni tay-breykda yutqazdi. Ikkinchi setda Del Potro dastlabki ustunlikka ega edi, biroq hisob 6–6 ga yetgandan keyin tay-brek talab etdi. Potro shu vaqtning o'zida yelkasi uchun muolaja oldi, lekin o'yinga qaytishni uddaladi.
mt: Each man returned the set, Murray lost the first set in tiebreak. In the second set, Del Potro was initially dominant, but the score reached 6–6, and a tiebreak was required. Potro received treatment for a back injury, but finished the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "O'sha mulozimlar hamrohligida u Texas aholisini jamoat xavfsizligini himoyalash chora-tadbirlari ko'rilayotganiga ishontirdi. Perri, xususan: ""Dunyoda bu holatda yuzaga keladigan muammoni munosib qarshi olish uchun yaxshiroq jihozlangan atigi bir nechta joy bor"", — dedi. Shuningdek, ""Bugun ayrim maktab yoshidagi bolalar bemor bilan aloqada bo'lgani aniqlanganidan xabar topdik"", — dedi gubernator. ""Bu masala jiddiy. Tizimimiz zarur darajada ishlayotganiga ishonchingiz komil bo'lsin"", deya davom etdi u."
mt: "Those officials also assured the public that the state was taking appropriate measures to protect public safety. Perry, specifically: ""There are only a few places in the world where this kind of thing can happen and be dealt with appropriately"", he said. Also, ""We learned today that some school children were in contact with a patient"", he said. ""This is serious. We want to be sure that our system is working as it should"", he added."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: """Kunlik shou"" va ""Kolbert hisoboti""dan ancha oldin Xek va Jonson 1988-yili UWda talaba bo'lgan paytlari yangiliklar va xabarlarni parodiya qiladigan nashrni tasavvur qilishgandi. Asos solinganidan beri The Onion bosma nashri, oktyabr oyida 5 000 000 individual tashrif buyuruvchilari, shaxsiy reklamalar, 24 soatlik yangiliklar tarmog'i, podkastlari va yaqinda ishga tushirilgan ""Bizning ahmoqqina dunyomiz"" nomli dunyo atlasi bilan chinakam yangiliklar parodiyasi imperiyasiga aylandi. Al Gor va general Tommi Frenks bexosdan o'zlarining sevimli sarlavhalarini (The Onion nashriga ko'ra, Gor o'zining 2000-yilgi Saylov kollegiyasidagi mag'lubiyatidan keyin u va Tipper hayotlaridagi eng yaxshi jinsiy aloqani qilishni boshlaganliklarini) aytib yuboradi. Ularning ko'pgina yozuvchilari Jon Styuart hamda Stiven Kolbertning yangiliklar parodiyasi shoulariga kuchli ta'sir ko'rsatgan."
mt: 1988, before the Daily Show and the Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had envisioned a news parody publication for UW students. Since its inception, The Onion has become a full-fledged news parody empire with 5 million unique visitors a month, personal ads, 24-hour news network, podcasts, and recently launched "Our Dumb World" a world atlas. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have both admitted to their favorite headlines (according to The Onion, Gore began having the best sex of his life after his 2000 electoral defeat). Many of their writers have been influenced by Jon Stewart's and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Norozilik namoyishi mahalliy vaqt bilan taxminan 11:00 da (UTC+1) Bosh vazirning rasmiy qarorgohi – politsiya qo'riqlaydigan Dauning-stritga kirish ro'parasidagi Uaytxollda boshlandi. Soat 11:00 dan o'tishi bilan namoyishchilar Uaytxolldagi shimol tomonga yo'nalgan transport yo'lini to'sib qo'ydilar. 11:20 da politsiya namoyishchilar norozilik namoyishiga bo'lgan huquqi bilan yo'l harakati tirbandligi muvozanatini saqlashi kerakligini aytib, ulardan trotuarga qaytishini so'radi. Norozilik yurishi 11:29 atrofida Uaytxolldan yuqoriga harakatlanib, Trafalgar tarafga o'tdi hamda Strand bo'ylab Aldvaych va Kingsvay orqali konservatorlar partiyasi Grand Connaught Rooms mehmonxonasida o'zlarining bahorgi forumini o'tkazayotgan Xolborn tomon yo'naldi.
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC+1) a protest march began outside the official residence of the Prime Minister, Downing Street, which is guarded by police. At 11:20 the police asked the protesters to return to the road, as they were obstructing traffic. At 11:29 the march moved up from Whitehall, towards Trafalgar Square, and along the Strand, through Aldwych and Kingsway to the Royal Horticultural Society's Spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel in Holborn.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """Hozir bizda diabetik bo'lishi kerak bo'lgan, diabetik bo'lmagan 4 oylik sichqon mavjud"", deb qo'shib qo'ydi u. Yangi Shotlandiyaning Galifaks shahridagi Dalxauzi universiteti tibbiyot professori hamda Kanada diabet birlashmasining klinik va ilmiy bo'limi raisi doktor Ehud Ur tadqiqot hali o'zining boshlang'ich davrida ekani haqida ogohlantirdi. Ayrim boshqa mutaxassislar kabi, u diabetni davolash mumkinligiga shubha bilan qaraydi hamda mazkur xulosalar allaqachon 1-toifa diabetga chalingan kishilarga aloqador emasligini qayd etadi."
mt: """We now have a 4-month-old mouse that is diabetic, but not diabetic," he added. New Scotland's Dalhousie University medical professor and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical and scientific division, Dr. Ehud Ur, says the study is still in its early stages. Like some other experts, he doubts diabetes can be cured and notes the findings are not related to Type 1 diabetes in humans."""
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter kecha Kokodada PNG Parvoz CG4684 samolyoti sifatida qo'nishga urinayotgandi, biroq avvalroq bir marta bekor qilingan edi. Ikkinchi yaqinlashishidan keyin qo'nishi kerak bo'lgan vaqtdan taxminan o'n daqiqa avval u yo'qolib qolgan. Halokat joyi bugun aniqlandi va u yerga kirish shu qadar imkonsizki, ikkita politsiyachi omon qolganlarni izlash va voqea joyini ko'zdan kechirish uchun changalzorga tushirildi. Qidiruvga bekor qilingan qo'nishga sabab bo'lgan aynan shu ob-havo xalaqit bergan.
mt: A Twin Otter aircraft, registered as CG4684, was attempting to land at Kokoda as CG4684, but had been aborted once before. The second approach was aborted about ten minutes before the scheduled landing time. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessible that two police officers were lowered by rope to search for survivors and to inspect the crash site. The search was called off when the weather conditions made it impossible.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "Yaxshiki, menga hech narsa bo'lmadi, biroq kishilar tashqariga chiqish uchun derazalarni sindirishga urinayotganliklari sababli men dahshatli manzaraga guvoh bo'ldim. Odamlar oynalarni stullar bilan urishardi, biroq derazalar sinmas edi. ""Nihoyat oynalardan biri sindi va ular oyna orqali tashqariga chiqa boshladilar"", dedi omon qolgan Fransishek Koval."
mt: "I'm glad nothing happened to me, but I saw people trying to break windows to get out. People were trying to break windows with chairs, but the windows wouldn't break. ""Finally one window broke and they started to get out through the window"", said Franciszek Kowal who survived.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: 2010-yilgi Atlantika bo'ronlari mavsumining nom berilgan to'rtinchi dovuli — Deniel tropik bo'roni sharqiy Atlantika okeanida vujudga kelgan. Floridadagi Mayami shahridan taxminan 3000 mil uzoqlikdagi bo'ronning maksimal barqaror tezligi 40 mil/soat (64 km/s) ga teng. To'fonlarni o'rganish milliy markazi olimlari Daniel chorshanbaga borib to'fonga aylanishini bashorat qilmoqdalar. Bo'ron quruqlikdan uzoq bo'lgani tufayli, AQSH yoki Karib dengiziga ehtimoliy ta'sirini baholash mushkul bo'lib qolmoqda.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season's fourth named storm, Tropical Storm Daniel, formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean, about 3,000 miles east of Miami, Florida. The storm's maximum sustained wind speed was 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center scientists predict Daniel will become a hurricane on Wednesday. The storm is too far out to sea to have any potential impact on the U.S. or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Doktor Li ayni damda Turkiyada bolalar xastalanmasdan A (H5N1) parranda grippi virusini yuqtirayotganligi to'g'risidagi xabarlardan xavotrilanayotganini ham aytdi. Ba'zi tadqiqotlar kasallik global epidemiyani keltirib chiqarishidan oldin uning o'lim darajasi pastroq bo'lishi kerakligini ko'rsatadi, deb qayd etdi u. Gripp belgilari yengilligicha qolsa, bemorlar kundalik yumushlarini bajarish orqali ko'proq insonlarga infeksiyani yuqtirishda davom etishlari mumkin, degan xavotir bor.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports of children in Turkey contracting the A (H5N1) avian flu virus without symptoms. Some studies suggest that the virus's mortality rate is lower than previously thought, he noted. Even if the symptoms are mild, patients could continue to spread the infection to more people through everyday activities, he said.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 9-avgust tunida Morakot ko'zi Xitoyning Futzyan provinsiyasidan taxminan yetmish kilometr masofada edi. To'fon Xitoy tarafga taxminan 11 km/soat tezlikda harakatlanmoqda.
mt: 9 August, Morakot was about 60 miles from Fuzhou, Fujian province, China, moving at about 11 km/hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: AQSH Prezidenti Jorj V. Bush, Osiyo bo'ylab bir haftalik sayohatini boshlab, 16-noyabr kuni tongda Singapurga yetib keldi. U Singapur Bosh vazirining muovini Vong Kan Seng tomonidan kutib olindi hamda Singapur Bosh Vaziri Li Syan Lun bilan savdo-sotiq va terrorizm masalalarini muhokama qildi. Oraliq saylovlardagi bir haftalik yo'qotishlardan keyin, Bush ommaga Osiyoda savdo-sotiqning kengayishi to'g'risida so'zlab berdi.
mt: 16 November 2002: US President George W. Bush began a week-long tour of Asia, arriving in Singapore at 8:00 am local time. He was greeted by Singapore's Foreign Minister, Wong Kan Seng, and held talks with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on trade and terrorism. Following a week of poor election results, Bush told the press that trade in Asia was expanding.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: AQSH Prezidenti Jorj V. Bush, Osiyo bo'ylab bir haftalik sayohatini boshlab, 16-noyabr kuni tongda Singapurga yetib keldi. U Singapur Bosh vazirining muovini Vong Kan Seng tomonidan kutib olindi hamda Singapur Bosh Vaziri Li Syan Lun bilan savdo-sotiq va terrorizm masalalarini muhokama qildi. Oraliq saylovlardagi bir haftalik yo'qotishlardan keyin, Bush ommaga Osiyoda savdo-sotiqning kengayishi to'g'risida so'zlab berdi.
mt: 16 November 2002: US President George W. Bush began a week-long tour of Asia, arriving in Singapore at 8:00 am local time. He was greeted by Singapore's Foreign Minister, Wong Kan Seng, and held talks with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on trade and terrorism. Following a week of poor election results, Bush told the press that trade in Asia was expanding.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Bugungi e'lon hukumatning joriy yilning martida berilgan qo'shimcha vagonlarni moliyalashtirish majburiyatlarini ham kengaytirdi. Qo'shimcha 300 tadan keyin jami vagonlar 1300 taga yetib, tirbandlikni kamaytiririshga erishiladi.
mt: Today's announcement also expands the government's commitment to fund additional wagons this year. After an additional 300 wagons, the total will reach 1300, reducing congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "U: ""Hujumning yaqin-orada kutilishini taxmin qilish uchun hech qanday razvedka ma'lumotlari yo'q"", dedi. ""Lekin tahdid darajasini keskin tushirish umumiy tahdidning yo'qolganini anglatmaydi""."
mt: "U: ""There was no intelligence to suggest an attack was imminent"", he said. ""But the lowering of the threat level does not mean the threat has gone away""."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Kecha Martelli to'qqiz nafar a'zodan tarkib topgan yangi Muvaqqat saylov kengashi (CEP) oldida qasamyod keltirdi. Bu Martellining to'rt yil ichidagi beshinchi CEPidir. O'tgan oy prezident komissiyasi davlatni yangi saylovlar sari yo'naltirishga mo'ljallangan bir qancha chora-tadbirlar doirasida oldingi CEPning iste'foga chiqishini tavsiya qildi. Oktyabrda boshlangan rejimga qarshi keng qamrovli norozilik namoyishlariga Martelli komissiya bilan javob qaytardi. Ba'zi hollarda kuchli norozilik namoyishlari ayrimlari 2011-yildan beri o'tkazilishi kerak bo'lgan saylovlarning o'tkazilmaganligi tufayli yuz berdi.
mt: Martelli took the oath before a new nine-member temporary electoral commission (CEP) yesterday. This is the fifth CEP in Martelli's four-year tenure. Last month, the presidential commission recommended the previous CEP's resignation as part of a series of measures aimed at preparing the country for upcoming elections, which have been delayed since 2011. Martelli responded to the commission with some protests, which in some cases turned violent due to the elections' non-occurrence.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: AQSH Gimnastika qo'mitasi Qo'shma Shtatlar Olimpiya Qo'mitasining maktubini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda bizning hamma atletlarimiz uchun xavfsiz muhitni ta'minlash maqsadida Olimpiya oilasining mutlaq ehtiyojlarini qabul qiladi. Biz USOCning sportchilarimiz va klublarimiz hamda ularning sporti manfaatlarini sertifikatdan mahrum qilishdan koʻra, tashkilotimiz ichida jiddiy oʻzgarishlar qilish orqali olgʻa siljish yaxshiroq taʼminlashi mumkin, degan fikriga qoʻshilamiz. AQSH gimnastika federatsiyasi Larri Nassar qurbonlari tomonidan shu qadar jasurlarcha tasvirlangan darajadagi jinoyat qanday qilib shuncha payt aniqlanmay davom etganiga oydinlik kiritadigan mustaqil tekshiruvni qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda har qanday zaruriy va tegishli o'zgarishlarni qabul qiladi. AQSH Gimnastika va USOC bir maqsadga ega — gimnastika va sport turini hamda boshqalarni atletlarning o'z orzulariga xavfsiz, ijobiy hamda vakolatli muhitda erishishlari uchun imkon qadar xavfsiz qilish.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee to our athletes, clubs and the gymnastics community that we will do everything in our power to ensure a safe environment for our athletes. The USAG supports the independent investigation into the allegations of Larry Nassar's crimes that have been so publicly detailed and the necessary and appropriate changes that will be made. The USAG and USOC share the same goal: to ensure the safety of our athletes and the sport of gymnastics and others to achieve their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "AQSH harbiy-dengiz floti ham mazkur voqea bo'yicha surishtiruv ishlari olib borilayotganini bildirdi. Ular bayonotda yana ""Ekipaj ayni damda kemani xavfsiz tarzda chiqarib olishning eng yaxshi usulini aniqlash ustida ish olib bormoqda"", dedi. Evenjer tipidagi minalarga qarshi kurashish kemasi Palava shahridagi Puerto Prince tomonga ketayotgan kema edi. U AQSHning yettichi flotiga tayinlangan hamda Yaponiyadagi Nagasaki prefekturasining Sasebo shahrida joylashgan."
mt: "The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, it said the ship was "currently working to safely remove the crew from the ship" and "is working to determine the best way to remove the crew from the ship safely." The mine countermeasures ship Palau was headed to Puerto Princesa, Philippines, from Sasebo, Japan, where it is homeported."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Yakshanba oqshomida AQSH prezidenti Donald Tramp matbuot kotibi orqali bergan bayonotida AQSH qo'shinlari Suriyadan chiqib ketishini e'lon qildi. Tramp Turkiya prezidenti Rajab Toyyib Erdo'g'an bilan telefonda gaplashganidan keyin bu haqida ma'lum qilindi. Bayonotda qayd etilishicha, Turkiya, shunigdek, Yevropa davlatlari yurtiga qaytarishdan bosh tortgan ISHID jangarilarini qo'riqlashni o'z zimmasiga oladi.
mt: On Friday afternoon, U.S. President Donald Trump announced that U.S. troops would be leaving Syria in a statement released through his press secretary. Trump had spoken with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan over the phone. The statement said that Turkey would take over the protection of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant fighters from Europe, who had refused to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalitsiya hamda afg'on qo'shinlari mazkur joyni himoya qilish uchun bu hududga ko'chib o'tishdi hamda koalitsiyaning boshqa samolyotlari yordam berish uchun yuborildi. Halokat tog'li hududning baland qismida sodir bo'lgan va dushmanlarning o't ochishi natijasida kelib chiqqan deb ishonilmoqda. Halokat sodir bo'lgan joyni qidirish harakatlari yomon ob-havo hamda qattiq yer sharoitlariga duch kelmoqda.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces moved to defend the area and other coalition aircraft were dispatched to assist. The crash is believed to have been caused by enemy fire in the mountainous area. Search efforts are hampered by bad weather and rough terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: 1963-yili to'g'on qurilganidan keyin butun daryo bo'ylab cho'kindilarni tarqatuvchi mavsumiy suv toshqinlar to'xtadi. Mazkur loyqa yovvoyi tabiat uchun yashash joyi sifatida xizmat qiluvchi qumloqlar va sohillarning hosil bo'lishi uchun zarur edi. Natijada, ikki baliq turi yo'q bo'lib ketdi hamda yana boshqa ikkitasi, jumladan, bukri baliq turi ham yo'qolish xavfi ostida qolgan. Garchi suv toshqinidan keyin suv sathi atigi bir necha fut ko'tarilsa-da, rasmiylar yemirilgan qumtepalarni qayta tiklash uchun yetarli bo'ladi, deb umid qilmoqdalar.
mt: 1963, after the dam was built, the seasonal floods stopped. This was necessary for the formation of sandbars and beaches as habitats for wildlife. As a result, two fish species went extinct and two others, including the sturgeon, are at risk of extinction. Although the water level rose only a few feet after the flood, officials hope that the destroyed sandbars will be restored enough.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Keniya, Nayrobi shahridagi AQSH elchixonasi ""Somalidan kelgan ekstremistlar"" Keniya hamda Efiopiyada xudkushlik hamlalarini uyushtirishni reja qilayotgani haqida ogohlantirdi. AQSH Efiopiya va Keniyada ""mashhur diqqatga sazovor joylarni"" portlatish uchun xudkush terrorchilardan foydalanganligi to'g'risida oshkor etilmagan manbadan axborot olganligini ta'kidlamoqda."
mt: "The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, warns of "extremists from Somalia" planning attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States says it has received information from an undisclosed source that "popular tourist destinations" in Ethiopia and Kenya have been targeted by suicide terrorists."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Mashhur grek advokatlari Sakis Kechagioglou hamda Jorj Nikolakopuloslar poraxo'rlik hamda korrupsiyada aydbor deb topilgani sababli Afinadagi Korydallus qamoqxonasiga qamald. Buning natijasida sudyalar, huquqshunoslar, advokatlar va yuristlar tomonidan avvalgi yillarda qilingan noqonuniy harakatlarning ochilib qolinishi tufayli grek huquqiy hamjamiyati doirasida katta janjal ko'tarildi. Bir necha hafta avval, jurnalist Makis Triantafillopulos Alfa telekanalidagi o'zining ""Zoungla"" ko'rsatuvida e'lon qilgan ma'lumotdan keyin, parlament a'zosi hamda huquqshunos Petros Mantuvalos idorasi xodimlarining noqonuniy pora va korrupsiya bilan shug'ullanganligi sababli lavozimidan ozod etildi. Bundan tashqari, eng yaxshi sudya Evengelos Kalousis xulqi buzilganlikda va korrupsiyaga aloqadorlikda aybdor deb topilganligi sababli qamoqqa tashlanadi."
mt: "Famous Greek lawyers Saki Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopulos were arrested on charges of bribery and corruption. This led to a major dispute in the Greek legal community, as a result of the discovery of illegal activities carried out by judges, lawyers, and legal professionals in previous years. A few weeks ago, journalist Makis Triantafillopulos announced on his show "Zoungla" on the Alpha television channel that parliament member and lawyer Petros Mantuvalos was dismissed from his position due to his involvement in illegal bribery and corruption. In addition, the best judge, Evangelos Kalousis, was arrested on charges of misconduct and involvement in corruption."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Utappa 11 ta to'rtlik va 2 ta oltilikni urgan holda atigi 41 ta to'pda 70 ta ranlardan iborat to'p uzatishlarda eng yuqori balni qayd etdi. o'rta zveno betsmenlari Sachin Tendulkar va Rahul Dravid yaxshi o'yin ko'rsatdi va birgalikda yuz ran to'plagan sheriklarga aylandi. Biroq sardor viketini yo'qotganidan keyin, Hindiston uzatmalarni yakunlash uchun 7 ta viket yo'qotishlar bilan faqatgina 36 ta ranni amalga oshirdi.
mt: 11 fours and 2 sixes by Robin Utappa, who scored the highest score of 70 runs off 41 balls in a 70-run partnership with Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, who both scored 20 runs each. However, after losing the captaincy, India lost 7 wickets to end the innings at 36 runs.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Parlamentning quyi palatasi ma'muri Adam Kuerden o'tgan oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida o'chirishlardan ranjiganini aytdi. ""U [Uels] boshidanoq bizga yolg'on gapirgan. Birinchidan, buning huquqiy sabablar tufayli bo'lganligi kabi harakat qilish orqali. Ikkinchidan, to o'zining mohirona yo'qolishigacha o'zini bizni tinglayotgandek qilib ko'rsatish orqali"". Jamiyat g'azablanishi millionlab ochiq litsenziyali media joylashtirilgan sayt uchun jinsiy kontentga oid siyosat loyihasini tayyorlash bo'yicha joriy harakatlarga olib keldi."
mt: "The lower house of Parliament's speaker Adam Kuerden said he was hurt by Wales' actions last month. ""He [Wales] lied to us from the beginning. First, by taking action based on legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us until he disappeared"". The community was angered by the proposal to create a policy for open-licensed media sites for sexual content."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Hamma ham ayollarning razryadlari qo'shilishini qo'llab-quvvatlayvermas edi. 2004-yilgi Olimpiadadagi kumush medal sovrindori Amir Xon: ""Chin qalbimdan aytadigan bo'lsam, ayollar urushmasliklari kerak. Bu mening fikrim"", dedi. O'zining sharhlariga qaramasdan u Londonda o'tkaziladigan 2012-yilgi Olimpiadada Britaniyalik raqiblarini qo'llab-quvvatlashini aytdi."
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan: "If I were to speak from my heart, women should not fight. This is my opinion," he said. He added that he would support British rivals at the 2012 London Olympics.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: 13 yoshli mototsikl haydovchisi Piter Lens Indianapolis Motor Sidveyda avtohalokatga uchrab, vafot etdi. Tayyorgarlik mashqini olib borayotgan vaqtida, Lenz velosipeddan yiqilib tushdi va keyin hamkasbi Xaver Zayat uni urib yubordi. Unga zudlik bilan tez tibbiy yordam xodimlari tomonidan yordam ko'rsatlib, mahalliy shifoxonaga yetkazildi va u keyinchalik o'sha yerda vafot etdi. Zayat baxtsiz hodisada jarohat olmadi.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lens died in a car accident in Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While performing a training exercise, Lens fell off his bicycle and was then hit by his teammate Xavier Zayat. He was rushed to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the incident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Samolyotda safar qilish barcha yoshdagi va kelib chiqishdagi kishilar uchun qo'rqinchli tajriba bo'lishi mumkin, ayniqsa, ular oldin parvoz qilmagan yoki ruhiy shikast qoldirgan hodisani boshdan kechirgan bo'lsa. Bu uyaladigan narsa emas: bu juda ko'p odamlarda bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan boshqa narsalarni yoqtirmaslik va shaxsiy qo'rquvlaridan bo'lak narsa emas. Ba'zilar uchun samolyotning qanday ishlashi va uchish vaqtida nimalar bo'lishi haqida ayrim narsalarni tushinish noma'lum nazorat ostida bo'lish yoki bo'lmaslikdan kelib chiquvchi qo'rquvni yengishga yordam beradi.
mt: Flying can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they have never flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. This is not a phobia: it is a fear of things that can happen to many people, not a fear of unknown things. For some people, knowing how an airplane works and what happens during flight can help overcome fears of unknown controls or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Hozirgi kunda havo safarlari dastlab narxlarni izlamasdan va taqqoslamasdan turib, faqat kamdan-kam hollardagina bevosita aviakompaniya orqali bron qilinadi. Ba'zi hollarda bitta reys turli agregatorlarda katta farq bilan turlicha narxlarga ega bo'lishi mumkin hamda qidiruv natijalarini solishtirish va chipta buyurtirishdan avval aviakompaniyaning veb-saytini ham ko'rib chiqish foydalidir.
mt: Today, air travel is usually done without comparing prices or searching for the best deal, and only in rare cases is it done directly through an airline. It is useful to compare the results of a search and check the airline's website before buying a ticket.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Narsalarni tez yetkazib berish uchun kuryerlik kompaniyalariga yaxshi haq to'lanadi. Odatdagidek, vaqt biznes hujjatlari, tovarlar yoki tezkor ta'mirlash uchun ehtiyot qismlari bilan juda muhimdir. Ayrim yo'nalishlarda yirikroq kompaniyalar o'z samolyotlariga ega, ammo boshqa yo'nalishlar va kichik firmalar uchun muammo mavjud edi. Agar yuklarni havo transporti orqali yuborgan bo'lsalar, ayrim yo'nalishlarda yukni tushirish va bojxona jarayoni uchun bir necha kun vaqt talab qilinishi mumkin. Buni tezroq bitirishning yagona yo'li — uni tekshirilgan yuk sifatida yuborishdir. Aviakompaniya qoidalari ularga yo'lovchisiz yuklarni jo'natishga ruxsat bermaydi, shu yerda siz kirib borasiz.
mt: Courier companies are paid well for speedy delivery. As usual, time is of the essence for business documents, goods, or urgent parts. Larger companies in some areas have their own planes, but smaller companies and other areas have a problem. If you ship your goods by air, it can take several days to unload and clear customs in some areas. The only way to speed this up is to ship it as inspected cargo. Airlines do not allow you to ship cargo without passengers, here you will not get in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Siz ittifoqdan aviakompaniyaning bonusli dasturini ehtiyotkorlik bilan tanlashingiz kerak. o'zingiz eng ko'p parvoz qiladigan aviakompaniyaga qo'shilish intuitiv deb o'ylashingiz mumkin bo'lsa-da, taklif etiladigan imtiyozlar ko'pincha turli xil bo'lishi va tez-tez uchuvchi yo'lovchi ballari bitta ittifoqdagi boshqa aviakompaniyada saxiyroq bo'lishi mumkinligini bilishingiz kerak.
mt: You should be careful when choosing an airline's bonus program. While it may be intuitive to join the airline you fly most often, the perks offered can vary widely and frequent flyer miles can be worth more in one alliance than another.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Alkogolli ichimliklarni me'yorida iching. Alkogol turli odamlarga turlicha ta'sir qiladi va me'yoringizni bilish juda muhimdir. Haddan ortiq ichkilikbozlik tufayli yuzaga keladigan sog'liqqa oid uzoq muddatli oqibatlar jigarning shikastlanishi va hatto ko'rlik va o'limni ham o'z ichiga olishi mumkin. Noqonuniy ishlab chiqarilgan spirtli ichimliklar iste'mol qilinganda, ehtimoliy xavf ortadi. Noqonuniy spirtli ichimliklar xavfli aralashmalar, jumladan, hatto kichik dozasi ham ko'rlikka yoki o'limga sabab bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan metanolni o'z ichiga oladi.
mt: Drinking alcoholic beverages in moderation. Alcohol affects people differently and knowing your limits is important. Excessive drinking can lead to long-term health consequences such as damage to the nerves and even blindness and death. Bootleg alcohol is more dangerous because it may contain harmful additives, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Kanal okrugi (gollandcha: Grachtengordel) — Amsterdamning Binnestadini o'rab turuvchi 17-asrning mashhur okrugidir. Butun tuman o'zining yagona madaniy hamda tarixiy qiymati uchun YUNESKOning Butunjahon madaniy merosi ro'yxatiga kiritilgan bo'lib, uning mulkiy qiymati mamlakatning eng yuqorilaridan biridir.
mt: 17th century Grachtengordel is a famous canal ring surrounding the inner city of Amsterdam. The entire district is listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List for its unique cultural and historical value, and its real estate value is among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Pnon Krom Siem Reapdan 12 km janubi-g'arbda. Mazkur tepalikdagi ibodatxona 9-asr oxirida, qirol Yasovorman davrida qurilgan. Ibodatxonaning g'amgin muhiti va Tonlesap ko'li manzarasi tepalikka chiqishga arziydi. Mazkur manzilga tashrif ko'lga qayiqdagi safar bilan qulay ravishda umumlashtirilishi mumkin. Ibodatxonaga kirish uchun Angkor chiptasi kerak, shu sababli Tonlesapga borishda pasportingizni o'zingiz bilan olib kelishni unutmang.
mt: 12 km south-west of Siem Reap, Ponheas Prasat is a temple on a hilltop built in the late 9th century during the reign of King Yasovarman. The temple's sombre atmosphere and views over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb worthwhile. The site can be reached by boat from the lake. Entry to the temple requires an Angkor pass, so don't forget your passport when visiting the lake.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktika Yer yuzasidagi eng sovuq joy hisoblanadi va Janubiy Qutbni o'rab turadi. Sayohatchilarning tashrifi qimmatga tushadi, jismoniy chidamlilikni talab etiladi, faqat yozgi noyabr-fevral oylarida amalga oshishi mumkin hamda asosan yarimorol, orollar va Ross dengizi bilan cheklanadi. Yozda asosan o'sha hududlardagi qirq sakkiztacha bazada bir necha ming xodim yashaydi; kamchiligi qish bo'yi qoladi. Ichki Antarktida — bu 2–3 kilometrlik muz bilan qoplangan tashlandiq platodir. Tasodifiy mutaxassislarning havo orqali sayohatlari alpinizm bilan shug'ullanish yoki katta bazaga ega bo'lgan Qutbga yetib borish uchun materik ichiga kirib boradi.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth and surrounds the South Pole. Visiting is expensive, requires physical endurance, is only possible during the summer months of November to February and is mostly limited to the Antarctic Peninsula, islands and Ross Sea. During the summer, about two thousand people live in about eighteen bases in those areas; the rest of the year is spent in hibernation. Inner Antartica is a barren plateau covered in two to three meters of ice. Unintentional experts fly in for alpinism or to reach the Pole with a large base in the continent's interior.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Hozirga qadar saqlangan rasadxonalardan odatda bugungi kunda foydalanilmaydi va muzeylar yoxud ta'lim maskanlari sifatida saqlanib qolmoqda. Ularning gullab-yashnagan davrida yengil ifloslanish bugungidek muammo hisoblanmagani tufayli ular odatda shaharlarda yoki kampuslarda joylashgan bo'lib, ularga yetib borish hozirgi davrda qurilganlaridan ko'ra osonroq. Zamonaviy tadqiqot teleskoplarining ko'pchiligi qulay atmosfera sharoitlariga ega chekka joylarda joylashgan katta inshootlardir.
mt: Today, preserved telescopes are usually not used and are kept as museums or educational sites. In their heyday, they were lightly polluted, so they were usually located in cities or campuses, which are easier to reach than those built today. Most modern research telescopes are large buildings located in areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Oklend ikkita portni aylanib o'tgani sababli ko'p sonli plyajlarga ega. Eng mashhurlari uchta hududda joylashgan. (Shimoliy Xarbor tumanidagi) Shimoliy Qirg'oq plyajlari Tinch Okeanida joylashgan bo'lib, shimoldagi Long ko'rfazidan janubdagi Devenportgacha cho'zilgan. Ular cho'milish xavfsiz bo'lgan deyarli to'laligicha qumli plyajlardir va aksariyatida pohutukava daraxtlarining soyasi tushib turadi. Tamaki Drayv plyajlari Markaziy Oklenddagi Mishshion-Bey hamda Sent-Heliers shaharlarining nufuzli chekkalaridagi Waitemata portida joylashgan. Bular ba'zida tiqilinch bo'ladigan, sohil bo'ylab tizilgan qator do'konlari bor oilaviy plyajlardir. Cho'milish xavfsiz.
mt: Auckland has two harbours, and is blessed with many beaches. The most popular are spread over three areas. (North Shore) North Shore beaches are on the Tasman Sea, stretching from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are mostly safe, low-tide sandy beaches, and most are backed by pohutukawa trees.  Mission Bay beaches are in Central Auckland, on the Waitemata Harbour, between Mission Bay and St Heliers. These are sometimes crowded, family-friendly beaches with shops along the foreshore.  Safe, low-tide sandy beaches.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Shuni yodda tutungki, siz asosan qabriston va hamda dunyo aholisining katta qismi uchun deyarli bebaho ahamiyatga ega bo'lgan joyga tashrif buyurmoqdasiz. Bu yerda hanuzgacha o'zlarining davrida omon qolgan yahudiylar ham, yahudiy bo'lmaganlar ham birdek bo'lgan ko'plab erkak va ayollar bor va yaqinlari bo'lgan yana ko'plab kishilar u yerda o'ldirilgan yoki o'lguniga qadar ishlatilgan. Iltimos, bu joyga u loyiq bo'lgan sharaf, jiddiylik va hurmat bilan munosabatda bo'ling. Xolokast yoki fashistlar haqida hazil qilmang. Inshootlarga chizish yoki qirib grafiti tushirish orqali joyning ko'rkini buzmang.
mt: 1. Please remember that you are visiting a cemetery and a place where the majority of the world's population is buried. There are still Jews and non-Jews buried there, as well as many other people who were killed or used until they died. Please treat this place with the respect, seriousness, and dignity it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not vandalize the buildings or spray graffiti on the structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Yordamchi tillar boshqa holda aloqa qilishga qiynaluvchi odamlar o'rtasidagi aloqani osonlashtirish maqsadida sun'iy yaratilgan yoki tuzilgan tillardir. Ular u yoki bu sabab bilan boshqa tillarda gaplashuvchilar o'rtasidagi aloqa vositasi sifatida dominantga aylangan tabiiy yoki organik tillar bo'lgan umumiy tillardan alohidadir.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or engineered languages designed to facilitate communication between people who have difficulty communicating in other languages. They are distinct from natural or organic languages that have become dominant as common languages between groups of people who speak different languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Agar Shimoliy Boltiqni qishda kesib o'tadigan bo'lsangiz, kabina joylashuviga ahamiyat bering, chunki muz oralab o'tish o'ta dahshatli shovqinni keltirib chiqaradi va u ba'zilarga ta'sir qilishi mumkin. Sankt-Peterburg dengiz sayohatlari shaharda vaqt o'tkazishni o'z ichiga oladi. Dengiz sayohati ishtirokchilari visa olish talablaridan ozod qilinadi (shartlarga qarang).
mt: If you are traveling through the Baltic Sea in winter, pay attention to the location of the cabin, as driving through snow can be very scary and may affect some people. St. Petersburg includes sea trips to spend time in the city. Sea trip participants are exempt from visa requirements (see conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Barselonaning rasmiy tillari katalan hamda ispan tillaridir. Taxminan yarm aholi katalan tilida so'zlashishni afzal ko'radi, ko'pchiligi uni tushunadi hamda deyarli hamma ispan tilini biladi. Ammo belgilarning aksariyati faqatgina katalonchada bo'ladi, chunki u qonunan birinchi rasmiy til sifatida belgilangan. Biroq ispan tili ham jamoat transporti va boshqa muassasalarda keng qo'llaniladi. Metroda odatiy e'lonlar faqat katalan tilida aytiladi, biroq rejalashtirilmagan uzilishlar avtomatlashtirilgan tizim yordamida ko'plab tillarda, jumladan, ispan, ingliz, fransuz, arab va yapon tillarida e'lon qilinadi.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half the population prefers to speak Catalan, most understand it and almost everyone speaks Spanish. But most signs are only in Catalan, as it is the language designated by law as the first official language. But Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other institutions. Announcements in the metro are usually only in Catalan, but unplanned delays are announced in many languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Hozirda rivojlangan davlatlarda lyuks to'shak hamda nonushta bilan ta'minlash san'at darajasiga yetgan. Alal-oqibat, B&B lar asosan ikki asosiy narsa: yotoq va nonushta orqali raqobatlasha oladi. Mos ravishda, eng yaxshi shunday muassasalarda eng serhasham ko'rpa-to'shaklarni, ehtimol, qo'lda ishlangan choyshab yoki antiqa yotoqni topish mumkin. Nonushta mintaqaning mavsumiy lazzatli shirinliklarini yoxud mezbonning maxsus ovqatini o'z ichiga olishi mumkin. Bu joy antiqa jihozlar, tekislangan maydonlar va suzish havzasiga ega tarixiy eski bino bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: In developed countries, breakfast and bed and breakfast are art forms. Accordingly, the best B&Bs compete on the basis of the best beds and breakfasts. It is possible to find the most exquisite bed and breakfasts in the region in a historic old building with antique furniture, flat lawns and swimming pools.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Xotiyning Pekin shahri 2022-yildagi Qishki olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qiladi, bu esa uni ham yozgi, ham qishki Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgan birinchi shaharga aylantiradi. Pekin ochilish va yopilish marosimlari va usti yopiq arenalardagi muz ustidagi musobaqalarga mezbonlik qiladi. Boshqa chang'i tadbirlari Pekindan taxminan 220 km (140 mil) uzoqlikdagi Zangjiakouda joylashgan Taizicheng chang'i hududida bo'lib o'tadi.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be hosted by Beijing, making it the first city to host both Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and ice events in indoor arenas. Other skiing events will be held in the ski area of Taizicheng, located about 220 km (140 mi) away from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Qush grippi yoxud rasmiyroq aytganda, parranda grippi qushlarga ham, sutemizuvchilarga ham zararlashi mumkin. Insonlarda mingdan kamroq holat qayd etilgan, lekin ularning ayrimlari o'limga sabab bo'lgan. Aksariyati parrandachilik bilan shug'ullanuvchi kishilar bilan bog'liq bo'lgan, biroq qushlarni kuzatuvchilar uchun ham ayrim xavflar mavjud.
mt: Avian influenza, or more formally avian influenza, can affect both birds and mammals, including humans. Fewer than 100 human cases have been reported, but some have been fatal. Most have been associated with people involved in poultry, but some risks are also present for birdwatchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikinglar Qora dengiz va Kaspiy dengiziga borish uchun Rossiya suv yo'llaridan foydalangan. Mazkur yo'nalishlarning qismlaridan hali ham foydalanish mumkin. Qo'lga kiritish qiyin kechishi mumkin bo'lgan maxsus ruxsatnomalarni olish zarurati bor yoki yo'qligini tekshiring. Oq dengiz-Boltiq kanali Shimoliy muz okeanini Boltiq dengiziga, Onega ko'li, Ladoga ko'li va Sankt-Peterburg orqali asosan daryo hamda ko'llar bilan bog'lab turadi. Onega ko'li, shuningdek, Volgaga ulangan, shu sababli hazungacha Kaspiy dengizidan Rossiya orqali o'tishning imkoni bor.
mt: Viking ships used the Black Sea and Caspian Sea to reach the Baltic Sea. Parts of these routes are still in use. Check if you need special permits to enter difficult to navigate areas. The White Sea connects the Barents Sea to the Baltic Sea via the Northern Dvina, Onega, Ladoga and Sankt-Peterburg, mostly through rivers and lakes. Onega is also connected to the Volga, so it is possible to reach the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Immigratsiya punkti odatda samolyot, kema yoki boshqa transport vositasidan tushishdagi dastlabki to'xtatish joyidir. Ba'zi transchegaraviy poyezdlarda tekshiruvlar harakatlanayotgan poyezdda amalga oshiriladi va ushbu poyezdlardan biriga chiqayotganingizda yoningizda shaxsni tasdiqlovchi yaroqli hujjatingiz bo'lishi kerak. Yotoq poyezdlarda uyqungiz buzilmasligi uchun pasportlar konduktor tomonidan yig'ib olinishi mumkin.
mt: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop after disembarking from a plane, ship or other transport. Some transborder trains conduct inspections on the moving train and you may be required to show proof of identity on the train you are boarding. Passports may be collected by conductors on sleeper trains to avoid disturbing your sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Singapur odatda nihoyatda xavfsiz joy hamda sayohat qilish uchun juda oson va kelganingizdan keyin deyarli hamma narsani xarid qilishingiz mumkin. Lekin Ekvatordan bor-yo'g'i bir necha darajada shimolda joylashgan ""baland tropiklar""da joylashish uchun siz ham issiqlik bilan (har doim), ham kuchli quyosh (osmon musaffo bo'lgan vaqtda, kamdan-kam hollarda) bilan hisoblashishingiz kerak bo'ladi."
mt: "Singapore is usually a very safe place to travel and you can buy almost anything you want after you arrive. But you will need to be prepared for heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, rarely) when you are in the ""high tropics"" which is a few degrees north of the equator."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Nemis xamir ovqatlari ancha yaxshi va Bavariyada janubiy qo'shnisi Avstriyaga o'xshab ancha boy va turfa xil. Mevali pishiriqlar keng tarqalgan bo'lib, ichiga olma solingan pishiriqlarni yil bo'yi, gilos va olxo'rililarini esa yoz davomida uchratish mumkin. Ko'plab pechda pishirilgan nemis mahsulotlarida bodom, funduk va boshqa yong'oqli mevalar ham bor. Mashhur pishiriqlar ko'pincha bir finjon kuchli qahva bilan, ayniqsa yaxshi ketadi. Agar siz kichik, lekin sut, shakar va yogʻ qoʻshilagan pishiriqlarni xohlasangiz, hududga qarab Berliner, Pfannkuchen yoki Krapfen deb ataluvchi pishiriqni sinab ko'ring.
mt: German breads are very good and in Bavaria, the southern neighbor of Austria, they are quite rich and varied. Fruit pies are common, apple pies are available year-round, while cherry and apricot pies are available in the summer. Many baked goods in Germany contain almonds, hazelnuts and other nuts. Famous pies often go well with a strong cup of coffee, especially if they are small but with milk, sugar and butter added. If you want small, but with milk, sugar and butter added, try a Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Agar siz dunyoni zarurat, yashash tarzi yoki qiyinchilik sababli arzon yo'l bilan ko'rishni istasangiz buni qilishning ayrim usullari mavjud. Ular asosan ikki toifaga bo'linadi: Yoki sayohat vaqtida ishlaysiz, yoki xarajatlaringizni cheklashga urinib ko'rasiz. Ushbu maqola keyingisi haqida. Chiqimlarni nolga yaqin darajada kamaytirish maqsadida qulaylik, vaqt hamda bashorat qilish qobiliyatini qurbon qilmoqchi bo'lganlar uchun minimal byudjetli sayohatga qarang. Maslahatga ko'ra, sayyohlar o'g'irlik qilmaydi, mulkiy daxlsizlikni buzmaydi, noqonuniy savdoda ishtirok etmaydi, tilanchilik qilmaydi yoki boshqacha shaklda boshqa kishilardan o'z manfaatlari yo'lida foydalanmaydi, deb ishoniladi.
mt: If you want to see the world on a shoestring, there are a few ways to go about it. They generally fall into two categories: either you work while you travel, or you cut your expenses to the bone. This article is about the latter. For travelers willing to sacrifice comfort, time, and predictability for a minimal budget, see budget travel. Advice is given that travelers do not steal, trespass, engage in illegal trade, beg, or otherwise use other people for their own gain, it is assumed.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Point Marion bilan Fairmont orasidagi masofa tez-tez xilvat joylar orqali o'tgani holda Baffalo-Pittsburg avtomagistlarildagi haydash uchun eng quyin sharoitlarga egadir. Agarda qishloq yo'llarida haydashga odatlanmagan bo'lsangiz, o'zingizga hushyor bo'ling: tik qiyaliklar, tor so'qmoqlar hamda keskin past-balandlar ancha ko'p. o'rnatilgan tezlik chegaralari avvalgi va keyingi qismlariga qaraganda sezilarli darajada past — odatda 35–40 mil/s (56–64 km/s) — va ularga qat'iy rioya qilish boshqalariga qaraganda yanada muhimroq. Qizig'i shuki, bu yerda mobil telefon xizmati, boshqa ko'p yo'nalishlarga qaraganda, masalan, Pensilvaniya Uayldzdan ko'ra ancha kuchliroq.
mt: The drive from Point Marion to Fairmont is through frequent crash-prone areas along the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Turnpike. If you are not used to driving in rural areas, be careful: steep hills, narrow curves, and sudden ups and downs are common. Speed limits are significantly lower than in the previous and next sections — usually 35–40 mph (56–64 km/h) — and must be strictly observed. The interesting thing is that cellular phone service is stronger here than in many other directions, such as from Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Kanyoning (yoki: kanyonering) — bu quruq yoki suv to'la dara tubidan o'tish. Kanyoning o'zida suzish, toqqa chiqish va sakrash elementlarini birlashtiradi — lekin boshlash uchun nisbatan kam tayyorgarlik yoki jismoniy bardamlikni talab qiladi (masalan, toqqa chiqish, akvalang yordamida suv ostida suzish yoki tog' chang'isi bilan taqqoslaganda).
mt: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is a sport that combines elements of hiking, swimming, climbing, and rappelling, but requires relatively little preparation or physical fitness (for example, compared to hiking, climbing, or rappelling).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "O'z avtomobilingizga o'tirish hamda olis safarga yo'l olish oddiyligi bilan o'ziga xos jozibaga ega. Kattaroq transport vositalaridan farqli ravishda, avtomobilingizni haydash tartibi bilan, hoynahoy, allaqachon tanishsiz va uning cheklovlarini bilasiz. Xususiy mulk yoki har qanday kattalikdagi shaharchada chodir qurish osongina istalmagan diqqatni jalb qilishi mumkin. Qisqa qilib aytganda, o'z mashinangizdan foydalanish safarga chiqishning ajoyib usuli, biroq kamdan-kam hollarda uning o'zini ""chodir"" qilish mumkin. Agar sizda yotish uchun joylari bo'lgan katta miniven, SUV, sedan yoki unversal avtomobil bo'lsa, avtomobilda kemping qilishingiz mumkin."
mt: "Your car is a unique and attractive way to get away from it all. Unlike larger vehicles, your car is easy to drive, familiar, and you don't have to worry about the limitations of a stranger. In short, your car is a great way to get away from it all, but rarely is it a "camping" option. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan, or universal car with room for sleeping, you can camp in your car."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Zamonaviy Kasablanka shahriga m.a. 10-asrda Barbar baliqchilari tomonidan asos solingan hamda undan finikiyaliklar, rimliklar va merenidlar Anfa deb nomlangan strategik port sifatida foydalanganlar. Portugaliyaliklar uni vayron qillib, Kasa Branka nomi ostida qayta qurishdi, 1755-yildagi zilziladan keyingina uni tark etishdi. Marokash sultoni shaharni Daru l-Badya sifatida qayta qurdi hamda u yerda savdo bazalarini tashkil qilgan ispan savdogarlari tomonidan unga Kasablanka nomi berildi. Kasablanka xarid qilish uchun butun Marokashdagi eng qiziqarsiz joylardan biri. Eski Madina atrofida tajinlar, sopol idishlar, charm buyumlar, chilimlar va turlicha bezaklar kabi an'anaviy Marokash mahsulotlari sotiladigan joylarni topish oson, biroq ularning barchasi sayyohlar uchun.
mt: 10th century BC, the Phoenicians founded the city of Anfa, which was used by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids as a strategic port. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Cazablanca, which they abandoned after the 1755 earthquake. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt it as Daru l-Badya and the Spanish merchants who traded there gave it the name of Casablanca. Kasablanka is one of the least interesting places to buy in all of Morocco. There are shops selling traditional Moroccan goods such as tajines, pottery, amber, chilims and various trinkets around the old Medina, but all of them are for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Romantik va maftunkor Sintra shahri shimolda va osongina borish mumkin bo'lgan joyda joylashgan bo'lib, uning hashamati to'g'risida Lord Bayron tomonidan yozib qoldirilgan maqtovli tavsiflardan so'ng xorijliklar orasida mashhur bo'lgan. 403-sonli Scotturb avtobusi Kabo da Rokada to'xtab o'tgan holda muntazam ravishda Sintraga qatnaydi. Yana shimolda butun dunyoga mashhur bo'lgan Mariam onamizning ko'rinish joyi bo'lgan Fotima onamiz ibodatxonasiga (Muqaddas jiy) ham tashrif buyuring.
mt: 403 Scotturb bus stops regularly in Sintra, a romantic and melancholic city located just north and easily accessible, famous among foreigners after Lord Byron's laudatory description of its castle. The bus stops at Cabo da Roca, the most western point of Europe. Further north, you can visit the famous shrine of Our Lady of Fatima (Holy Mother).
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 1994-yilda Ozarbayjonning Tog'li Qorabog' hududidagi etnik armanlar ozarbayjonlarga qarshi urush boshladilar. Armanistonning qo'llab-quvvatlovi bilan yangi respublika yaratildi. Ammo hech bir obro'li davlat — hattoki Armaniston ham uni rasman tan olmadi. Mintaqaga oid diplomatik tortishuvlar Armaniston va Ozarbayjon orasidagi aloqalarga putur yetkazishda davom etmoqda.
mt: 1994, ethnic Armenians in the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan began a war against the Azeris. A new republic was created with the support of Armenia. However, no major power, including Armenia, officially recognized it. Diplomatic tensions over the region continue to disrupt relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Shimoliy Karolinadagi Sharlotta shahrining afzalliklaridan biri — oilalar uchun yuqori sifatli tanlovlarning ko'pligidir. Boshqa hududlarning aholisi bu yerga koʻchib oʻtish sababi etib ko'pincha butun oila uchun qulay ekanligini koʻrsatadi va mehmonlar ko'p hollarda bolalar bilan zavqlanish oson deb biladilar. So'nggi 20 yilda Sharlotta shahri chetlarida bolalarga qulay bo'lgan variantlar soni keskin oshdi. Garchi muayyan holatlarda ba'zan foydalanish mumkin bo'lsa-da, Sharlotdagi oilalar tomon odatda taksilardan foydalanilmaydi. 2 nafardan ortiq yo'lovchi uchun qo'shimcha haq olinadi, shu sababli bu tanlov keragidan ortiq qimmatroq bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: One of the advantages of living in Charlotte, North Carolina, is the abundance of high-quality options for families. Other areas' residents often cite the city as a place to move to for ease of living with children, and visitors often find it easy to entertain children. In the last 20 years, the number of child-friendly options around Charlotte has increased dramatically. While there are some instances where it is possible to use them, Charlotte families typically do not use taxis. An additional fee is charged for more than two passengers, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
