src: 16-asrda ispanlar kelishidan oldin shimoliy Chili Inka hukmronligi ostida bo'lgan, Araukanlar (Mapuche) esa markaziy va Janubiy Chilida istiqomat qilgan. Mapuche Chili mustaqillikka erishguniga qadar ispancha gaplashuvchi boshqaruvga butunlay singib ketmagan oxirgi amerika tub aholisi guruhlaridan biri ham edi. Chili 1810-yilda mustaqilligini e'lon qilganiga qaramay (Napaleon urushlari Ispaniyani bir necha yil davomida markaziy hukumat boshqaruvisiz qoldirilgan), 1818-yilgacha ispanlar ustidan hal qiluvchi g'alabaga erishilmadi.
mt: 16th century before the arrival of the Spanish, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the Araucanians (Mapuche) lived in central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were the last indigenous group in the Americas to be subjugated by a Spanish-speaking government, not until 1818 did they achieve a decisive victory over the Spanish.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: """Besh mamlakat"" degan ma'noni bildiruvchi Cinque Terre Italiyaning Liguriya mintaqasidagi Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza hamda Monterosso singari besh kichik sohil bo'yi qishloqlarni o'z ichiga oladi. Ular YUNESKOning Butunjahon madaniy merosi ro'yxatidan joy olgan. Asrlar mobaynida kishilar terasalarni ehtiyotkorlik bilan notekis, tik landshaftlar ustida shundoqqina dengiz tepasidagi qoyalarga qadar qurishgan. Jozibadorligi qisman ko'zga tashlanuvchi umumiy rivojlanishningning yo'qligidandir. Qishloqlarni yo'llar, poyezdlar va qayiqlar bog'laydi, avtomobillar esa tashqaridan yetib bora olmaydi."
mt: "The five villages" referred to by the name Cinque Terre are the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso. They are listed as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. Over the centuries people have built the villages on the steep cliffs overlooking the sea with great care, using the uneven terrain of the hillsides to their advantage. The charm of the villages is partly due to the lack of overall development. The villages are connected by paths, trains and boats, but cars cannot reach them from outside."
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Qish payti sodir bo'ladigan baxtsiz hodisalarning eng keng tarqalgan sababi sirpanchiq yo'llar, yo'lakchalar (piyodalar yo'lakchakari) hamda ayniqsa zinalar hisoblanadi. Eng kamida, sizga mos tagcharmga ega bo'lgan oyoq kiyim kerak. Yozgi poyabzallar odatda qor va muzda juda sirpanchiq bo'ladi, hattoki ba'zi qishki etiklar ham tanqis bo'ladi. Namuna yetarli darajada — 5 mm (1/5 duym) yoki undan ko'proq chuqur bo'lishi va material sovuq haroratlarda yetarlicha yumshoq bo'lishi kerak. Ayrim botinkalar shpilkalarga ega bo'lib, poshna va tagcharmlarga mo'ljallangan, ko'pchilik botinka va tuflilarga mos keluvchi, sirpanchiq holatlar uchun shpilkalangan qo'shimcha jihoz mavjud. Poshnalar past va keng bo'lishi kerak. Ko'pincha ishqalanishni kamaytirish uchun yo'llarga qum, shag'al yoki tuz (kalsiy xlorid) sepiladi.
mt: The most common cause of winter accidents is slippery roads, sidewalks (pedestrian sidewalks) and especially stairs. You need appropriate footwear. Summer shoes are usually very slippery in snow and ice, and even some winter socks are thin. A good example is at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more deep and material that is soft enough at cold temperatures. Some boots have spikes for snow and for socks and slippers, additional equipment is available for slippery conditions. Socks should be low and wide. Often to reduce slipping, sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is spread on the roads.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "Kuk orollari Janubiy Tinch okeani o'rtasida, Polineziyada joylashgan bo'lib, Yangi Zelandiya bilan erkin birlashmadagi orol davlatdir. Bu okeanda 2,2 million km2 dan ko'proq hududga cho'zilgan 15 ta oroldan iborat arxipelag. Gavayi bilan bir xil vaqt zonasidagi mintaqalar bilan orollar haqida ba'zida ""Gavayi tagida"" deya o'ylashadi. Kichikroq bo'lsa-da, u Gavayining ayrim keksa tashrifchilariga turistlar uchun katta mehmonxonalari va boshqa rivojlanish obyektlari bo'lmagan davlatchilikdan avvalgi holatni eslatadi. Kuk orollarida birorta ham shahar yo'q, biroq ular 15 ta turli orollardan tashkil topgan. Asosiylari Rarotonga va Aitutaki orollaridir."
mt: "The Cook Islands are a self-governing state in free association with New Zealand, and are located in the southern Pacific Ocean, east of Fiji. They are a group of 15 islands whose combined area is about 2.2 million km2. They are often confused with the Polynesian islands in the same time zone as Hawaii. Although smaller, they resemble Hawaii in that they have no large tourist hotels or other signs of development before statehood. There are no cities in the Cook Islands, but they are made up of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Ruxsatnomalarga avvaldan buyurtma berilishi kerak. Sirenada tunash uchun rusxatnomaga ega bo'lishingiz kerak. Sirena lagerdan tashqari yotoqxona turar joyi va issiq taomlar taklif qiladigan yagona qo'riqchi stansiyadir. La Leona, San Pedrolla, Los Patos faqat oziq-ovqat xizmatlari bo'lmagan lagerlarni taklif qiladi. Park-ruxsatnomalarini bevosita Renjer bekatidan qo'lga kiritish mumkin, lekin ular kredit kartalarni qabul qilmaydi. Park xizmati (MINAE) kutilgan yetib kelishdan bir oydan ko'proq vaqtga park ruxsatlarini bermaydi. CafeNet El Sol 30 AQSH dollari yoki bir kunlik o'tishlar uchun 10 dollar evaziga buyurtma qilish xizmatini taklif qiladi; tafsilotlar ularning Corcovadi sahifasida.
mt: 1. You must have a reservation. 2. You must have a reservation. 3. The only guard station that offers hot meals is the sirena. 4. La Leona, San Pedrolla, Los Patos only offer food service without lagers. 5. Park-ruxsatnomalarini bevosita Renjer bekatidan qo'lga kiritish mumkin, lekin ular kredit kartalarni qabul qilmaydi. 6. Park xizmati (MINAE) kutilgan yetib kelishdan bir oydan ko'proq vaqtga park ruxsatlarini bermaydi. 7. CafeNet El Sol 30 AQSH dollari yoki bir kunlik o'tishlar uchun 10 dollar evaziga buyurtma qilish xizmatini taklif qiladi; tafsilotlar ularning Corcovadi sahifasida.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Chang'i alpinizmi: Bu mashg'ulot ovloq yerlarda chang'ida uchish, chang'i safari yoki chang'i sayri deb ham ataladi. Bu odatda alpinizm uslubidagi tog' chang'isi yoki alpinizm bilan bog'liq, lekin ularni o'z ichida olmaydi, ular tik sahnlarda amalga oshiriladi va qattiq chang'i va etiklarni talab qiladi. Chang'i uchish marshrutini piyoda yurish marshruti sifatida tasavvur qiling. Sharoit yaxshi bo'lsa, siz piyoda yurishdan ko'ra ko'proq masofani bosib o'ta olasiz, biroq faqat kamdan-kam hollarda tayyorlangan yo'llarda og'ir ryukzaksiz chang'ida tezlik olasiz.
mt: Space alpinism: This activity is the sport of skiing on snow-covered mountains, also called ski touring or ski touring. This is usually done in an alpine style, but not limited to it, and requires strong skiing and climbing skills. The ski touring route is imagined as a hiking route. If conditions are good, you can cover more distance than hiking, but only rarely can you ski fast without heavy backpacks.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Qayta kirish shoki madaniy shokdan nisbatan tezroq keladi (asal oyi davriga nisbatan kamroq bo'ladi), ko'proq davom etadi hamda og'irroq bo'lishi mumkin. Yangi madaniyatga moslashishi osoh kechgan sayyohlar ko'pincha o'zlarining madaniyatlariga qayta moslashishlari ayniqsa qiyin bo'ladi. Xorijda yashagandan keyin uyga qaytayotganda siz yangi madaniyatga moslashgan va mahalliy madaniyatingizning ba'zi odatlarini yo'qotgan bo'lasiz. Ilk marta xorijga chiqqaningizda odamlar sayyohlar yangi davlatga moslashishi zarurligini bilib, hoynahoy, sabrli va tushunuvchan bo'lgan. Odamlar uylariga qaytayotgan sayyohlar uchun sabr-toqat va tushinish ham zarur ekanligini bilmasliklari mumkin.
mt: Reentry shock is less severe (less than a month), longer lasting and more severe. New culture is easier to adapt to than your own culture. After returning from abroad, you will have adapted to the new culture and lost some of your own cultural habits. When you first went abroad, people were patient and understanding that you needed to adapt to the new country. People may not be patient and understanding of returning travelers who need patience and understanding.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Loslar (elk deb ham ataladi) tabiatan tajovuzkor emas, ammo biror xatar sezsa, o'zini himoya qiladi. Insonlar losga ehtimoliy xavfli hayvon sifatida qaramasa, ular juda yaqin borishlari hamda o'zlarini xavf ostiga qo'yishlari mumkin.
mt: Elk are not naturally aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. Humans may be close to them, but they can be dangerous.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Kunning jaziramasida sayohatchilar suv (yoki boshqa narsalar) illyuziyasini hosil qiluvchi saroblarni ko'rishi mumkin. Agar sayyoh qimmatli kuchi va qolgan suvni bekorga sarflagan holda sarob ketidan yursa, bu xavfli bo'lishi mumkin. Hattoki eng issiq cho'llar ham tunda juda sovuq bo'lishi mumkin. Gipotermiya issiq kiyimlarsiz haqiqatda xavf tug'diradi.
mt: During the day, tourists may see mirages of water (or other things). If a tourist walks out of a mirage of water and into the desert, this can be dangerous. Even the hottest deserts can be very cold at night. Hypothermia is a real danger without proper clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Kunning jaziramasida sayohatchilar suv (yoki boshqa narsalar) illyuziyasini hosil qiluvchi saroblarni ko'rishi mumkin. Agar sayyoh qimmatli kuchi va qolgan suvni bekorga sarflagan holda sarob ketidan yursa, bu xavfli bo'lishi mumkin. Hattoki eng issiq cho'llar ham tunda juda sovuq bo'lishi mumkin. Gipotermiya issiq kiyimlarsiz haqiqatda xavf tug'diradi.

src: Dominikan Respublikasi (ispanchada: Republica Dominicana) – Gaiti bilan bo'lib olingan Hispaniola orolining sharqiy qismini egallab turuvchi Karib dengizi mamlakatidir. Oq qumli plyajlar va tog' landshaftlaridan tashqari, mamlakatda hozirda Santo Domingoning bir qismi bo'lgan Amerikadagi eng qadimiy Yevropa shahri joylashgan. Orolda dastlab taynoslar va kariblar yashashgan. Kariblar arakakan tilida so'zlashuvchi, miloddan 10 000 yil avval kelgan odamlar bo'lgan. Yevropalik tadqiqotchilar kelganidan so'ng o'tgan kichik muddat davomida Taynos aholisi ispan bosqinchilari tomonidan sezilarli darajada qirib tashlangan. Ispan mustamlakachilari Frey Bartolome de las Casasga (Tratado de las Indias) joylashgan holda 1492–1498-yillar oralig'ida 100 mingga yaqin taynoslarni o'ldirdilar.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: Republica Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, sharing the western third with Haiti. Besides the capital city of Santo Domingo, the country is known for its beaches, tropical climate, and rich culture. The island was originally inhabited by the Taíno and Carib people. The Taíno were an Arawakan people who arrived from South America around 10,000 years ago. European explorers arrived in the 15th century and the island was colonized by Spain. The Taíno population was significantly reduced by Spanish colonization and disease. In 1492–1498, Bartolomé de las Casas, a Spanish priest, estimated that 100,000 Taíno had been killed.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Chang'i hamda snoubordni o'zida mujassamlashtirgan tog' chang'isi sport turlari — bu qor bilan qoplangan yerda chang'i yoki oyoqqa biriktirilgan snoubord bilan sirpanishdan iborat ommabop sport turlaridir. Chang'ida uchish — butun ta'tilni muayyan manzilda chang'i atrofida rejalashtiradigan, ba'zan ""chang'i daydilari"" deb ataluvchi ko'plab ishqibozlarning asosiy sayohat mashg'ulotidir. Chang'ichilik g'oyasi nihoyatda qadimiy — chang'ichilarni tasvirlovchi g'or suratlari m.a. 5000-yillarga borib taqaladi! Tog' chang'isida uchish sport turi sifatida kamida 17 asrdan beri ma'lum va 1861-yili Avstraliyada norvegiyaliklar tomonidan birinchi dam olish chang'ichilik klubi ochildi."
mt: "Downhill skiing and snowboarding are popular sports that involve sliding down a snow-covered slope using skis or a snowboard. ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Sharqiy Afrika orollari Afrika qit'asining sharqiy sohillari bo'yidagi Hind ummonida joylashgan. Yovvoyi tabiatga kelganda Madagaskar so'zsiz eng katta va o'ziga xos alohida materikdir. Kichikroq orollarning ko'pchiligi mustaqil davlatlar yoki Fransiya bilan bog'liq bo'lib, ular hashamatli plyajli kurortlar sifatida mashhur. Arablar bu yerlarga islomni ham olib kelishdi va bu Komor orollari hamda Mayottada katta ahamiyat kasb etdi. Portugaliyalik sayyoh Vasko da Gama Yevropadan Hindistonga Keyp yo'lini topganligi sababli 15-asrda Yevropa ta'siri hamda mustamlakachilik siyosati boshlandi.
mt: The islands of East Africa are located on the eastern shores of the African continent in the Indian Ocean. Madagascar is the largest and most unique island in the wild nature. Smaller islands are mostly independent states or are related to France, they are famous for their luxurious beaches. The Arabs brought Islam to these islands and it played a major role in the Comoros and Mayotte. Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the Cape Route to India in the 15th century, which led to European influence and colonial policy.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Quyosh chiqishini tomosha qilish uchun Pasxa kechasini ayrim ochiq joylarda uyg'oq o'tkazish odati mavjud. Bu an'ananing nasroniy diniy sababi albatta mavjud, biroq u nasroniylikdan avvalgi Bahor va hosildorlik marosimi bo'lishi ham mumkin. An'anaviyroq cherkovlar tez-tez Masihning qayta tirilishini nishonlashni buzish uchun yarim tunda jamoat bilan Pasxaning dam olish kunlari davomida shanba oqshomida Pasxa hushyorligini o'tkazadilar.
mt: Some open spaces are used to celebrate Easter morning to watch the sunrise. The religious reason for this tradition is of course Christian, but it can also be a celebration of the Spring and fertility. More traditional churches often celebrate the Easter vigil with the public on Good Friday afternoon, half past midnight on Saturday, the Easter morning.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ekvador Kuba fuqarolaridan xalqaro aeroportlar hamda chegaradagi kirish nuqtalari orqali kirishdan avval taklif xati olishni talab qiladi. Mazkur maktub Ekvador Tashqi ishlar vazirligi tomonidan qonuniylashtirilishi hamda muayyan talablarga mos bo'lishi lozim. Mazkur talablar ikki davlat o'rtasida tartibli migratsiya oqimini ta'minlashga mo'ljallangan. AQSH grin kartasiga ega Kuba fuqarolari bu talabdan ozod bo'lish uchun Ekvador konsulligiga borishlari kerak. Pasportingiz sayohat sanalaridan keyin kamida 6 oy davomida yaroqli boʻlishi lozim. Borish-kelish/davom etish chiptasi qoladigan vaqtingiz davomiyligini tasdiqlashi kerak.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain a letter of invitation from international airports and border entry points before entering. This letter is legalized by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ecuador and must meet certain requirements. This requirement is intended to regulate migration flows between the two countries. U.S. green card holders are exempt from this requirement and must visit the Ecuadorian consulate. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after your travel dates. Entry/exit ticket must confirm the duration of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Ko'zoynaklar xorijiy, ayniqsa, maoshlari past bo'lgan mamlakatlarda arzonroq bo'lishi mumkin. Ayniqsa, sug'urta qoplaydigan bo'lsa, uyda ko'zingizni ko'rikdan o'tkazish va topshirish uchun shifokor tavsiyasini olib borish haqida o'ylab ko'ring. Bu kabi joylarda mavjud bo'lgan yuqori sifatli brend romlaring ikkita muammosi bo'lishi mumkin; ularning ba'zilari qalbaki bo'lishi va import qilingan haqiqiylari uydagidan ko'ra qimmatroq bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: Glasses may be cheaper in foreign countries, especially in countries with low wages. If you need to get your eyes checked and get a prescription, consider going to a doctor. This may be a problem with some high quality brandy; some may be fake and some may be more expensive than the real thing.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Folklendning rasmiy valyutasi — Folklend funti (FKP) bo'lib, uning qiymati bir Britaniya funtiga (GBP) teng qilib belgilangan. Valyutani Stenlidagi FIC West do'koni qarshisida joylashgan orolning yagona bankida ayirboshlash imkoni bor. Britaniya funt-sterlingi orollarning istalgan yerida umumiy holda qabul qilinadigan bo'ladi, Stenli kredit kartalari va Qo'shma Shtatlar dollari ham ko'pincha qabul qilinadi. Britaniya hamda AQSH valyutasi olinishi mumkin bo'lsa-da, markazdan uzoqdagi orollarda kredit kartalari qabul qilinmasligi mumkin; qanday to'lov usuli qabul qilinishini bilish uchun oldindan egalaridan aniqlashtirib oling. Orollardan tashqarida Folklend valyutasini almashtirish deyarli imkonsiz, shu sababli pulni orollarni tark etishdan avval almashtirib oling.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is pegged to the British pound sterling (GBP). The currency can be exchanged at the only bank in Stanley, FIC West, which is located opposite the island's only airport. British pounds and United States dollars are generally accepted throughout the islands, and Falkland Islands credit cards and US dollars are also accepted. British and US currency may be accepted in remote islands, but credit cards may not be accepted; it is advisable to check with the owner of the establishment beforehand which method of payment is accepted.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Ko'pchilik ibodatxonalarda noyabr oyidan boshlab may oyining o'rtalarigacha davom etadigan, har bir ibodatxonaning yillik taqvimiga ko'ra o'zgarib turadigan Yillik festival bor. Ibodatxona bayramlarining ko'pchiligi ibotxonaning har yilgi yoki boshchilik qiluvchi ma'budning tug'ilgan kuni yoki ibodatxona bilan bog'liq bo'lgan boshqa katta tadbir sifatida nishonlanadi. Keralaning ibodatxona festivallarini ko'rish juda qiziqarli, ularda bezatilgan fillarning muntazam tantanali yurishi, ibodatxona orkestri va boshqa tantanalar bo'ladi.
mt: Most temples have a yearly festival that varies according to the temple's annual calendar. Most temple festivals are celebrated on the anniversary of the temple's founding or the birth of the temple's presiding deity. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting, with decorated elephants in a regular procession, temple orchestra and other ceremonies.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Birinchi yoki biznes klassda parvoz qilishning hammaga ma'lum usuli — imtiyoz uchun qalingina bir dasta pulni ziqnalik qilmay sarflashdir (yoki, bundan yaxshirog'i, buni siz uchun kompaniyangiz amalga oshirishiga erishing). Lekin bu arzonga tushmaydi: yozilmagan qoidaga ko'ra, siz biznes uchun odatdagi ekonom klassdan to'rt baravargacha, birinchi klass uchun o'n bir baravargacha ko'proq to'lov qilishni kutishingiz mumkin! Umuman aytganda, A manzildan B manzilga tog'ridan-to'g'ri reyslarga biznes yoki birinchi klass o'rinlari uchun chegirmalar izlash befoyda. Aviakompaniyalar biror joyga tez va qulayliklar bilan yetib borish uchun katta pul to'lashga tayyor bo'lgan foydalanuvchilar borligini yaxshi biladilar va shunga yarasha to'lov oladilar.
mt: 1. The first or business class way to fly is to pay extra for a perk that you don't have to pay for (or, better yet, have your company do it for you). But this doesn't always work: according to an unwritten rule, you can pay up to four times as much for business class and up to eleven times as much for first class over the standard economy fare! In general, looking for discounts on direct flights between A and B in business or first class is a waste of time. Airlines know that there are customers willing to pay a lot of money to get somewhere quickly and comfortably, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways va Turkish Airlines singari aviakompaniyalar Afrikadagi xizmatlarini sezilarli darajada kengaytirdi va Afikaning ko'pgina katta shaharlariga reyslarni boshqa Yevropa aviakompaniyalaridan ko'ra raqobatdosh narxlarda taklif qilmoqda. Turk Havo yo'llari aviakompaniyasi 2014-yildan boshlab Afrikaning 30 davlatidagi 39 ta manzilga parvozni amalga oshirmoqda. Agar sizda sayohat qilish uchun qo'shimcha vaqt bo'lsa, Afrikaga bo'lgan jami yo'l harajatlaringizning dunyo bo'ylab sayohat yo'l harajatlariga nisbatan solishtirib ko'ring. Afrikadan tashqaridagi hamma yerlar uchun qo'shimcha vizalar, mamlakatdan chiqish soliqlari, yer usti transporti hamda boshqalarning qo'shimcha chiqimlarni qo'shishni esdan chiqarmang.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services in Africa significantly and offer flights to many major cities in Africa at competitive prices compared to other European airlines. Turkish Airlines is flying to 39 destinations in 30 African countries from 2014. If you have extra time, compare the total cost of your trip to Africa to the total cost of your trip to the rest of the world. Additional visas, exit taxes, overland transport and other additional expenses for all other countries outside of Africa should be added.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Oziq-ovqatlarni supermarketlarda xariq qilish odatda ovqatlanish uchun eng arzon usuldir. Pishirish imkoniyatlarisiz, tanlov faqat tayyor oziq-ovqatlar bilan cheklanadi. Tobora ko'proq supermarketlar yanada xilma-xil tayyor ovqatlar bo'limiga ega bo'lmoqda. Ba'zilari hatto ovqatni isitish uchun mikroto'lqinli pech yoki boshqa vositalarni taqdim qilishmoqda. Ayrim davlatlarda yoki do'kon turlarida ko'pincha norasmiy bo'lgan kamida bitta hamyonbop restoran bor.
mt: Supermarkets are usually the cheapest way to feed oneself. Without cooking facilities, the selection is limited to ready-to-eat foods. More and more supermarkets are adding a wider selection of ready-to-eat foods. Some even offer microwave ovens or other facilities to heat food. In some countries or store types, there is usually at least one full-service restaurant, even if it is unofficial.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Garchi o'zaro tushunish uchun yetarlicha o'xshash bo'lsa-da, Belgiya va Shveytsariyada gaplashiladigan fransuz tili turlari Fransiyada gaplashiladigan fransuz tilidan bir oz farq qiladi. Xususan, fransuz tilida gaplashuvchi Belgiya va Shveytsariyada raqamlash tizimi frantsuz tilida gaplashuvchi Frantsiyadan bir oz farq qiluvchi ayrim o'ziga xosliklarga ega va ayrim so'zlarning talaffuz qilinishi biroz boshqachadir. Shunday bo'lsada, fransuz zabon hamma belgiyalik va shveytsariyaliklar maktabda standart fransuz tilini o'rgangan bo'ladi, shu sababli ham standart fransuz sanash tizimidan foydalansangiz ham sizni tushunadi.
mt: While similar enough to be mutually intelligible, the French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differs slightly from the French spoken in France. In particular, the French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland has some unique features and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all Belgians and Swiss have learned standard French in school, so if you use the standard French number system they will understand you.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Faqat bir nechta aviakompaniya hali ham yaqin kishisini yo'qotganlik tariflarini taklif qiladi, bu oxirgi daqiqadagi dafn marosimiga borish narxini bir oz pasaytiradi. Bularni taklif qiluvchi aviakompaniyalarga Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, AQSH yoki Kanadadan parvozlar uchun Lufthansa hamda WestJet kiradi. Barcha hollarda siz aviakompaniyaga bevosita telefon qilish orqali bron qilishingiz kerak.
mt: Only a few airlines are still offering bereavement fares, which lower the price of a last-minute funeral service. These airlines include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, U.S. or Canada flights to Lufthansa and WestJet. In all cases, you must call the airline directly to book.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Smartfoningizda GPS navigatsiya ilovalaridan foydalanish o'z mamlakatingizdan tashqarida yo'l topish uchun eng qulay va eng oson usuldir. Bu GPS uchun yangi xarita yoki avtonom GPS qurilmasi sotib olish yoki ijaraga beruvchi kompaniyadan bitta avtomobil ijaraga olishga nisbatan pul tejashi mumkin. Agar telefoningizda internetga ulanish bo'lmasa yoki u xizmat doirasidan tashqarida bo'lsa, ularning faoliyati cheklanishi yoki ishlamasligi mumkin.
mt: Your smartphone's GPS navigation apps are the easiest and cheapest way to find your way around in a foreign country. Buying a new map for GPS or an independent GPS device, or renting a car from a car rental company can be more expensive than renting a single car. If your phone doesn't have internet access or is outside the service area, their operation may be limited or not work at all.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: 1835-yilda Charliz Darvin qilgani singari, Galapagosning yovvoyi hayoti va diqqatga sazovor joylarini tomosha qilish qayiqda ajoyib tarzda amalga oshiriladi. Galapagos suvlarida 8 nafardan 100 nafargacha yo'lovchi sig'imiga ega bo'lgan 60 dan ortiq kruiz kemalari qatnaydi. Ko'pchilik odamlar o'z joylarini oldindan band qiladilar (chunki mavsum cho'qqisiga chiqqanda qayiqlar to'lgan bo'ladi). Siz buyurtma qilgan agent turli-tuman kemalar haqida yaxshi bilimga ega Galapagos mutaxassisi ekaniga ishonch hosil qiling. Bu sizning alohida qiziqishlaringiz va/yoki cheklovlaringiz ularga eng mos bo'lgan kema bilan mutanosib bo'lishini ta'minlaydi.
mt: 1835, like Charles Darwin, the Galapagos' wildlife and natural wonders are spectacularly showcased on a boat. There are 60 or more cruise ships with 8 to 100 passengers in the Galapagos waters. Most people book in advance (as the season peaks, boats are full). You trust your agent to be knowledgeable about various ships in the Galapagos, a specialist in Galapagos. This ensures that the ship you choose is appropriate to your individual interests and/or restrictions.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kazinolar odatda mehmonlar tomonidan vaqt va pul sarfini maksimallashtirish uchun ko'p harakat qiladilar. Odatda derazalar va soatlar bo'lmaydi, chiqish joyini topish ham qiyin bo'ladi. Ular mehmonlarning kayfiyatini ko'tarish va ularni bino ichida ushlab turish uchun odatda maxsus taom, ichimlik va ko'ngilochar dasturlarni taklif qiladilar. Ba'zi manzillar binoda spirtli ichimliklar taklif qiladi. Ammo mastlik qaror qabul qilishni susaytiradi hamda barcha yaxshi qimorbozlar hushyor turish muhimligini biladi.
mt: Casinos often go to great lengths to maximize time and money spent by guests. They usually do not have clocks or windows, and finding the exit can be difficult. They often offer special food, drink and entertainment to keep guests in the building. Some venues offer alcoholic drinks. But intoxication makes good gamblers cautious and all good gamblers know to keep sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Hamma otlar, siz uchun Sie so'zi bilan bir qatorda, doimo, hatto gapning markazida ham katta harf bilan boshlanadi. Bu ba'zi bir fe'l va predmetlarni farqlashning muhim usulidir. Garchi yozish fe'l yoki sifatning substansiya shaklida foydalanilishini bilish zarurati bilan bir oz murakkablashsa-da, u o'qishni osonlashtiradi.
mt: All words, including Sie, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and nouns. Although it may be a little confusing to use a verb or noun in its substantive form, it makes reading easier.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "Dunyoning ko'plab qismlarida qo'lni silkitish do'stona ishora bo'lib, ""salom"" degan ma'noni bildiradi. Biroq Malayziyada, hech bo'lmaganda chekka hududlardagi malaylar orasida, ko'rsatkich barmoqning tana tomon bukilishi — ma'lum g'arb mamlakatlarida foydalaniluvchi imo-ishoraga o'xshash va undan faqat shu maqsadda foydalanilishi kerak. Xuddu shu kabi, Ispaniyadagi britaniyalik sayyoh kaft silkituvchi odam tomonga (silkitilayotgan odam tomonga qaratilgan bo'lishi o'rniga) qaratilgan holda qo'l silkitishni xayrlashish sifatida noto'g'ri tushunishi mumkin."
mt: "In many parts of the world, a slap on the wrist is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello." But in Malaysia, at least in rural areas, among the Malays, the gesture is a slap on the back of the hand, similar to the Western gesture, but only used for that purpose. Similarly, a British tourist in Spain might misinterpret a slap on the wrist as a friendly gesture, when the person is actually looking at the person being slapped."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: "Dunyoning ko'plab qismlarida qo'lni silkitish do'stona ishora bo'lib, ""salom"" degan ma'noni bildiradi. mt: "In many parts of the world, a slap on the wrist is a friendly gesture, meaning "hello." But in Malaysia, at least in rural areas, among the Malays, the gesture is a slap on the back of the hand, similar to the Western gesture, but only used for that purpose. Similarly, a British tourist in Spain might misinterpret a slap on the wrist as a friendly gesture, when the person is actually looking at the person being slapped."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Muzliklar barqaror emas, biroq ular tog'dan pastga oqib tushadi. Bu qor ko'priklari osida ko'rinmay qolishi mumkin bo'lgan yorilishlar, darz ketishlarga olib kelishi mumkin. Muz g'orlarining devorlari va tomlari qulab tushishi va yoriqlar yopilib qolishi mumkin. Muzliklarning chetidan yirik bo'laklar sinib, pastga qulaydi, ba'zan esa uzoqroqqa irg'ib yoki dumalab ketadi.
mt: Glaciers are not stable, but they flow downhill. This can cause crevasses, collapses, and falls in the ice. The edges of glaciers can break off and fall far away or slide down.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma — Ruandaning yaqinidagi nihoyatda sharqda joylashgan Kongo Demokratik Respublikasining sayyohlik shahridir. 2002-yilda Goma shahardagi, ayniqsa, shahar markazidagi ko'chalarni kulga aylantirgan Nyiragongo vulqoni lavasi tomonidan vayron qilingan. Goma yetarli darajada xavfsiz bo'lsada, Gomadan tashqariga har qanday tashriflar Shimoliy Kivu viloyatida doimiy uchrab turuvchi mushtlashuvlar holatini tushunish uchun o'rganib chiqilishi kerak. Shahar Afrikadagi eng arzon tog' Gorilla kuzatuvi bilan birga Nyiragongo vulqoniga ko'tarilish uchun ham bazadir. Siz Gomani aylanib chiqish uchun boda-bodadan (mototsikl taksi) foydalanishingiz mumkin. Qisqa safarlar uchun odatiy (mahalliy) narx — ~500 Kongo franki.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, near Rwanda. In 2002, lava from the Nyiragongo volcano destroyed the streets, especially in the city center. Goma is safe enough, but any trips outside Goma should be studied to understand the ongoing clashes in the province of North Kivu. The city is also a base for the cheapest mountain gorilla tracking in Africa, as well as climbing the Nyiragongo volcano. You can travel around Goma by boda-boda (motorcycle taxi). The usual (local) price for short trips is ~500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: "Grand Kanyonda gardishi ostidagi har qanday kemping uchun chekka hudud ruxsatnomasi talab etiladi. Kayonni himoya qilish uchun ruxsatlar cheklangan va ular boshlash oyinda to'rt oy avval, oyning 1-kuni beriladi. Shunday qilib, may oyidagi istalgan sanadan boshlanuvchi chekka hududlarda kemping uchun ruxsatni 1 yanvardan boshlab olish mumkin bo'ladi. Fantom ranchosiga tutash ""Yorqin farishta"" lageri kabi eng mashhur hududlarda joylar odatda ular band qilinish uchun ochilgan birinchi sanadayoq olingan so'rovlar bilan to'lib qoladi. Kirish so'rovlari uchun cheklangan miqdordagi ruxsatnomalar mavjud bo'lib, ularni kim birinchi kelsa, o'sha qo'lga kiritadi."
mt: "A permit is required for any camping within the Grand Canyon. Permits are limited and are issued four months in advance on the first day of the month. Thus, permits for camping in the Grand Canyon beginning in May can be obtained starting January 1. Popular sites such as the ""Bright Angel"" campground at Phantom Ranch are usually booked up with requests for permits on the first day they are available. Permits are limited and are issued on a first-come, first-served basis."
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Ayrim mehmonxonalarda bug' temir yo'llari hamda okean laynerlari oltin davridan qolgan meros mavjud; Ikkinchi jahon urushidan avval, 19 yoki 20-asr boshlaridagi. Mazkur hostellar o'sha davrning boy va mashhur kishilari joylashadigan joy bo'lib, ko'pincha yaxshi tamaddixonalar hamda tungi hayotga ega bo'lardi. Eskicha uslubdagi furnitura, eng so'ngi qulayliklarning yo'qligi va qandaydir nafis qarilik ham ularning xususiyatlaridandir. Odatda xususiy mulk bo'lsa-da, ularga ba'zida tashrif buyuruvchi davlat rahbarlari va yuqori lavozimli amaldorlar joylashadi. g'aram-g'aram puli bor sayyoh mazkur mehmonxonalarning ko'pida to'xtab-to'xtab, dunyo bo'ylab parvozni amalga oshirish haqida o'ylab ko'rishi mumkin.
mt: Some hotels have remnants of the gold age of railroads and ocean liners; from before the Second World War, in the 19th or 20th century. These hotels were places where the rich and famous lived, and were often luxurious and had a lively nightlife. Antique furniture, the absence of modern conveniences, and a certain elegance are their characteristics. They are usually private property, but sometimes visiting heads of state and high-ranking officials stay there. The rich traveler can stop at these hotels and think about traveling around the world.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Dengiz osti optik tolali kabel orqali Yevropaga hamda keng polosali sputnikka ulanish sababli Grenlandiyaning internetga ulanganlik darajasi yaxshi – aholining 93%i ulangan. Mehmonxonangiz yoki mezbonlaringiz (agar uy mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolsangiz) katta ehtimol bilan Wi-Fi yoki shaxsiy kompyuterga ulangan internetga ega bo'ladi va barcha aholi manzilgohlarida internet-kafe yoki ochiq Wi-Fi tarmog'i bo'lgan joylar mavjud. Yuqorida qayd etilganidek, ""Eskimo"" so'zi Qo'shma Shtatlarda maqbul so'z bo'lib qolayotgan bo'lsa-da, u ko'plab AQSHlik bo'lmagan Arktika xalqlarida, ayniqsa, Kanadada kamsituvchi so'z hisoblanadi. Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi qo'llaydigan so'zni eshitish mumkin bo'lgani holda xorijliklar undan foydalanishdan qochishlari kerak. Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi o'zini Kanadada Inuit, Glenlandiyada Kalaaleq (ko'plikda — Kalaallit) — grenlandiyalik deb ataydilar. Jinoyat va chet elliklarga yomon niyatda bo'lish Grenlandiyada umuman mavjud emas. Hatto shaharlarda ham ""qo'pol hududlar"" yo'q. Hoynahoy, sovuq ob-havo — tayyorgarlik ko'rmagan odamlar duch keladigan yagona haqiqiy xavfdir. Agarda siz Grenlandiyaga sovuq mavsumlarda borsangiz (qancha shimolroqqa borsangiz, shuncha sovuq bo'lishi hisobga olinsa), yetarlicha issiq kiyimlar olib borish kerak. Yozning juda uzun kunlari yetarli darajada uxlamaslik va ular bilan bog'liq sog'liq muammolariga olib kelishi mumkin. Yoz davomida Nordik chivinlaridan ham ehtiyot bo'ling. Garchi hech qanday kasallik yuqtirmasa-da, ular juda g'ashingizga tegishi mumkin."
mt: "The internet connection in Greenland is good – 93% of the population is connected. If you are staying in a hotel or as a guest (if you stay in a guesthouse or private house) you will probably have Wi-Fi or internet access to a personal computer. There are internet cafes or open Wi-Fi networks in all settlements. As mentioned above, the word "Eskimo" is acceptable in the United States, but it is considered derogatory in many non-American Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. The indigenous population of Greenland calls themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaaleq (in the plural Kalaallit) in Greenland. Crime and bad intentions towards foreigners are not present in Greenland. There are no "dangerous areas" even in cities. Ho-ho, cold weather – unprepared people will encounter the only real danger. If you are going to Greenland in the cold season (the colder the north, the colder it will be), you need to bring enough warm clothes. The long days of summer are enough not to sleep enough and the related health problems are possible. In the summer, beware of Nordic mosquitoes. Even if you don't get sick, they can sting you."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardin de la Union. Mazkur joy 17-asr monastiri uchun atrium sifatida bunyod etilgan bo'lib, undagi Templo de San Diego omon qolgan yagona imoratdir. U hozir markaziy maydon sifatida xizmat qiladi va unda tunu-kun doimo juda ko'p narsalar o'tkaziladi. Bog' atrofida bir qator restoranlar mavjud bo'lib, tushdan so'ng va kechki paytlarda ko'pincha markaziy ayvonda tekin konsertlar beriladi. Callejon del Beso (o'pish hiyoboni). Atigi 69 santimetr ajratib turuvchi ikki balkon muhabbat haqidagi eski afsona makonidir. Ayrim bolalar ozgina chaqa uchun sizga bu voqeani aytib berishadi.
mt: Jardin de la Union. This area was built as an atrium for a 17th century monastery, and the Templo de San Diego is the only surviving building. It now serves as a central plaza and is always full of activity day and night. There are several restaurants around the garden, and free concerts are often held in the central alley at night. Callejon del Beso (kiss alley). Only 69 centimeters apart, the two balconies are the setting for an old legend of love. Some children will tell you this story for a few pesos.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Piyoda yurish — ko'pincha piyoda safar qilish yoki tabiat qo'ynida sayr qilishdan iborat ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotdir. Kunduzgi piyoda sayohat bir mildan kamroq masofadan tortib bir kunda bosib o'tish mumkin bo'lgan uzoqroq masofalarni qamrab oladi. Oson yo'lda bir kunlik piyoda sayr uchun bir oz tayyorgarlik talab qilinadi hamda har qanday o'rtacha sog'lom odam undan zavqlana oladi. Yoshi kichik bolalari bor oilalar ko'proq tayyorgarlik ko'rishi kerak bo'lishi mumkin, ammo chaqaloq va bog'cha yoshidagi bolalar bilan ham ochiq havoda kun oson o'tishi mumkin.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often in mountain, forest, or other wilderness areas. Day hiking is a walk of a few hours or a day trip, while overnight hiking can last for several days. Day hiking is a popular leisure activity, while overnight hiking is often practiced combined with camping, and is one of the most widespread ways of exploring wilderness areas. Day hiking is a popular leisure activity, while overnight hiking is often practiced combined with camping, and is one of the most widespread ways of exploring wilderness areas.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Piyoda yurish — ko'pincha piyoda safar qilish yoki tabiat qo'ynida sayr qilishdan iborat ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotdir. Kunduzgi piyoda sayohat bir mildan kamroq masofadan tortib bir kunda bosib o'tish mumkin bo'lgan uzoqroq masofalarni qamrab oladi. Oson yo'lda bir kunlik piyoda sayr uchun bir oz tayyorgarlik talab qilinadi hamda har qanday o'rtacha sog'lom odam undan zavqlana oladi. Yoshi kichik bolalari bor oilalar ko'proq tayyorgarlik ko'rishi kerak bo'lishi mumkin, ammo chaqaloq va bog'cha yoshidagi bolalar bilan ham ochiq havoda kun oson o'tishi mumkin.
mt: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often in mountain, forest, or other wilderness areas. Day hiking is a walk of a few hours or a day trip, while overnight hiking can last for several days. Day hiking is a popular leisure activity, while overnight hiking is often practiced combined with camping, and is one of the most widespread ways of exploring wilderness areas. Day hiking is a popular leisure activity, while overnight hiking is often practiced combined with camping, and is one of the most widespread ways of exploring wilderness areas.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "To'satdan baland, u yoki bu darajada tekis platolarga o'rin bo'shatuvchi fordlar va vodiylar Norvegiya uchun xosdir. Mazkur platolar bu keng, ochiq daraxtsiz makon, cheksiz kenglikni anglatuvchi ""vidde"" nomi bilan ataladi. Rogaland va Agderda ular ko'pincha archagul bilan qoplangan bepoyon kenglik ma'nosini beruvchi ""hei"" deb nomlanadi."
mt: "Suddenly high, or this or that degree of flat plateaus and valleys are typical for Norway. These plateaus are called "vidde" which means "wide" in Norwegian. In Rogaland and Agder they are often covered with heather and are called "hei" which means "heath" in Norwegian."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Tog' bekatlari uchun sayyohlik mavsumi odatda hind yozida avjiga chiqadi. Shunday bo'lsa-da, ular qish vaqtida o'zgacha go'zallik va jozibaga ega bo'lib, ko'plab tog' bekatlarida yirik miqdorda qor bo'ladi hamda chang'ida uchish va snouboard kabi mashg'ulotlarni taklif qiladi.
mt: The trekking season for the Himalayas usually peaks during the Indian summer. However, they are unique in winter with large amounts of snow and offer skiing and snowboarding activities.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Bandargohga yetib borganingizda hammasi yetarlicha aniq bo'lishiga ishonch hosil qiling. Siz boshqa avtostopchilarni uchratasiz va ular siz bilan o'z ma'lumotlarini baham ko'rishadi. Umuman olganda siz yordamingizni taklif qilib, doklarni aylanib, yaxtalarini tozalayotgan odamlr, bardagi kemachilar bilan aloqaga kirishishga urinib xabar tarqatasiz. Imkoni boricha ko'proq odam bilan gaplashishga harakat qiling. Ma'lum vaqtdan keyin barcha siz haqingizda biladi va qaysi qayiq biror kimni izlayotganligi haqida maslahatlar beradi.
mt: When you arrive at the port, everything will be clear. You will not find other hitchhikers and they will not ask you about your information. In general, you will not try to communicate with the people who are cleaning the yachts, the people who are working in the bar, the people who are working in the shipyard. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while, everyone will know about you and will give you advice about which ship is looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Gonkong oroli Gonkong hududiga o'zining nomini tortiq qilgan hamda u ko'pgina sayohatchilar asosiy e'tibor qaratadigan yerdir. Gonkong gorizont chizig'ini hosil qiluvchi binolar tizmasi Viktoriya porti suvlarining mavjudligi sababli aniq ko'rinadigan yaltiroq shtrixli jadvalga o'xshatilgan. Gonkongning eng yaxshi manzarasini ko'rish uchun oroldan chiqib, qarama-qarshi tarafda joylashgan Koulun sohiliga boring. Gonkong orolidagi shaharsozlik taraqqiyotining katta qismi shimoliy sohil bo'ylab o'zlashtirilgan yerlarda zich joylashgan. Bu ingliz mustamlakachilari o'ziniki deb bilgan joy, shunday ekan, agar siz hududning mustamlaka bo'lgan o'tmishiga dalil diqirayotgan bo'lsangiz, bu yer boshlash uchun yaxshi joydir.
mt: Hong Kong is a peninsula that juts out into the South China Sea, and is the main focus of many tourists. The skyline of Hong Kong is a grid of skyscrapers that is visible across the waters of Victoria Harbour. The best view of Hong Kong is from the other side of the island, at Kowloon's waterfront. Most of the city's development has been on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is where the British colonists settled, so if you are interested in Hong Kong's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Egarning har ikkala tomonidan osilib turuvchi chavandoz oyoqlari uchun tayanch uzangdir. Ular chavandozga mahkamroq o'rnashish imkonini taqdim etadi, lekin chavandozning oyoqlari ularga tiqilib qolishi xavfi tufayli xavfsizlik masalasida xavotir uyg'otishi mumkin. Agar chavandoz otdan irg'itib ketsa-yu, oyog'i uzangiga ilinib qolsa, ot qochib ketgan hollarda u sudralib ketilishi mumkin. Bu xavfni kamaytirish uchun bir qatoq ehtiyotkorlik choralarini ko'rish mumkin. Avvalo, aksariyat chavandozlar poshnali, tekis, yetarli darajadagi tor tagcharmli chavandoz etigini kiyishadi. Shuningdek, ba'zi egarlarda, xususan, ingliz egarlarida, agar yiqilayotgan otliq tomonidan orqaga tortilsa, uzangi terisini egardan tushib qolishiga imkon beradigan xavfsizlik kamari mavjud.
mt: The stirrup is a support for the stirrup leathers. It helps the stirrup to stay in place, but the stirrup leathers can be dangerous. If the stirrup leathers are too long, the stirrup can slip off and the horse can run away. This can be prevented by taking some precautions. Most riders wear a leather girth, which is flat and wide enough. Also, some riding schools, especially English riding schools, have a safety net, which prevents the stirrup leathers from falling off.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Mehmondo'stlik almashinuvi tarmog'i sayyohlarni ular bormoqchi bo'lgan shaharlardagi tub aholi bilan bog'lovchi tashkilot hisoblanadi. Bu kabi tarmoqqa qo'shilish odatda shunchaki onlayn shaklni to'ldirishni talab etadi; garchi ayrim tarmoqlar qo'shimcha tekshirishni taklif yoki talab qilsa ham. Mavjud mezbonlar ro'yxati bosma va/yoki onlayn shaklda, ba'zida boshqa sayyohlarning tavsiyalari va sharhlari bilan birga beriladi. Couchsurfing 2004-yilning yanvar oyida kompyuter dasturchisi Keysi Fenton Islandiyaga arzon reys topib, tunab qolishga joy topa olmaganidan keyin tashkil qilingan. U mahalliy universitetdagi talabalarga elektron pochta orqali xat yubordi va bepul turar joy uchun nihoyatda ko'p takliflar qabul qildi.
mt: Couchsurfing is a hospitality exchange network, which connects travelers with local residents. Joining such a network usually requires only online registration; although some networks may require additional screening. A list of available hosts is provided in print and/or online, sometimes with reviews and recommendations from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 by computer programmer Casey Fenton after he found a cheap flight to Iceland and couldn't find a place to stay, and sent an email to students at the local university asking for a place to stay. He received a large number of offers.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Hostellar birinchi navbatda yoshlarga — odatda yigirma yoshlarda bo'lgan mehmonlarga xizmat ko'rsatadi, lekin u yerda ko'pincha keksa sayohatchilarni ham uchratishingiz mumkin. Bolali oilalarni kamdan-kam hollarda ko'rish mumkin, lekin ayrim hostellar ularning shaxsiy xonalarda qolishiga ruxsat beradi.
mt: Hostels primarily serve young people — usually in their twenties — but you may occasionally encounter elderly travelers. Families with children are rarely seen, but some hostels allow them to stay in their private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Bumerang uloqtirish — ko'plab sayyohlar o'rganishni xohlaydigan ommabop ko'nikmadir. Agarda qo'lingizga qaytib keluvchi bumerangni otishni o'rganmoqchi bo'lsangiz, qaytishi uchun mos bumerangga egaligingizga ishonch hosil qiling. Avstraliyada mavjud bo'lgan bumeranglar aslida qaytib kelmaydigan bo'ladi. Boshlovchilar uni shamolda uloqtirmaslikka harakat qilgan yaxshi.
mt: Bouncing a boomerang is a popular tourist pastime. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang that comes back, you need to trust that the boomerang you have is one that will come back. Boomerangs in Australia are not designed to come back. The guides will not throw them in the wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Indoneziya taomlari, 17 000 ta oroldan tanlash imkoniyati bo'lgani sababli, butun mamlakatda uchraydigan turfa xil mahalliy taomlarni o'z ichiga oluvchi soyabon atamadir. Biroq, bu atama qo'shimcha ta'riflarsiz aslida asosiy Yava orolining markaziy va sharqiy qismlaridan kelib chiqqan taom nomini anglatishga moyil. Hozirda butun arxipelag bo'ylab keng tarqalagan Yava oshxonasi oddiy ziravorlar qo'shilgan taomlardan iborat, yavaliklar yaxshi ko'radigan asosiy ziravorlar yeryong'oq, chili qalampiri, shakar (ayniqsa Yava kokos yong'og'idan olinadigan shakar) va turli xushbo'y ziravorlardir.
mt: 17,000 islands in Indonesia, the term nasi goreng refers to a variety of local dishes found throughout the country. However, this term actually refers to a main dish from the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Today, the Javanese cuisine consists of dishes with simple spices, Javanese people like good spicy food, the main spices are ginger, chili pepper, sugar (especially from Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Tibbiy jargon bilan notanish bo'lganlar uchun infeksion va yuqumli so'zlari turli xil ma'noga ega hisoblanadi. Yuqumli kasallik — virus, bakteriya, zamburug' yoki boshqa parazitlar singari patogen qo'zg'atuvchi kasallikdir. Yuqumli kasallik — bu kasallangan odamning yaqinida bo'lish bilan osongina yuqadigan kasallikdir. Ko'plab hukumatlar o'z davlatlariga kiruvchi mehmonlarni yoki jo'nab ketayotgan aholini bir qancha kasalliklarga qarshi emlashni talab qilishmoqda. Mazkur talablar ko'p hollarda sayyohning qaysi davlatlarga tashrif buyurganligi yoki tashrif buyurmoqchiligiga bog'liq bo'ladi.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, infectious and contagious words are often used interchangeably. An infectious disease is one caused by a virus, bacteria, fungus or other pathogen. A contagious disease is one that can be easily caught by being near an infected person. Many governments require visitors or departing citizens to be vaccinated against a number of diseases before entering or leaving their country. These requirements often depend on which countries the visitor is visiting or visiting.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Shaxsiy VPN (virtual shaxsiy tarmoq) provayderlari ham siyosiy senzurani, ham tijoriy IP-geofiltrlashni aylanib o'tishning ajoyib usulidir. Bir qancha sabablarga ko'ra, ular veb proksi-serverlardan afzaldir: Ular faqatgina http'ni emas, balki butun internet trafikni qayta yo'naltiradi. Ular odatda yuqoriroq tarmoq kengligi va yaxshiroq xizmat ko'rsatish sifatini taklif qilishadi. Ular shifrlangani sababli ularni kuzatish mushkulroq.
mt: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are great ways to circumvent both political censorship and commercial IP geoblocking. For a number of reasons, they are preferable to web proxies: They redirect not just http, but the entire internet traffic. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted, so they are harder to monitor.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Siz o'zingiz yashaydigan yoki sayohat qilayotgan yeringizda joylashgan telefon kompaniyasidan foydalanishingiz shart emas, chunki qo'ng'iroqlar internet orqali yo'naltiriladi. O'zingiz yashaydigan hamjamiyatdan mahalliy raqamni olishingiz kerakligi to'g'risidagi talab ham mavjud emas; Chiken, Alyaskaning yovvoyi tabiatida sun'iy yo'ldoshli internet ulanishini olishingiz va sizning quyoshli Arizonada ekanligingizni tasdiqlovchi raqamni tanlashingiz mumkin. Ko'p hollarda, PSTN telefonlari uchun sizga qo'ng'iroq qilish imkonini beruvchi global raqamni alohida xarid qilishingizga to'g'ri keladi. Raqamning qayerdan ekanligi sizga qo'ng'iroq qilayotganlar uchun ahamiyatga ega.
mt: You do not have to use the phone company that serves your area or country, as calls are routed over the internet. You can obtain a local number from your local community, even if you are in the wilds of Alaska, or you can choose a number that indicates you are in sunny Arizona. In many cases, PSTN phones require you to purchase a global number that will allow you to be called. The location of the number is important to those calling you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Italyan tilida so'zlarning talaffuzi nisbatan osonroq, chunki aksar so'zlar qanday yozilsa, shunday talaffuz qilinadi. Ehtiyot bo'lish lozim bo'lgan asosiy harflar c va g, chunki ularning talaffuzi o'zidan keyin keladigan unli harfga qarab o'zgaradi. Shu bilan birga, r va rr harflarini talaffuz qilishda ularning farqiga ishonch hosil qiling: caro qadrdon degan ma'noni anglatadi, carro esa jang aravasi degan ma'noni bildiradi.
mt: Italian words are relatively easy to pronounce, as they are usually pronounced as they are written. The main exceptions are the letters c and g, which change their pronunciation depending on the vowel that follows them. Also, be careful with the letters r and rr, as they have different meanings: caro means "dear", while carro means "carriage".
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir 3,7 millionga yaqin aholisi bilan Turkiyadagi uchinchi eng katta shahar, Istambuldan keyingi ikkinchi eng katta port va juda yaxshi transport markazi hisoblanadi. Bir vaqtlar qadimiy shahar bo'lgan Smirna hozirda yirik ko'rfaz atrofida joylashgan hamda tog'lar bilan o'ralgan zamonaviy, rivojlangan va tig'iz savdo markazidir. Garchi shahar o'zida an'anaviy Turkiyadan ko'ra o'rta Yer dengizi Yevropasi muhitini ko'proq aks ettirsa-da, keng bulvarlar, oynavand binolar va zamonaviy savdo markazlar an'anaviy qizil plitkali tomlar, 18-asr bozorlari, eski masjid va cherkovlarga to'la.
mt: 3.7 million people, Izmir is the third largest city in Turkey, after Istanbul, the second largest port and very well developed transport center. Once a ancient city, Smirna is now a modern, developed and dense trade center surrounded by a large bay and mountains. Although the city itself reflects the Mediterranean European environment more than traditional Turkey, wide boulevards, glassy buildings and modern shopping centers are full of traditional red tiled roofs, 18th century markets, old mosques and churches.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Hanami deb ataluvchi olcha gullarini tomosha qilish 8-asrdan buyon yapon madaniyatining bir bo'lagi bo'lib kelmoqda. Bu tushuncha olxo'ri guli tanlov guli bo'lgan Xitoydan kelgan. Yaponiyada dastlabki olcha guli bazmlari imperator tomonidan faqat o'zi va Imperiya sudi atrofidagi aristokratiyaning boshqa a'zolari uchun tashkillashtirilgan.
mt: Hanami, the viewing of cherry blossoms, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The term was originally used to describe the plum blossom, which was imported from China. The first cherry blossom viewing parties were organized by the emperor for himself and other members of the aristocracy.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
