src: Quddus Isroilning eng katta shahri hamda poytaxti sanaladi, biroq aksariyat boshqa davlatlar hamda Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti bu shaharni Isroil poytaxti sifatida tan olmaydi. Yahudiy tog'laridagi qadimiy shahar minglab yillarni qamrab olgan maftunkor tarixga ega. Shahar uch yakkaxudolik dinlari — yahudiylik, xristianlik hamda islom dinlari uchun muqaddas sanaladi va ma'naviy, diniy, madaniy markaz sifatida xizmat qiladi. Shaharning diniy ahamiyatga egaligi, xususan, Eski shaharning ko'plab diqqatga sazovor joylari sababli Quddus Isroilning asosiy sayyohlik manzillaridan biridir. Quddusda jo'shqin hamda gavjum savdo do'konlar, kafelar va restoranlar bilan birga, ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik hamda madaniy joylar ham bor.
mt: Quddus is the largest city in Israel and its capital. However, most other states and the United Nations do not recognize Quddus as the capital of Israel. The ancient city of the Jewish mountains has a history of thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three monotheistic religions of Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. The importance of the city, especially the Old City, with its many tourist attractions, is the main tourist destination in Quddus. Quddus has shops, cafes and restaurants with loving and crowded shops, as well as many historical, archaeological and cultural sites.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Kruger Milliy parki (KMP) Janubiy Afrikaning shimoliy-sharqida joylashgan va sharqda Mozambik, shimolda Zimbabve bilan chegara chegaradosh, janubiy chegarasi esa Timsoh daryosidir. Bog' 19 500 km² maydonni qamrab olgan hamda har biri turlicha yovvoyi tabiatni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi 14 ta ekohududga bo'lingan. U Januniy Afrikadagi asosiy diqqatga sazovor manzillardan biridir hamda Janubiy Afrika Milliy parklarining (SANParks) flagmani sanaladi. Olimlar ayni shu usulda energiya ishlab chiqara oladigan reaktor yaratish ustida ish olib bormoqdalar. Janubiy Afikaning tanlangan bog'lariga yoki Janubiy afrikaning barcha milliy bog'lariga kirish imkoniyatini beruvchi Wild Card'ni sotib olish foydali bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: Kruger National Park (KMP) is located in northern South Africa and borders Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north and the southern border is the Timsoh river. The park covers an area of 19 500 km² and is divided into 14 different eco-regions, each with its own unique wildlife. It is one of the main tourist attractions in South Africa and is the flagship of the South African National Parks (SANParks). Scientists are working on creating a reactor that can produce energy. It is possible to buy a Wild Card, which gives you access to selected parks or all national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Machu-Pikchuning shimoliy uchidan tepaga ko'tarilgan mazkur tik tog' ko'p hollarda vayronalarning ko'plab suratlariga fon bo'ladi. Bu pastdan bir oz vahimali ko'rinadi va tik hamda mashaqqatli ko'tarilishdir, ammo bardam odamlar buni deyarli 45 daqiqada bosib o'tishlari kerak. Yo'lning katta qismiga tosh zinalar yotqizilgan va qiyaroq bo'limlarida po'lat kabellar tayanch bo'luvchi tutqich vazifasini bajaradi. Shunday bo'lsa-da, nafasingiz tiqilib qolishi mumkinligini hisobga oling va tikroq qismlarda, ayniqsa, yog'ingarchilik payti ehtiyot bo'ling, chunki tezda yurish xavfli bo'lib qolishi mumkin. Yuqorida kichik g'or bo'lib, u orqali o'tish lozim, u juda past va anchagina tor.
mt: This steep trail up the north side of Machu Picchu is often the background for many photos of ruins. It looks very steep and difficult from the bottom, but it can be done in about 45 minutes by fit people. Most of the trail is paved with stone steps and the steeper sections are supported by steel cables. However, be prepared for a strenuous climb and be careful in the steeper sections, especially during rainy season, as it can be slippery and dangerous to run. There is a small cave above, which you have to go through, it is very low and narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Mayorka oshxonasi, o'rta Yer dengizidagi shu kabi hududlar singari, non, sabzavotlar va go'shtga (ayniqsa cho'chqa go'shti) asoslanadi va doim zaytun moyidan foydalaniladi. Ayniqsa yoz oylarida ommabop oddiy kechki ovqat bu Pa amb Olidir: zaytun yog'i, pomidor hamda pishloq, tunesva boshqalar qo'shimchalar bilan tortilgan non.
mt: Mayonnaise is a staple of the cuisine of the Balearic Islands, as it is in other Mediterranean regions, and is used extensively in the preparation of dishes, especially in the summer months. The most popular evening meal is Pa amb oli: bread, olive oil, tomato and cheese, with other additions such as tuna.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Xangi taomi yerdagi qaynoq chuqurda pishiriladi. O'ra olovdan qizigan issiq toshlar bilan isiydi yoki ayrim joylarda geotermal issiqlik yer maydonlarini tabiiy isitadi. Hangi ko'pincha odatiy qovurilgan uslubdagi kechki ovqatni pishirishda foydalaniladi. Rotoruadagi bir nechta joylar gerotermal xangini taqdim etadi, qolgan xangilarni Vellingtondagi Krayschyorchda va boshqa joylarda tatib ko'rish mumkin.
mt: The dish is cooked in a boiling cauldron on the ground. It is sometimes steamed with hot stones from the fire pit or in some places natural geothermal heat heats the ground. Hangi is often used in the traditional method of cooking a night meal. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, the rest can be found in Christchurch and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Ibodatxonalarga tashrif qilish vaqtida ayollardan tizzalarini berkitishlari uchun yubka kiyish va yelkalarini ham yopib olish talab qilinadi. Monastirlarning katta qismi tayyorgarliksiz kelgan ayollarga ro'mollar beradi, biroq agar siz o'zingiznikini, ayniqsa, yorqin rangdagisini olib kelsangiz, kirishda rohib yoki rohibaning tabassumini qabul qilib olasiz. Xuddi shu tarzda, erkaklar tizzalarni yopib turuvchi shim kiyishlari lozim. Buni kirishdagi tayyor mahsulotlar omboridan ijaraga olish ham mumkin, biroq u kiyim har bir foydalanuvchidan keyin yuvilmaydi, shuning uchun bu yubkalarni kiyish sizga noqulaylik tug'dirishi mumkin. Bitta o'lcham hamma erkaklarga mos keladi!
mt: When visiting temples, women are required to wear skirts and cover their shoulders. Most monasteries provide robes for those who are unprepared, but if you bring your own, preferably bright colored, you will be welcomed by a monk or nun. Similarly, men are required to wear a shirt that covers their shoulders. This can be rented from the ready-made goods store at the entrance, but it is not washed after each use, so wearing these robes may be uncomfortable for you. One size fits all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Qish faslida Arktika yoki Antarktika hududiga kelsansiz, qutb tuniga guvoh bo'lishingiz mumkin, ya'ni quyosh ufqdan yuqori ko'tarilmaydi. Bu Qutb yog'dularini ko'rish uchun yaxshi imkoniyat taklif etadi, chunki osmon sutka davomida ozmi-ko'pmi qorong'i bo'ladi. Hududlarda aholi siyrakligi tufayli, yorug'lik ifloslanishi ko'p hollarda muammo bo'lmaydi, siz ham yulduzlardan zavqlana olasiz.
mt: If you don't go to the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you may see the polar night, when the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This is a good opportunity to see the aurora, as the sky is mostly dark for most of the day. Inhabited areas are usually sparsely populated, so light pollution is not usually a problem, and you can enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Uyali telefon qamrov doirasidan tashqarida bo'lgan chekka joylarda sun'iy yo'ldosh telefonlari yagona variantingiz bo'lishi mumkin. Sun'iy yo'ldosh telefoni umuman olganda mobil telefon o'rnini bosa olmaydi, chunki telefon qilish uchun sputnikni aniq ko'rib turgan holda ochiq havoda bo'lish kerak. Xizmatdan masofaviy va ovozli xabarlar kerak bo'lgan kemachilik kompaniyalari, jumladan sayr qilish kemalarida foydalanishadi. Mahalliy telefon xizmati provayderingiz bu xizmatni ulash haqida ko'proq ma'lumotlar berishi mumkin.
mt: In remote areas, satellite phones may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a substitute for a mobile phone, as it requires a clear view of the satellite to make a call. They are used by maritime companies, such as cruise ships, that need to send and receive voice communications. Your local phone provider may be able to provide more information about this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldova poytaxti Kishinyov. Mahalliy til rumin tili bo'lsa-da, rus tili keng qo'llaniladi. Moldova etnik ziddiyatlardan aziyat chekkan ko'p millatli respublikadir. Bu ziddiyat 1994-yilda Moldovaning sharqida o'z hukumati va valyutasiga ega bo'lgan, biroq BMTga a'zo mamlakatlarning hech biri tomonidan tan olinmagan Pridnestrovye Respublikasining yaratilishiga olib keldi. Siyosiy muzokaralarning muvaffaqiyatsizligiga qaramasdan, Moldovaning mazkur ikki qismi o'rtasida iqtisodiy munosabatlar qayta tiklandi. Moldovadagi asosiy din pravoslav nasroniylikdir.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chisinau. Although the local language is Romanian, Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered ethnic strife. This strife led to the creation in 1994 of a breakaway republic in the east of Moldova, Pridnestrovye, which has its own government and currency but is not recognized by any member of the United Nations. Despite the failure of political negotiations, economic relations between the two parts of Moldova have been restored. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Montevideo Ekvatorning janubida bo'lgani tufayli Shimoliy yarim sharda qish bo'lganida, u yerda yoz bo'ladi va aksincha. Montevideo subtropikada joylashgan; yoz oylarida harorat +30°C dan yuqori bo'lishi odatiy hol. Qish chalg'itadigan sovuq bo'lishi mumkin: haroratlar kamdan-ham hollarda muzlash nuqtasidan pastga tushadi, biroq shamol va namlik birlashgan holda termometr ko'rsatganiga qaraganda sovuqroqdek tuyulishi mumkin. Alohida ""yomg'irli"" va ""quruq"" fasllar bo'lmaydi: yomg'ir miqdori yil davomida deyarli bir xilligicha qoladi."
mt: "Montevideo is in the Southern Hemisphere, so it is summer when it is winter in the Northern Hemisphere. Montevideo is subtropical; summer temperatures are often above +30°C. Winter can be chilly: temperatures can drop below freezing, but the wind and humidity can make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are no distinct "rainy" and "dry" seasons: rainfall is nearly constant throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Xush ko'rilmaydigan devoriy tasvirlar va aji-buji yozuvlar grafiti sifatida tanilgan. Zamonaviy hodisadan uzoq bo'lsa-da, aksariyat odamlar, ehtimol, buni sepma bo'yoqlar yordamida jamoatchilik va xususiy mulkka zarar yetkazuvchi yoshlar bilan bog'laydi. Ammo bugungi kunda taniqli grafiti musavvirlari, grafiti tadbirlar va ""qonuniy"" devorlar bor. Mazkur kontekstdagi grafiti suratlari ko'pincha tushunarsiz teglarga emas, balki san'at asarlariga o'xshaydi."
mt: "Unpleasant wall images and aji-buji writings are known as graffiti. Although this is a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with young people causing damage to public and private property with spray paint. But today there are well-known graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. In this context, graffiti images are not usually tags, but rather resemble works of art."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Ayrim festivallar uchun, musiqa festivallari ishtirokchilarining katta qismi hududda lager qurishga qaror qiladi va aksariyat ishtirokchilar buni mazkur tajribaning muhim qismi deb hisoblaydi. Agar siz harakatga yaqin bo'lishni xohlasangiz, musiqaga yagin lager joyini qo'lga kiritish uchun ertaroq kirishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Shuni yodda tutingki, garchi asosiy sahnadagi musiqa tugagan bo'lsa ham, festivalning yarim tungacha musiqa ijrosi davom etiladigan bo'limlari bo'lishi mumkin. Ayrim festivallarda yosh bolalari bo'lgan oilalar uchun maxsus kemping hududlari mavjud bo'ladi.
mt: For some festivals, most of the festival-goers decide to camp in the area and most of the festival-goers consider this part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you should arrive early. Keep in mind that even though the main stage music may have ended, there may be other stages with music playing for the rest of the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Ko'plab pueblolarning qanchalik uzoq masofada ekanligini inobatga olsak, siz Albukerke yoki Santa Fega sayohat qilmasdan turib, tungi hayotning sezilarli qismini topa olmaysiz. Lekin yuqorida sanalgan qariyb barcha kazinolar ichimliklar taklif qiladi va ularning ba'zilari o'yin-kulgi brendlarini vujudga keltiradi (asosan, Alkuberka va Santa-Fe atrofida joylashgan katta kazinolar). Ogoh bo'ling: bu yerdagi kichik shahar barlari shtatlik bo'lmagan tashrif buyuruvchilar aylanishi uchun har doim ham yaxshi joylar emas. Bir tomondan, shimoliy Nyu-Meksikoda mast holda transport vositalarini boshqarish bilan bog'liq anchagina muammolar bor va kichik shahar barlari yaqinida mast haydovchilar soni ko'p.
mt: Despite the fact that many pueblos are quite far away, you can't really experience much of the nightlife without going to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, most of the casinos offer drinks and some of them offer brand-name entertainment (mostly in the larger casinos in Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Be advised: these small town bars are not always the best places to bring in out-of-state tourists. On the one hand, there are quite a few problems with drunk driving in Northern New Mexico and there are a lot of drunk drivers in the small town bars near the pueblos.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "Asosiy mahalliy pivo ""Birinchi raqami"" bo'lib, u murakkab profilli pivo emas, lekin yoqimli va tetiklantiruvchi. Ikkinchi mahalliy pivoning nomi ""Manta"". Ichishga ko'p fransuz vinolari bor, biroq Yangi Zelandiya va Avstraliya vinolari yo'lda yaxshiroq ketishi mumkin. Mahalliy jo'mrak suvi butunlay xavfsiz, ammo qo'rqsangiz, shisha idishdagi suvni topish oson. ""Yassi oq"" qahva g'oyasi avstraliyaliklar uchun begona. ""Espresso"" qora pakana deb nomlanadi, kapuchino qaymoq (ko'pik bilan emas) bilan to'ldirligan bo'ladi, choy esa sutsiz beriladi. Issiq shokolad Belgiya talablariga mos. Meva sharbatlari qimmat bo'lsa-da, a'lo."
mt: "The main local beer is called "Number One" which is not a complex profiled beer, but refreshing and stimulating. The second local beer is called "Manta". There are many French wines to drink, but New Zealand and Australian wines are better on the way. Local mineral water is completely safe, but if you are thirsty, you can find bottled water easily. "Flat white" is a coffee idea for Australians. "Espresso" is called black coffee, which is filled with milk (not with cream) and tea is served without sugar. Hot chocolate is Belgian. Fruit juices are expensive but good."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Guarani hozirgi Sharqiy Paragvay tuprog'ida istiqomat qiluvchi eng muhim tub jamoa bo'lgan hamda yordamchi qishloq xo'jaligi bilan shug'ullanuvchi yarim-ko'chmanchi ovchilar sifatida hayot kechirgan. Chako mintaqasida Guaykuru va Payagua kabi mahalliy qabilalarning boshqa guruhlari yashab, ular ovchilik, termachilik va baliq ovlash orqali hayotlarini saqlab qolishgan. Ilgari ""Hindlarning ulkan provinsiyasi"" deb atalgan Paragvay 16-asrda ispan bosqinchilarining mahalliy aholi guruhlari bilan to'qnashuvi natijasida yuzaga kelgan. Ispanlar 3 asrga cho'zilgan mustamlakachilik davrini boshlashdi. 1537-yili Asunson tashkil topganidan beri Paragvay o'zining tub xususiyatlari va o'ziga xosligining katta qismini saqlab qolishga muvaffaq bo'ldi."
mt: "The Guarani are the most important indigenous group living in the current Eastern Paraguay, and they have lived as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers and subsistence farmers. Other local tribes such as the Guaykuru and Payagua lived in the Chaco region, and they survived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. Paraguay, formerly known as the "Great Province of the Indies", was formed by the local indigenous groups clashing with the Spanish invaders in the 16th century. The Spanish began a 3-century long colonial era in 1537, when Asuncion was founded. Paraguay has managed to preserve much of its unique and indigenous character since then."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Parijliklar xudbin, qo'pol va dimog'dorligi bilan tanilgan. Bu ko'pincha faqat noaniq stereotip bo'lgani holda Parijda yurishning eng yaxshi usuli hali ham eng yaxshi ahloq-odobda bo'lish, ""bien eleve"" (yaxshi tarbiya ko'rgan) shaxslar kabi harakat qilishdir. Bu aylanib yurishni anchagina osonlashtiradi. Agar siz bir oz iltifot qilsangiz, parijliklarning keskin tashqi qiyofasi biz zumda g'oyib bo'ladi."
mt: "Parisians are known for their rudeness, cruelty and lack of consideration. This is often only a vague stereotype when walking in Paris is the best way to behave like a "bien eleve" (well-bred) person. This makes walking much easier. If you are a little polite, the harsh external appearance of the Parisians will disappear."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail Keyptaun atrofida qatnovchi poyezdlarning ikki sinfiga ega: MetroPlus (Birinchi sinf deb ham ataladi) va Metro (Uchinchi sinf deb ham ataladi). MetroPlus yanada qulay va u qadar tiqilinch emas, lekin bir oz qimmatroq, shunga qaramay, Yevropadagi odatiy metro chiptalaridan arzonroq. Poyezdlarning har biriga MetroPlus va Metro vagonlari ulangan bo'lib, MetroPlus vagonlari doimo Keyptaun tomon eng yaqin poyezdning oxiriga joylashtiriladi.
mt: MetroRail in Cape Town has two classes of trains: MetroPlus (also known as First Class) and Metro (also known as Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but also more expensive, though still cheaper than typical European metro tickets. Each train has MetroPlus and Metro carriages, with MetroPlus carriages always placed at the front of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Sayyohlar o'z mintaqalarida noma'lum bo'lgan hayvon parazitlariga duch kelishlari mumkin. Zararkunandalar oziq-ovqat mahsulotlarini buzishi, qichishishga sabab bo'lishi yoki bundan-da yomonroq holatlarda, allergik reaksiyalarga sabab bo'lishi, zahar tarqatishi yoki infeksiya yuqtirishi mumkin. Yuqumli kasalliklarning o'zi yoxud kuch bilan insonlarni jarohatlashi yoxud halok qilishi mumkin bo'lgan xavfli hayvonlar odatda zararkunandalar toifasiga kiritilmaydi.
mt: Travelers may encounter unfamiliar animal parasites in their destinations. Pests can contaminate food, bite, cause allergic reactions, spread toxins, or transmit infections. Dangerous animals that can kill or injure humans are not usually classified as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Har bir burchak do'kon pullik telefonlar yoki odatiy telefonlardan foydalansa bo'ladigan oldindan to'lash telefon kartalarining chalkash qatori bilan to'la. Ko'pchilik kartalar istalgan joyga qo'ng'iroq qilish uchun juda mos bo'lgani holda ayrimlari ma'lum mamlakatlar guruhi uchun foydali qo'ng'iroq narxlarini taqim etadi. Mazkur xizmatlardan foydalanish, ko'pincha, aksariyat telefonlardan bepul qo'ng'iroq qilish mumkin bo'lgan bepul telefon raqamlari orqali amalga oshiriladi.
mt: Each corner is filled with a row of prepaid phone cards or ordinary phones that can be used to make calls in advance. Most cards are useful for calling a group of countries for a certain price. Using these services, free calls are often possible through free phone numbers.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvits ko'llari milliy bog'i qalin o'rmonlarga ega, unda asosan qora qayin, qoraqarag'ay, archa daraxtlari mavjud va unda Alp va o'rta yer dengizi hududi o'simliklari bor. U o'zining bir qator mikroiqlimlari, farq qiluvchi tuproqlari va turli darajalardagi balandligi tufayli sezilarli darajada keng o'simlik turlariga egadir. Hudud juda keng turdagi hayvonlar va qush turlari uchun vatandir. Bu yerdan ko'pgina keng tarqalgan turlar bilan qatorda qo'ng'ir ayiq, bo'ri, burgut, boyo'g'li, silovsin, yovvoyi mushuk va karqur kabi Yevropaning noyon faunasini topish mumkin.
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is a forested national park in central Croatia. The park was founded in 1949 and is in the Lika-Senj County. It is named after a chain of 16 lakes linked by a series of cascading waterfalls. The lakes are all different sizes and are all different depths and the water is of different colours ranging from black to azure and green. The sixteen lakes are all at different levels, due to small rivers and streams that are diverting water into lower lakes. The waters of the lakes are also in different stages of oxidation. The lakes are separated into upper and lower lakes. The upper lakes are more acidic and have no algae. The lower lakes are less acidic and have algae. The lakes are separated by natural dams of travertine, deposited by the action of the water on the limestone. The water flows from the upper lakes to the lower lakes, and then down to Korana River. The lakes are the most famous for the blue colour of the water. The colour is due to the reflection of the sunlight by the limestone and the high concentration of calcium carbonate in it. The lakes are also famous for the travertine barriers, which are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers are built by the water itself, depositing calcium carbonate on the small plants growing on the lakes' bottom. The travertine barriers
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Media kompaniyalari ""qaroqchilikni oldini olish"" uchunligini da'vo qilib, buning maqsadi haqida muntazam ravishda yolg'on gapirishadi. Hududiy kodlar noqonuniy nusxalashga umuman ta'sir ko'rsatmaydi; diskning bitma-bit qilingan nusxasi har qanday qurilmada asl nusxasi kabi yaxshi ishlaydi. Asl maqsad mazkur kompaniyalarga o'z bozorlari ustidan kengroq nazoratni berishdir; barchasi mablag' aylanishi bilan bog'liq."
mt: "Media companies claim that they are 'fighting piracy' for the sake of the public good, but they are constantly lying about the purpose of this. Local codes have no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk works just as well in any device as the original. The real goal is to give these companies greater control over their markets; it's all about money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: O'z yurtingizga yetib kelganingizda, odatda immigratsiya tekshiruvi bo'lmasa yoki rasmiylashtirilmasa-da, bojxona nazorati qiyin kechishi mumkin. Nimani olib kirishingiz mumkin va nimani olib kirishingiz mumkin emasligini bilib olganingizga amin bo'ling va qonuniy me'yorlardan ortiq har qanday narsani taqdim qiling.
mt: When you arrive in your country, it is possible that customs inspection may be difficult, even if you are not inspected or legalized. Be sure you know what you can and cannot bring with you and do not exceed any legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Koxamo vodiysi — Janubiy Amerikaning Yosemiti deb nomlangan, turli granitli yirik devorlar va qoyalarga ega bo'lgan Chilining toqqa chiqish uchun asosiy manzilidir. Cho'qqilar eng yuqori nuqtalardan ajoyib ko'rinishlarni o'z ichiga oladi. Butun dunyodan kelgan alpinistlar uning devorlariga oid cheksiz imkoniyatlar orasidan doim yangi yo'nalishlarni ochmoqdalar.
mt: The Coquimbo region is the main gateway to Chile's Yosemite, a region of large granite walls and peaks. The summits offer spectacular views from the highest points. Alpinists from all over the world have been opening new routes in the walls, exploring endless possibilities.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Agar siz janubiy yarimshar bo'ylab to'liq parvoz qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, transokean yo'nalishlarning yo'qligi tufayli parvozlar va manzillar tanlovi cheklangan bo'ladi. Hech qaysi aviakompaniya ittifoqi Janubiy Yarimshardagi barcha uchta okeanni kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi (va SkyTeam birorta kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi). Biroq Star Alliance aviakompaniyasi, LATAM Oneworld reysi bo'lgan janubiy Tinch okeanining sharqiy qismi Santyago de Chilidan Taitigacha reysidan tashqari, barchasini qamrab oladi. Agar siz Janubiy Tinch okeani va Janubiy Amerika g'arbiy qirg'og'ini chetlab o'tmoqchi bo'lsangiz, bu reys yagona variant emas. (pastga qarang)
mt: If you are planning a full circumnavigation of the Southern Hemisphere, you will be limited in your choice of routes and destinations. No airline alliance covers all three transoceanic crossings (and SkyTeam covers none). However, Star Alliance covers all but the southern Pacific Ocean crossing from Santiago, Chile to Taipei, Taiwan, which is served by LATAM Oneworld. If you are planning to circumnavigate the Southern Pacific Ocean and South America's west coast, this is not your only option. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: "Xalqaro miqyosda 200 ga yaqin ishlab turgan sayyohlik tashkilotlari bor. Ularning aksariyati mustaqil faoliyat yuritadi. ""Global yugurish turlari"" vorisi — ""Yugurishga chiq turlari"" to'rt qit'ada o'nlab tomoshaviy yugurish provayderlarini birlashtiradi. Ildizi Barselonaning ""Barselona yugurish turlari"" va Kopengagenning ""Kopengagenda yugurish"" iga borib taqalgan, tez orada unga Pragada joylashgan ""Praga yugurish turlari"" va boshqalar qo'shildi."
mt: 200 or more tour operators are active on an international level. Most of them operate independently. "The successor to the "Global Runs" - "Run to the Run" unites dozens of tourist shows in four continents. The roots of "Run to the Run" are in Barcelona's "Barcelona Run" and Copenhagen's "Copenhagen Run", soon to be joined by Prague's "Prague Run" and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Safarilar, ehtimol, Afrikaning eng katta sayyohlik jozibasi va ko'plab tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun eng diqqatga sazovor joydir. Hammaga tanish safari atamasi Afrikaning ajoyib hayvonot olami, xususan, savannani tomosha qilish uchun quruqlik bo'ylab sayohatga taalluqli. Ayrim hayvonlar, masalan, fillar va jirafalar mashinalarga yaqin kelishga moyil hamda standart uskunalar yaxshi tomosha qilish imkonini beradi. Sherlar, gepardlar va leopardlar ba'zan tortinchoq bo'ladi va siz ularni durbin orqali yaxshiroq ko'rasiz. ""Yuruvchi safari"" (""buta yurish"", ""piyoda safari"" yoki ""piyoda yurish"" deb ham ataladi) bir necha soatlik yoxud bir necha kunlik piyoda sayr qilishdan iborat."
mt: "Travellers, perhaps, Africa's greatest tourist attraction and many visitors for the most interesting place. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes are close to the vehicles and standard equipment is well worth watching. Lions, cheetahs and leopards sometimes get angry and you see them better through binoculars. ""Walking safari"" (""bush walk"", ""foot safari"" or ""foot walk"" is also called) is a few hours or a few days of walking tours.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: "Safarilar, ehtimol, Afrikaning eng katta sayyohlik jozibasi va ko'plab tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun eng diqqatga sazovor joydir. Hammaga tanish safari atamasi Afrikaning ajoyib hayvonot olami, xususan, savannani tomosha qilish uchun quruqlik bo'ylab sayohatga taalluqli. Ayrim hayvonlar, masalan, fillar va jirafalar mashinalarga yaqin kelishga moyil hamda standart uskunalar yaxshi tomosha qilish imkonini beradi. Sherlar, gepardlar va leopardlar ba'zan tortinchoq bo'ladi va siz ularni durbin orqali yaxshiroq ko'rasiz. ""Yuruvchi safari"" (""buta yurish"", ""piyoda safari"" yoki ""piyoda yurish"" deb ham ataladi) bir necha soatlik yoxud bir necha kunlik piyoda sayr qilishdan iborat."

Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. src: Kattaroq guruhlar uchun sayohatlar arzonroq, shu sababli o'zingiz yoki faqat bir nafar do'stingiz bilan bo'lsangiz, boshqa odamlar bilan tanishib, odam boshiga to'g'ri keluvchi narx yaxshiroq bo'lishi uchun to'rt-olti kishilik guruh tuzishga harakat qiling. Lekin bu aslida sizni bezovta qilmasligi kerak, chunki sayyohlar mashinalarni to'ldirish uchun ko'pincha aralashib ketadi. Bu ko'proq odamlarni ko'proq to'lashlari kerakligiga ishontirish usuliga o'xshaydi.
mt: Larger groups can get better prices, so if you're going alone or with just one other person, try to form a group of four or six. But don't let this discourage you, as travelers often mix and match to fill up the cars. This is akin to a sales tactic to convince you to buy more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: San-Fransisko iqtisodiyoti uning dunyo darajasidagi sayyohlik manzili ekanligi bilan bog'liq bo'lsa-da, uning iqtisodi xilma-xildir. Ish bilan ta'minlovchi eng yirik sohalar professional xizmatlar, hukumat, moliya, savdo hamda turizmdir. Musiqa, film, adabiyot va ommaviy madaniyatda ko'p aks ettirilishi shahar va uning diqqatga sazovor yerlarini dunyoga tanitishga hissa qo'shdi. San-Fransisko ko'p sonli mehmonxonalar, restoranlar hamda yuqori darajadagi anjumanlar o'tkaziladigan inshootlardan iborat yirik turizm infratuzilmasini rivojlantirgan. San-Fransisko boshqa Osiyo oshxonalari: koreys, tay, hind hamda yapon oshxonalari uchun ham mamlakatdagi eng yaxshi joylardan biridir.
mt: San Francisco's economy is largely based on tourism, and while its economy is diverse, its professional services, government, finance, and tourism are the major employers. Music, film, literature, and the performing arts have been important to the city's culture, and it has been the birthplace of various cultural trends, including the Beat Generation, the Summer of Love, and the Gay Liberation Movement. San Francisco is also a center for alternative health treatments and is the birthplace of the hippie subculture. The city is also known for its liberal politics, and is the home base of the United Nations' San Francisco Pavilion. San Francisco is also known for its high cost of living, which is the highest in the United States.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Oldindan band qilish manzilga yetib borgach, tunash uchun joy bor bo'lishini ta'minlab, sayohatchiga xotirjamlik baxsh qiladi. Garchi siz sayohat agentligi orqali kemping kabi turar-joyning boshqa shakllarini buyurtma qilishingiz mumkin bo'lsada, sayohat agentliklari ko'pincha ma'lum mehmonxonalar bilan kelishuvga ega bo'ladilar. Sayyohlik agentlari odatda nonushta, aeroportga/dan transportni tashkillashtirish yoxud hatto parvoz hamda mehmonxona xizmatlarini o'z ichiga oluvchi to'plamlarni taklif etadi. Agar sizga boradigan joyingiz uchun boshqa hujjatlarni (masalan, viza) taqdim etishingiz yoki olishingiz uchun vaqt kerak bo'lsa, ular siz uchun buyurtma qilib qo'yishlari ham mumkin. Barcha o'zgartirishlar va so'rovlar bevosita mehmonxonalarga emas, balki avval sayyohlik agentligi orqali yuborilishi kerak.
mt: 1. Check in early to ensure you have a place to sleep. While you can book camping and other forms of lodging through a travel agency, travel agencies often have agreements with specific hotels. Travel agencies often offer packages that include breakfast, airport/transportation to and from the airport, and even flights. If you need to provide or obtain additional documents (such as visas) for your destination, they may also be able to order them for you. All changes and requests should be sent directly to the travel agency, not the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Real vaqt matnli tarjimon ilovalari — matnning butun boshli segmentlarini bir tildan ikkinchisiga avtomatik tarzda tarjima qila oladigan ilovalardir. Ushbu toifadagi ba'zi ilovalar, foydalanuvchi smartfonini obyektlar tomon olib borganda, hatto real hayotdagi mazkur belgilar yoki boshqa obyektlar ustidagi chet tillarida yozilgan matnlarni ham tarjima qila oladi. Tarjima tizimlari keskin yaxshilandi va hozirda ko'pincha muayyan darajada to'g'ri tarjimalar (hamda kamdan-kam hollarda tushunarsiz) beriladi, lekin bir oz ehtiyotkorlik zarur, chunki ular hali ham hammasini noto'g'ri qabul qilgan bo'lishi mumkin. Mazkur toifadagi eng mashhur ilovalardan biri – bu Google Translate bo'lib, u zarur til ma'lumotlari yuklab olinganidan keyin oflayn tarjima qilish imkonini beradi.
mt: Real-time text translation apps — apps that automatically translate entire segments of text from one language to another. Some of these apps, when the user is using their smartphone to point at objects, can even translate text written in foreign languages on those objects in real life. Translation systems have improved greatly and now often provide fairly accurate translations (and occasionally nonsensical ones) but still require some caution, as they may still get things wrong. The most popular app of this type is Google Translate, which requires downloading language data before it can translate online.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Qor ko'chkisi g'ayritabiiy holat emas; tik qiyaliklar faqatgina juda sekin ushlab tura oladi va ortiqcha hajmdagi qor ko'chki sifatida pastga tushadi. Muammo shundaki, qor yopishqoq, shuning uchun pastga tushishi uchun unga turtki kerak bo'ladi va pastga tushayotgan qor qolganlari uchun turtki beruvchi kuch bo'lishi mumkin. Ba'zan dastlabki turtki bo'ladigan sabab quyoshning qorni isitishi, ba'zan yana qor yog'ishi, ba'zida boshqa tabiiy hodisalar, ko'pincha esa inson bo'ladi.
mt: Avalanche is not an unusual event; steep slopes can only hold so much snow before it slides down. The problem is that snow is dense, so it needs a push to slide down. The pusher of the snow that is sliding down could be the sun heating the snow, or more snow falling, or other natural events, often it is a human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Karri giyohlar hamda ziravorlar bilan birgalikda go'sht yoxud sabzavotlarga asoslangan ovqatdir. Karri suyuqlik miqdoridan kelib chiqib, ""quruq"" yoxud ""ho'l"" bo'lishi mumkin. Shimoliy Hindiston hamda Pokistonning ichki hududlarida yogurtdan odatda karrilarda foydalaniladi; Janubiy Hindistonda hamda subkontinentning boshqa ayrim qirg'oq bo'yi hududlarida kokos suti keng qo'llaniladi."
mt: "Carry is a food made from spices and meat or vegetables. The liquid content of carry can be either "dry" or "wet". In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is usually used in carry; in southern India and other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is widely used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Janubiy qutb shossesi (yoki magistral yo'li) Ross dengizidagi Mak-Merdo bekatidan qutbgacha cho'zilgan 1600 kilometrli yo'ldir. Bu qalin muz yoriqlari to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan siqilgan qor. Unda faqat yonilg'i va materiallar yordamida chanalarni tortib, ixtisoslashgan traktorlarda harakatlanish mumkin. Bular juda ildam emas, shu sababli yo'l yassi tog'likka yetib borish uchun Transantarktik tog'lar atrofidan uzun burilish olishiga to'g'ri keladi.
mt: 1600 km long South Pole Road (or Highway) is a road from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is filled with thick ice ridges and marked with flags. It can only be driven by specialized tractors with fuel and supplies to tow the channels. It is not very steep, so it is appropriate to go around the Transantarctic Mountains to the flat land.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Janubiy Afrikaga avtomobilda kirish — mintaqaning barcha go'zalliklarini ko'rish, shuningdek, oddiy sayyohlik yo'nalishlaridan tashqari joylarga borishning ajoyib usulidir. Buni oddiy avtomobilda yaxshi rejalashtirish orqali qilish mumkin, biroq 4x4 turidagi mashinalar yuqori darajada tavsiya qilinadi va ko'plb hududlarga faqatgina 4x4 turdagi baland g'ildiraklar bilan borish mumkin. Reja tuzayotganda shuni yodda tutingki, Janubiy Afrika barqaror mamlakat bo'lsa-da, barcha qo'shni davlatlar ham bunday emas. Viza talablari va chiqimlari davlatdan davlatga farq qiladi hamda sizning davlatingiz unga ta'sir qiladi. Har bir mamlakat avtomobilda qanday favqulodda yordam buyumlari bo'lishi kerakligini talab qiluvchi o'ziga xos qonunlarga ega.
mt: 4x4s are the best way to see the country's natural beauty, as well as to get to places off the beaten track. A 4x4 is recommended for most of the country, and high clearance 4x4s are required for some areas. When planning your trip, keep in mind that South Africa is a stable country, but its neighbours are not. Visa requirements and fees vary from country to country, and your country of origin may affect this. Each country has its own laws regarding what emergency equipment must be carried in a vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

mt: 4x4s are the best way to see the country's natural beauty, as well as to get to places off the beaten track. A 4x4 is recommended for most of the country, and high clearance 4x4s are required for some areas. When planning your trip, keep in mind that South Africa is a stable country, but its neighbours are not. Visa requirements and fees vary from country to country, and your country of origin may affect this. Each country has its own laws regarding what emergency equipment must be carried in a vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Boshqalarning yukini ko'tarish — Hech qachon, ayniqsa, xalqaro chegaralarni kesib o'tish vaqtida sumkalaringizni ko'zdan qochirmang. o'zingiz bilmagan holda sizdan giyohvand moddalar tashuvchisi sifatida foydalanishayotganini tushunib yetasiz, bu siz uchun katta muammolar keltirib chiqaradi. Bu navbat kutishni ham o'z ichiga oladi, chunki narkotik moddalarni izlovchi itlardan istalgan paytda ogohlantirishlarsiz foydalanilishi mumkin. Ayrim mamlakatlarda xattoki birinchi marta jinoyat qilganlik uchun ham o'ta shafqatsiz jazolar, jumladan 10 yildan ortiq vaqtga ozodlikdan mahrum qilish yoki o'lim jazosi tayinlanadi. Qarovsiz qolgan sumkalar o'g'irlik uchun nishondir hamda bomba xavflaridan ehtiyotkor mutasaddilar e'tiborini jalb qilishi ham mumkin.
mt: Never carry someone else's luggage, especially when crossing international borders. You may not realize it, but you are being used as a drug mule, which can lead to serious problems. This includes waiting, as drug-sniffing dogs can be alerted at any time. In some countries, even first-time offenders can face extremely harsh punishments, including up to 10 years in prison or the death penalty. Unattended bags can be used as evidence of theft, and can also attract the attention of security personnel who are on the lookout for bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Uyingizni ertalab to'yingan qahva bilan va tunda orom oldiruvchi moychechak choyi bilan to'ldiring. O'z uyingizda dam olayotganingizda, o'zingizga qarash uchun vaqtingiz bo'ladi va maxsus biror narsa pishirish uchun qo'shimcha bir necha daqiqa sarflang. Agar sizni ko'proq sarguzashtlar kutib turgan bo'lsa, sharbat ichish yoki kokteyl tayyorlash imkoniyatidan foydalanib qoling: Ehtimol, siz kundalik yumushingizga qaytganingizda nonushta tayyorlashingiz uchun oddiy ichimlikni kashf qilarsiz. Agar xilma-xil ichish madaniyatiga ega shaharda yashasangiz, o'zingiz tez-tez borib turmaydigan mahallalardagi barlar yoki qovoqxonalarga boring.
mt: 1. Start your day with a cup of coffee in the morning and a cup of tea in the evening. Fill your home with the aroma of coffee in the morning and tea in the evening. When you are at home, you will have time to look at yourself and spend a few extra minutes preparing breakfast. If you are in a city with a variety of drinking cultures, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't often visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Haldarsvik qishlog'i yonma-yon joylashgan Eysturoy oroli manzarasini taqdim qiladi hamda noodatiy sakkiz qirrali cherkovga ega. Cherkovning hovlisida, ayrim qabrlarning ustida marmardan ishlangan ajib kabutarlar haykallari bor. Jozibali qishloq atrofi yarim soat sayr qilishga arziydi.
mt: Haldarsvik village offers views of the nearby Eysturoy island and a unique eight-sided church. The churchyard contains a series of marble carved owls on top of some of the graves. The picturesque village is worth a half hour drive.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Ish yuzasidan yoki sayyoh sifatida ma'lum davlatlarga qisqa tashriflar uchun viza shart bo'lmasa-da, u yerga xalqaro talaba sifatida borish oddiy sayyoh sifatida borishga nisbatan ko'proq qolishingizni talab etadi. Umumiy holda istalgan xorijiy mamlakatda uzoqroq muddat turish avvaldan viza olishni talab qiladi. Talaba vizalari odatiy sayyohlik yoki ish vizalaridan farqli ravishda, odatda turli talablar va ariza topshirish jarayonlariga ega bo'ladi. Ko'pgina davlatlar uchun sizga o'qimoqchi bo'lgan muassasangizdan taklif xati, shuningdek, kursingizning kamida birinchi yilida o'zingizni ta'minlash uchun mablag'ga egaligingizni isbotlovchi hujjat kerak bo'ladi. Batafsil talablarni bilish uchun institut, shuningdek, o'qishni istagan davlatingizning immigratsiya bo'limiga murojaat qiling.
mt: Even if you are visiting a country for a short time for business or tourism, a student visa will require you to stay longer than a tourist visa. In general, any foreign country will require a visa to stay for a longer period of time. Student visas are usually different from tourist or work visas, and will have different requirements and application processes. Many countries will require a letter of acceptance from the institution you wish to attend, as well as proof that you are able to support yourself for the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department of the country you wish to study in for more detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Ayniqsa, yoz payti tropik o'rmon oralab sayr qilishga qaror qilsangiz, chivinlardan ehtiyot bo'lishingiz lozim. Agar siz subtropik yomg'irli o'rmonlar bo'ylab harakatlanayotgan bo'lsangiz ham avtomobilga minayotganingizdagi eshik ochiq bo'ladigan bir necha soniya chivinlarning siz bilan avtomobil ichiga kirishi uchun yetarli vaqtdir.
mt: Especially if you are traveling through tropical rainforests during the summer, you should be careful of bees. If you are driving through subtropical rainforests, a few seconds is enough for a few bees to enter your car through an open door.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: "Sandarban sohildan Bangladesh va Hindistonning ichki qismigacha 80 km (50 mil) cho'zilgan dunyodagi eng yirik qirg'oq bo'yi mangrov kamardir. Sundarban YUNESKO Butunjahon merosi obyekti deb e'lon qilindi. o'rmonning Hindiston hududidagi qismi ""Sundarban milliy bog'i"" deb ataladi. Biroq o'rmonlar, shunchaki mangrov botqoqlari emas — ular bir vaqtlar Hindgang tekisligini qoplagan qudratli changalzorlardan qolgan oxirgi daraxtlarni ham o'z ichiga oladi. Sundarban taxminan uchdan bir qismi suv/botqoq hududlar bilan qoplangan 3850 km² maydonni qamrab olgan. 1966-yildan beri Sandarban yovvoyi tabiat qo'riqxonasi bo'lib kelmoqda hamda mazkur hududda hozirda 400 ta qirollik Bengal yo'lbarslari va qariyb 30 000 tog' kiyiklari borligi taxmin qilinadi."
mt: "The Sundarbans, a mangrove forest on the delta of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna rivers on the Bay of Bengal, is the largest mangrove forest in the world, covering more than 10,000 km². It is located in the Ganges Delta or, more broadly, the Sunderban Delta, and is spread across the Indian state of West Bengal and the Bangladeshi district of Satkhira. The forest is intersected by a complex network of tidal creeks, rivers, canals, and estuaries. The forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called the Sundarbans National Park. However, the forest is not only mangroves — it also includes the last remnants of the once vast Sal forests that once covered the Indian subcontinent. The Sundarbans covers an area of about 5,400 km², of which 6% is land and 94% is water. The forest is home to numerous species of birds, spotted deer, crocodiles and snakes. The forest is also home to the Royal Bengal Tiger, estimated to be 500–700 in number. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles. The forest is also home to the largest population of saltwater crocodiles
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Dunyoda 5000 dan ortiq turli tillar mavjud, jumladan, ularning yigirmadan ortig'i 50 million yoki undan ko'p so'zlashuvchiga ega. Og'zaki so'zlarga qaraganda yozilgan so'zlarni tushunish osonroq hamdir. Bu, ayniqsa, tushunarli talaffuz qilish ko'p hollarda mushkul bo'lgan holatlarga taalluqli. Ko'pgina xalqlar ingliz tilida ravon gapiradi va hatto siz yanada cheklangan bilimni kutishingiz mumkin — ayniqsa, yoshlar orasida. Agar istasangiz, mankunianlik, bostonlik, yamaykalik va sidneylikning Torontodagi restoranda kechki ovqat tanovul qilib stol atrofida o'tirishganini tasavvur qiling. Ular o'zlarining o'ziga xos talaffuzi va mahalliy jargonlarida aytilgan o'z shaharlaridagi hikoyalar bilan bir-birlarini xursand qilmoqdalar.
mt: 5000 different languages are spoken in the world, of which more than 20 are spoken by 50 million or more people. Written words are easier to understand than spoken words, especially when the pronunciation is difficult to understand. Many people speak English fluently and you can even get by with limited knowledge — especially among the young. If you wish, imagine the mankunian, bostonian, jamaican and sydneyan sitting at a table in a restaurant in Toronto discussing their evening meal in their own dialects and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Avtobuslar kun davomida (daryoning narigi tomonidagi) tumanlararo avtobus bekatidan jo'naydi, biroq aksariyati, ayniqsa, sharqqa va Jakar/Bumtangga borayotganlari 06:30 va 07:30 orasida yo'lga chiqadi. Tumanlararo avtobuslar ko'p hollarda to'la bo'lganligi tufayli, chiptani bir necha kun avval xarid qilish tavsiya qilinadi. Ko'pchilik tumanlarga Yaponiyaning qulay va mustahkam bo'lgan kabotaj avtobuslari tomonidan xizmat ko'rsatiladi. Hamroh taksilar Paro (Nu 150) va Punaxa (Nu 200) singari uzoq bo'lmagan joylarga safar qilishning tez va qulay usullari hisoblanadi.
mt: Buses leave the town's bus station throughout the day (on the other side of the river), but most of them, especially those going to the east and Jakar/Bumtang, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. Bus tickets are often sold out, so it is recommended to buy them a few days in advance. Most of the towns are served by Japanese comfortable and reliable cabotage buses. Hamroh taxis are quick and easy ways to travel to nearby places such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Avtobuslar kun davomida (daryoning narigi tomonidagi) tumanlararo avtobus bekatidan jo'naydi, biroq aksariyati, ayniqsa, sharqqa va Jakar/Bumtangga borayotganlari 06:30 va 07:30 orasida yo'lga chiqadi. Tumanlararo avtobuslar ko'p hollarda to'la bo'lganligi tufayli, chiptani bir necha kun avval xarid qilish tavsiya qilinadi. Ko'pchilik tumanlarga Yaponiyaning qulay va mustahkam bo'lgan kabotaj avtobuslari tomonidan xizmat ko'rsatiladi. Hamroh taksilar Paro (Nu 150) va Punaxa (Nu 200) singari uzoq bo'lmagan joylarga safar qilishning tez va qulay usullari hisoblanadi.
mt: Buses leave the town's bus station throughout the day (on the other side of the river), but most of them, especially those going to the east and Jakar/Bumtang, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. Bus tickets are often sold out, so it is recommended to buy them a few days in advance. Most of the towns are served by Japanese comfortable and reliable cabotage buses. Hamroh taxis are quick and easy ways to travel to nearby places such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Yetishish imkoniyati nisbatan kamligi bilan birga, ""Timbuktu"" uzoq, ekzotik o'lkalar uchun metafora sifatida ishlatila boshlandi. Bugungi kunda obro'si va u yerda aeroport bo'lishiga qaramay Timbuktu qashshoq shaharcha. Cho'l qumlarining xavfi sababli, 1990-yili u xavf ostida bo'lgan butunjahon madaniy merosi obyektlari ro'yxatiga kiritildi. Bu Genri Luis Geystning PBS kanalidagi ""Afrika dunyosi mo'jizalari"" maxsus serialidagi asosiy to'xtash nuqtalaridan biri bo'lgan edi. Bu shahar mamlakatning boshqa shaharlaridan keskin farq qiladi, chunki u afrikanchadan ko'ra, ko'proq arabcha uslubga ega."
mt: "Despite its relative obscurity, ""Timbuktu"" has been used as a metaphor for distant, exotic places. Today, it is a poor town despite having an airport. It was placed on the list of endangered world cultural heritage sites in 1990 due to the danger of sandstorms. It was one of the main stops in PBS's ""Africa's Great Civilizations"" special series by Henry Louis Gates. It differs greatly from other towns in the country, as it is more Arabic in style than African."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralimpiada o'yinlari 2021-yilning 24-avgustidan 5-sentabrigacha bo'lib o'tadi. Ba'zi musobaqalar Yaponiya bo'ylab boshqa joylarda ham o'tkaziladi. Tokio 1964-yilda yozgi Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgani sababli, ikkita yozgi Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgan yagona Osiyo shahri bo'ladi. Agar siz kechiktirish e'lon qilinishidan avval 2020-yil uchun reyslar va mehmonxonani buyurtna qilgan bo'lsangiz, siz qiyin vaziyatda qolishingiz mumkin. Bekor qilish tartib-qoidalari turlicha, lekin mart oyi oxiridagi koronavirusga asoslangan bekor qilish tartib-qoidalari Olimpiada o'yinlari rejalashtirilgan vaqt — 2020-yilning iyul oyiga qadar davom etmaydi. Tadbir chiptalarining aksariyati 2500 ¥ va 130 000 ¥ oralig'ida, odatiy chiptalar narxi 7000 ¥ atrofida bo'lishi kutilyapti.
mt: 2021 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5. Some events will also be held in other parts of Japan. Tokyo is the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympic Games, in 1964. If you have booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may be in a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but the coronavirus-related cancellation policies in place in March 2020 do not extend to the planned dates of the Olympics — July 2020. Most tickets are expected to be between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with standard tickets costing around ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Tornado aylanadigan juda past bosimli havo ustuni bo'lib, atrofdagi havoni ichkariga va tepaga so'rib oladi. Ular kuchli shamollarni yuzaga keltiradi (ko'pincha 100–200 mil/soat) va og'ir obyektlarni havoga ko'tarib, tornado harakatlanayotganda ularni o'zi bilan tashib yuradi. Ular bo'ronli bulutlardan tushayotgan voronka sifatida boshlanadi va yerga tekkanida ""tornadolar""ga aylanadi."
mt: "Tornadoes are very low pressure systems that suck in the surrounding air, pulling it up and over the top. They create strong winds (often 100–200 mph) and lift heavy objects into the air, which they carry with them as they move. They begin as a funnel cloud dropping from a thunderstorm and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Agar siz tashrif buyurayotgan mamlakatda sayohatlarga oid ogohlantirishlar bo'lsa, bu sizning turistik tibbiy sug'urtangiz yoki sayohatni bekor qilinishingizga ta'sir qilishi mumkin. Siz, shuningdek, o'zingiznikidan boshqa hukumatlar maslahatini olishni xohlashingiz mumkin, biroq ularning maslahati o'zlarining fuqarolari uchun mo'ljallangan. Misol uchun, o'rta Sharqdagi Amerika fuqarolari yevropaliklar yoxud arablardan farqli holatlarga duch kelishi mumkin. Rasmiy maslahat xabarlari bir davlatdagi siyosiy vaziyat haqidagi qisqacha xulosasisini taqdim etadi. Taqdim etilgan qarashlar ko'p hollarda boshqa joylarda mavjud bo'lgan batafsil ma'lumotlarga nisbatan yuzaki, umumiy va nihoyatda sodda bo'ladi.
mt: If you are travelling to a country where there are travel warnings, this may affect your travel insurance or your trip being cancelled. You may also wish to seek advice from other governments, but their advice is intended for their citizens and may be different from yours. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Official advice provides a brief conclusion about the political situation in a country. The views presented are often superficial, general and finally very simple compared to the detailed information available in other places.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Sayyohlik agentliklari 19-asrdan buyon mavjud. Sayohat agenti odatda sayyohning tabiat, madaniyat, til yoki rivojlanmagan davlatlarga tashrif bo'yicha avvalgi tajribalaridan tashqarida bo'lgan sayohat uchun yaxshi tanlovdir. Garchi aksariyat agentliklar eng odatiy buyurtmalarni olishga tayyor bo'lsa ham, ko'p agentlar sayohatning ayrim turlari, ma'lum miqdordagi byudjet yoki belgilangan manzillarga ixtisoslashgan. Aksar hollarda siznikiga o'xshagan sayohatlarni bron qiladigan agentdan foydalanish yaxshiroq bo'lishi mumkin. Xoh veb-sayt, xoh do'kon peshtaxtasida bo'lsin, agent qanday sayohatlarni reklama qilayotganini ko'rib chiqing.
mt: Tourism agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good choice for a traveler who has never been to a particular destination, culture, language, or developing country. While most agencies are ready to handle the most common requests, many agents specialize in certain types of travel, a certain budget, or a particular destination. It is often better to use an agent who specializes in similar trips to yours. Whether it is a website or a storefront, an agent should be able to tell you what types of trips they are advertising.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
