src: "Sayohat qilgan vaqtingizda va undan oldin inobatga olishingiz shart bo'lgan ko'plab narsalar mavjud. Sayohat qilganingizda, narsalarning ""uyingizdagidek"" bo'lib chiqmasligini kuting. Xulq, qonunchilik, oziq-ovqat, tirbandlik, turar joy, standartlar, til va boshqalar siz istiqomat qiladigan yerdan ma'lum darajada farq qiladi. Buni hafsalangiz pir bo'lmasligi uchun yoki ehtimol, ishlarni bajarishning mahalliy usullaridan jirkanmaslik uchun doim yodda tutishingiz kerak."
mt: "There are many things you should be aware of before and during your travels. Don't expect things to be ""like home"". Culture, law, food, traffic, housing, standards, language, and others will be different from where you live. Keep this in mind so you don't get frustrated or possibly, confused by local ways of doing things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Agar rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki dunyoning yangi burchagiga ilk marta sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, madaniy shok ehtimolini past baholamang. Ko'plab sabotli, layoqatli sayyohlar ko'pgina kichik madaniy o'zgarishlar tezda to'planib qoladigan rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarga sayohatning yangiliklariga bardosh bera olmagan. Ayniqsa, ilk kunlarda moslashishingizga yordam berishi uchun g'arbiy va sifatli mehmonxonalar, oziq-ovqat hamda xizmatlardan pulingizni ayamang. o'zingiz mahalliy faunasini bilmaydigan joylarda yerga qo'yilgan matras yoki to'shakda uxlamang. Agar siz tunni ochiq havoda o'tkazmoqchi bo'lsangiz, ilon, chayon kabilardan saqlanish uchun yig'ma krovat yoki to'r belanchak olib oling.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country or a new corner of the world for the first time, don't underestimate the possibility of culture shock. Many savvy travelers are unable to cope with the rapid changes in developing countries to the novelty of their travels. Especially in the first few days, you should be staying in Western and quality hotels, eating and receiving services for which you are paying. Don't sleep on the ground in places where you don't know the local fauna. If you are planning to spend the night outdoors, bring a mosquito net or hammock to protect yourself from snakes, scorpions, etc.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Sug'urta polisingiz va sug'urta qiluvchingizning kontakt ma'lumotlaridan nusxa olib, o'zingiz bilan olib keling. Ular maslahat/avtorizatsiyalar va shikoyatlar uchun sug'urtalovchining elektron pochta manzili va xalqaro telefon raqamlarini ko'rsatishi kerak. Boshqa nusxasini yuk sumkangiz va internetda (ilova qilib elektron pochtangizga yuboring yoki ""bulut""da) saqlang. Agar noutbuk yoki planshet bilan sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, uning xotirasi yoki diskining nusxasini saqlab qo'ying (internetsiz kirish mumkin). Shuningdek, yordam berishga tayyor sayohatdagi sheriklaringiz hamda yurtingizdagi qarindoshlaringiz yoki do'stlaringizga sug'urta polisi/kontakt nusxalarini bering."
mt: "Copy your insurance policy and your insurance card, and bring them with you. They should show the policyholder's email address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and complaints. Keep another copy in your luggage and on the internet (install an app and send it to your email or ""cloud""). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy of its memory or disk (access is possible without internet). Also, bring copies of your travel companions and relatives or friends at home with you, insurance police/contact cards."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Yillar davomida foydalanib kelingan ko'plab turli kinoplyonka formatlari mavjud. Standart 35 mm li kinoplyonka (36 ga 24 mm li negativ) juda keng tarqalgan. Agar tugab qolsa, uni ancha oson to'ldirish mumkin va u joriy DSLR ga taxminan mos keladigan tasvir aniqligini beradi. Ayrim o'rta formatdagi kameralar 6 ga 6 sm, aniqrog'i, 56 ga 56 mm salbiy formatdan foydalanadi. Bu 35 mm salbiy o'lcham (3136 mm² ga 864) dan ko'ra qariyb to'rt baravar yuqori o'lchamni beradi.
mt: 35 mm film (36 mm wide, 24 mm negative) is very common. If you run out, it's easy to reload and gives an image comparable to your current DSLR. Some medium format cameras use 6 by 6 cm, or 56 by 56 mm negative format. This gives a negative area about four times that of 35 mm (3136 mm² vs. 864 mm²).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Sayohat haqida yozish bilan shug'ullanishni boshlashning eng oson usuli — biror mashhur sayohat blogi veb-saytida o'z ko'nikmalaringizni charxlashdir. Internetda formatlash hamda tahrirlashga qo'lingiz kelib qolgandan keyin, keyinchalik, shaxsiy veb-saytingizni yaratishingiz mumkin.
mt: The easiest way to start writing about your travels is to contribute to a popular travel blog website. Once you get used to formatting and editing, you can create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Sayohat haqida yozish bilan shug'ullanishni boshlashning eng oson usuli — biror mashhur sayohat blogi veb-saytida o'z ko'nikmalaringizni charxlashdir. Internetda formatlash hamda tahrirlashga qo'lingiz kelib qolgandan keyin, keyinchalik, shaxsiy veb-saytingizni yaratishingiz mumkin.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Uyda mahalliy mikroblarning doimiy ta'siri tufayli sizda ularga qarshi immunitetingiz borligi ehtimoli yuqori. Dunyoning bakteriologik fauna siz uchun yangilik bo'lgan boshqa hududlarida muammolarga ro'baro' kelishingiz ehtimoli ancha yuqori. Shuningdek, iliqroq iqlim sharoitida bakteriya ham tezroq o'sadi, ham tanadan tashqarida uzoqroq yashab qoladi. Shu tarzda Deli Belli balosi, Fir'avn la'nati, Montezuma qasosi va ularning ko'plab do'stlari. Sovuq iqlim sharoitlaridagi xuddi nafas olish bilan bog'liq muammolar kabi, issiq iqlim sharoitlarida ichak muammolari ancha keng tarqalgan hamda aksariyat holatlarda aniq bezovta qiladi, lekin u qadar xavfli emas.
mt: Because of constant exposure to local microbes at home, you are likely to have immunity to them. The likelihood of problems arising in other areas of the world where the microbiome is new to you is much higher. Additionally, bacteria also grow faster and survive longer in warmer climates. In this way, the Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. Intestinal problems are much more common in warm climates and are usually quite annoying, but not nearly as dangerous as breathing problems in cold climates.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Yevropa nisbatan kichik, biroq ko'plab mustaqil davlatlarga ega bo'lgan qit'adir. Odatiy sharoitlarda bir nechta mamlakatlar bo'ylab sayohat qilish bir necha marta vizaga ariza topshirish va pasport nazoratidan o'tish kerakligini anglatadi. Ammo bu jihatdan Shengen hududi go'yo bitta davlat kabi ishlaydi. Siz mazkur hududda bo'lsangiz, odatda yana pasport nazorati punktlaridan o'tmasdan chegaralarni kesib o'ta olasiz. Xuddi shuningdek, Shengen vizasiga ega bo'lsangiz, Shengenga a'zo davlatlarning har biriga viza uchun alohida ariza berishingiz shart emas, shu tarzda vaqt, pul va hujjatbozlik ishlarini tejashingiz mumkin.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent, but it is made up of many independent countries. In normal circumstances, travelling between several countries requires submitting visa applications and passport checks at each border. However, the Schengen area is supposed to work like one country. If you are in the Schengen area, you can usually cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints. Also, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to submit separate applications for each of the Schengen member states, so you can save time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutanxamon maqbarasi (KV62). KV62, ehtimol, vodiydagi maqbaralarning eng mashhuri, Hovard Karter 1922-yilda kashf etgan yosh podshoh dafn etilgan deyarli buzilmagan shohona joy. Boshqa shohlarning qabrlariga qaraganda Tutanxamon qabri ancha kichkina va bezaklarning kamligi bilan tashrif buyurishga arzimaydi. Mumiyoni tobutdan olishga urinishlar paytida unga yetkazilgan zararni isbotlovchi dalillarni ko'rishga qiziquvchi barchaning hafsalasi pir bo'ladi, chunki ularning faqat boshi va yelkalarini ko'rish mumkin. Maqbaraning aql bovar qilmas boyliklari endi uning ichida emas, balki Qohiradagi Misr muzeyiga ko'chirilgan. Vaqti cheklangan tashrif buyuruvchilar o'z vaqtini boshqa biror yerda o'tkazgani ma'qul.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62, probably the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, was discovered by Howard Carter in 1922, and is the burial place of the young pharaoh. Other pharaohs' tombs are larger and more lavishly decorated, but Tutankhamun's tomb is smaller and less adorned, and is not a must-see. The damage done to the mummy during the attempts to remove it from the coffin is fascinating, as only its head and arms are visible. The tomb's treasures are no longer in the tomb, but in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time should spend it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Bouen oroli qayiqda suzish, piyoda yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar kabilarni taklif qiluvchi ommabop kunlik sayohat va dam olish kunlaridagi sayohat maskani. Bu asl hamjamiyat Vankuver yaqinidagi Xau-Saundda joylashgan va unga Vankuver markazidagi Granvil orolidan jadval bo'yicha jo'naydigan suv taksilari yordamida osonlik bilan yetib olish mumkin. Ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotlardan zavqlanadiganlar uchun Dengizdan osmongacha yo'lagi bo'ylab sayr juda muhimdir. Vistler (Vankuverdan 1,5 soatlik yo'l) qimmat, biroq 2010-yilgi Qishki olimpiada tufayli mashhur bo'lgan shahardir. Qishda Shimoliy Amerikadagi eng yaxshi chang'i uchish tajribasidan zavqlaning, yozda esa haqiqiy tog'da velosiped uchish mashg'ulotini sinab ko'ring.
mt: Bouen Island is a popular day trip and weekend getaway destination for Vancouverites. It is located in Howe Sound, just off the coast of Vancouver, and is easily accessible by water taxi from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. The open air activities are what make the trip so important. For those who enjoy winter sports, Whistler (1.5 hours away) is a pricey but popular destination, made famous by the 2010 Winter Olympics. Come and try the best skiing in North America, or try mountain biking in the summer.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Viktoriya sharsharasi — Zimbabvening g'arbiy qismida, Zambiyaning Livingstoun shahri va Botsvana yaqinidagi chegara bo'ylab joylashgan shaharchadir. Shahar shundoqqina sharsharalar yonida joylashgan va ular asosiy diqqatga sazovor joydir, lekin bu mashhur sayyohlik manzili ham sarguzasht izlovchilarga, ham ekskursiyachilarga uzoq vaqt qolish uchun ko'plab imkoniyatlarini taqdim qiladi. Yomg'ir mavsumida (noyabrdan martgacha) suv hamji balandroq hamda sharsharalar yanada dramatik bo'ladi. Ko'prikdan o'tsangiz yoki sharshara yaqinidagi egri-bugri yo'laklar bo'ylab yursangiz, ho'l bo'lishingiz kafolatlanadi. Boshqa tomondan, aynan suv hajmi shu qadar baland bo'lgani tufayli mana shu butun suv asl sharsharani nigohingizdan yashiradi!
mt: Victoria Falls — a town in western Zimbabwe, near the border with Zambia, is located on the Zambezi River. The town is situated near the famous Victoria Falls, which is a major tourist attraction, but also offers many opportunities for adventure seekers to spend time in the area. During the rainy season (November to March) the water is higher and the falls are more dramatic. Crossing the bridge or walking along the crooked paths near the falls, you are guaranteed to get wet. On the other hand, the water level is so high that the falls actually hide the falls from your view!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Odatiy suratkashlik qoidalari videoga olishga ham taalluqlidir, balki undan ham ko'proq. Agar biror narsani shunchaki rasmga olish ruxsat etilmagan bo'lsa, unda uni videoga olishni hatto xayolingizga ham keltirmasligingiz kerak. Agar siz drondan foydalanayotgan bo'lsangiz, avvaldan nimalarni suratga olishga ruxsat berilganligi va qanday ruxsatlar yoki qo'shimcha litsenziyalarni olish talab qilinishini tekshiring. Hatto bu sizning hududda noqonuniy bo'lmasa-da, aeroport yaqinida yoxud olomon ustida dron uchirish deyarli hamma vaqt yomon fikrdir.
mt: The same rules of etiquette that apply to taking pictures apply to taking video, and even more so. If you are not allowed to take a picture, you are certainly not allowed to take a video. If you are using a drone, check that you are allowed to take pictures of what you are filming, and that you have the necessary permits or licenses. Even if this is not illegal in your area, flying a drone over an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Ro'yxatdan o'tish viza olish jarayonidagi qo'shimcha talabdir. Ayrim davlatlarda siz mahalliy hokimiyat organlarida o'sha yerda ekaningiz hamda yashash manzilingizni ro'yxatdan o'tkazishingiz lozim. Buning uchun shaklni mahalliy politsiya punktlarida to'ldirish yoki immigratsiya idoralariga tashrif buyurish talab etilishi mumkin. Shunday qonunga ega ko'plab davlatlarda, roʻyxatdan oʻtkazish ishlarini mahalliy mehmonxonalar amalga oshiradilar (albatta, so'rab oling). Boshqa holatlarda, faqat sayyohlik turar joylaridan tashqarida qolayotganlar ro'yxatdan o'tishi kerak. Lekin qonunni yanada noaniqlashtiradi, shu sababli oldindan bilib oling.
mt: This is an additional requirement for visa application. In some countries, you may be required to register your presence and residence with local authorities. This may be done by filling out a form at local police stations or immigration offices. In many countries, this is done by hotels (upon request). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations are required to register. However, the law is not very clear, so it is best to check beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Sayohat vaqtida volontyorlik qilish o'zgarishlar qilishning eng ajoyib yo'li, biroq bu shunchaki nimadir berish bilan bog'liq emas. Xorijiy davlatda yashash va volontyorlik bilan shug'ullanish — boshqa madaniyat bilan tanishish, yangi odamlarni uchratish, o'zingizni o'rganish, istiqbolni his qilish va hatto yangi ko'nikmalarni o'zlashtirishning ajoyib usulidir. Biror joyda uzoqroq turis uchun byudjetni qisqartirish ham yaxshi usul bo'lishi mumkin, chunki ko'ngillilar uchun ko'p ishlar xona va oziq-ovqat bilan ta'milaydilar, ba'zilari esa kichik maosh to'laydilar.
mt: Traveling and volunteering are the best ways to change the world, but it's not just about giving. Living abroad and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to meet new people, learn about new cultures, explore yourself, find hope, and even learn new skills. It can also be a great way to save money for a longer trip, as volunteers are often housed and fed, and some even get paid a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Sayohat vaqtida volontyorlik qilish o'zgarishlar qilishning eng ajoyib yo'li, biroq bu shunchaki nimadir berish bilan bog'liq emas. Xorijiy davlatda yashash va volontyorlik bilan shug'ullanish — boshqa madaniyat bilan tanishish, yangi odamlarni uchratish, o'zingizni o'rganish, istiqbolni his qilish va hatto yangi ko'nikmalarni o'zlashtirishning ajoyib usulidir. Biror joyda uzoqroq turis uchun byudjetni qisqartirish ham yaxshi usul bo'lishi mumkin, chunki ko'ngillilar uchun ko'p ishlar xona va oziq-ovqat bilan ta'milaydilar, ba'zilari esa kichik maosh to'laydilar.
mt: Traveling and volunteering are the best ways to change the world, but it's not just about giving. Living abroad and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to meet new people, learn about new cultures, explore yourself, find hope, and even learn new skills. It can also be a great way to save money for a longer trip, as volunteers are often housed and fed, and some even get paid a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Walt Disney World parkiga sayohat qilish ko'pchilik amerikaliklar uchun katta ziyoratdek. ""An'anaviy"" tashrif Orlando xalqaro aeroportiga borib qo'nish, avtobusda istirohat bog'i ichida joylashgan mehmonxonaga borish, bir haftani tashqariga chiqmasdan Disney parkida o'tkazish va uyga qaytishdan iborat. Cheksiz xilma-xilliklar bor, biroq ""Disney olamiga borish"" to'g'risida gap ketganda ko'pchilik shuni nazarda tutadi. eBay yoxud Craigslist singari auksiion veb-saytlari orqali onlayn sotiluvchi ko'p chiptalar qisman foydalaniladigan ko'p kunlik park-hopper chiptalari hisoblanadi. Bu juda keng tarqalgan ish bo'lishiga qaramay, u Disney tomonidan taqiqlangan: chiptalarni boshqalarga o'tkazib bo'lmaydi."
mt: "A trip to Walt Disney World is a big pilgrimage for many Americans.  ""Traditional"" visits involve flying into Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a hotel in the park, staying for a week without leaving the Disney parks, and returning home.  There are endless variations, but when people talk about ""going to the Disney world,"" most people mean it.  Online auction sites like eBay and Craigslist are full of resold multi-day park-hopper passes, which are partially used passes.  Although this is a very common practice, it is forbidden by Disney: passes cannot be transferred to others."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: "Urush hududi deya hisoblash mumkin bo'lgan davlatga tashrif buyurishni rejalashtirayotgan har bir shaxs professional tayyorganlikdan o'tishi lozim. Internetdan ""Urush muhiti kursi"" deb izlash, hoynahoy, mahalliy kompaniya manzilini chiqarib beradi. Kurs odatda bu yerda muhokama qilingan masalalarni ancha ko'p tafsilot, odatda amaliy tajriba bilan qamrab oladi. Kurs odatda 2–5 kun davom etadi va rol o'ynash, ko'plab birinchi yordam va ba'zan qurol-yarog' mashqlarini o'z ichiga oladi. Sahroda omon qolishga oid kitob va jurnallar keng tarqalgan, biroq urush hududlariga oid nashrlar kam."
mt: "Anyone planning to visit a country that can be considered a war zone should be professionally trained. Search the Internet for "War Zone Course," and voila, a local company pops up. The course usually covers the issues discussed here in much greater detail, often with practical experience. The course usually lasts 2–5 days and includes role-playing, first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the desert are widespread, but books on war zones are rare."
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Suvni tozalashning turli xil usullari bor, ba'zilari ma'lum xavflarga qarshi ancha samarali hisoblanadi. Ayrim hududlarda suv qaynashi uchun bir daqiqa yetarli bo'ladi, boshqalarida bir necha daqiqa kerak bo'ladi. Filtrlar samaradorlik jihatidan farqlanadi, agar xavotirlansangiz, unda nufuzli kompaniyadan suvingizni muhrlangan shishada sotib olish haqida o'ylab ko'rishingiz kerak.
mt: There are various ways to purify water, some are more effective against certain hazards than others. In some areas, water can boil in one minute, in others it takes several minutes. Filters vary in effectiveness, if you are concerned, you should buy your water bottled in a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Qaytuvchi oqimlar — ko'pincha dengiz qoyalari yoki shunga o'xshash joylarda sohilga urilib to'xtovchi to'lqinlardan qaytib keladigan oqimdir. Suv osti topologiyasi sababli qaytuvchi oqim bir qancha chuqurroq bo'lmalarda to'planadi va u yerda chuqur suvda tez oqim paydo bo'ladi. Aksariyat o'limlar imkonsiz bo'lgan oqimga qarshi suzishga urinishdagi charchoq natijasida sodir bo'ladi. Oqimdan chiqishingiz bilan orqaga qaytib suzish odatdagidan ko'ra qiyin bo'lmaydi. Tayta tutilmaydigan joy mo'ljalga oling yoki, ko'nikmalaringiz va payqalganligingizga qarab, qutqarishlarini kutishingiz mumkin.
mt: A rip current is a narrow, powerful current of water that flows away from the shore, into deeper water. Rip currents can occur at any beach that has breaking waves, but they are most common and dangerous at low-sloped beaches with little wave action, such as those found on the Gulf Coast. Rip currents can be difficult to see in the surf zone. They are often confused with rip tides, which are strong tides that can occur at any beach. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers out to sea. Rip currents can extend from the shoreline out to hundreds of meters, and can be as wide as the surf zone. Rip currents can be as narrow as 10 meters, and can be as deep as 2.5 meters. Rip currents can be as fast as 2.5 meters per second, and can be as slow as 0.5 meters per second. Rip currents can be as wide as 10 meters, and can be as narrow as 5 meters. Rip currents can be as deep as 2.5 meters, and can be as shallow as 1 meter. Rip currents can be as fast as 2.5 meters per second, and can be as slow as 1 meter per second. Rip currents can be as wide as 10 meters, and can be as narrow as 5 meters. Rip currents can be as deep as 2.5 meters, and can be as shallow as 1 meter. Rip currents can be as fast as 2.5 meters per second, and can be as slow as 1 meter per second. Rip currents can be as wide as 10 meters, and can be as narrow as 5 meters. Rip currents can be as deep as 2.5 meters, and can be as shallow as 1 meter. Rip currents can be as fast as 2.5 meters per second, and can be as slow as 1 meter per second. Rip currents can be as wide as 10 meters, and can be as narrow as 5 meters. Rip currents can be as deep as 2.5 meters, and can be as shallow as 1 meter. Rip currents can be as fast as 2.5 meters per second, and can be as slow as 1 meter per second. Rip currents can be as wide as 10 meters, and can be as narrow as 5 meters. Rip currents can be as deep as 2.5 meters, and can be as shallow as 1 meter. Rip currents
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Ichki suv yo'llari ta'til uchun yaxshi mavzu bo'lishi mumkin. Masalan, Luar, Reyn vodiysidagi qasrlarga tashrif buyurish yoki Dunaydagi qiziqarli shaharlarga sayohatga chiqish yoki Eri kanali bo'ylab qayiqda suzish. Shuningdek, ular ommabop sayr va velosipedda yurish yo'llari uchun yo'nalishlarni belgilaydi.
mt: The interior waterways are good for a day trip. For example, visiting the castles in the Loire valley, going to the interesting cities along the Danube or rowing on the Rhine. They also mark the popular routes for cycling and hiking.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Shimoliy mintaqa Sahel bilan hamda janub va g'arb tomondan Atlantika okeani bilan o'ralgan. Ayollar: Oilaviy holatidan qat'i nazar, barcha ayol sayyohlarga o'zlarini turmush qurgan deb aytish tavsiya etiladi. Uzuk taqish ham foydali (shunchaki nihoyatda qimmat ko'rinmaydiganini. Ayollar madaniy farqlarning ular ta'qib qilish deb hisoblovchi narsalarga olib kelishi mumkinligini anglab yetishlari kerak va kuzatib borish, qo'lidan ushlash kabilar kam uchraydigan holat emas. Erkaklarga rad javob qilishda qat'iy bo'ling va o'z aytganingizda turishdan qo'rqmang (madaniy farqlar borligi yoki yo'qligidan qat'iy nazar bu uni oddiy holatga aylantirmaydi!).
mt: The northern region is surrounded by the Sahara to the south and west and the Atlantic Ocean to the north. Women: Regardless of marital status, all female travellers are advised to present themselves as married. Wearing a ring is helpful (even a cheap one). Women should be aware of the cultural differences that may lead to their being harassed and to watch out for and avoid situations where they are alone with a man. Men: Be firm in your responses to unwanted advances (cultural differences or not, this does not make it acceptable!) and do not be afraid to stand up for yourself.
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Yovvoyi tabiat suratkash uchun eng qiyin mavzular sirasiga kiradi hamda unga omad, sabr, tajriba va yaxshi uskunalar kombinatsiyasi kerak bo'ladi. Yovvoyi tabiat fotosuratlari ko'p hollarda oddiy narsa sifatida qabul qilinadi, biroq umumiy fotosuratlarga o'xshab, bu rasm ham minglab ta'rifga arziydi. Yovvoyi tabiat suratkashligi ko'pincha uzun telefoto obyektiv talab qiladi, lekin qushlar galasi yoki mayda jonzot kabi narsalarga boshqa obyektivlar kerak. Ko'plab ekzotik jonivorlarni topish mushkul va ayrim hollarda xiyobonlarda tijoriy maqsadda suratga olish qoidalari bor. Yovvoyi hayvonlar tortinchoq yoki tajovuzkor bo'lishi mumkin. Muhit sovuq, issiq yoxud boshqacha tarzda noqulay bo'lishi mumkin.
mt: Wild life photography is one of the most difficult subjects and requires luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken with a long telephoto lens, but other lenses are needed for birds or small animals. Many exotic animals are hard to find and in some cases there are commercial restrictions. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or otherwise unpleasant.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Yuqori kengliklarga yoki tog' dovonlari bo'ylab mashina haydamoqchi bo'lgan har qanday kishi qor, muz yoki muzlash haroratini hisobga olishi kerak. Muzli hamda qorli yo'llarda ishqalanish past bo'ladi hamda oddiy asfaltdagidek harakatlana olmaysiz. Qor bo'ronlari vaqtida juda qisqa vaqt ichida tiqilib qolish uchun yetarli miqdorda qor yog'ishi mumkin. Ko'rish, shuningdek, qor yog'ishi yoki bo'roni tufayli yoki avtomobil oynalaridagi kondensatsiya yoki muz tufayli ham cheklanishi mumkin. Boshqa tomondan, muzli va qorli sharoitlar ko'pchilik mamlakatlarda oddiy holatdir va yo'l harakati yil davomida deyarli uzluksiz davom etadi.
mt: Any person planning to drive in high altitudes or mountain passes should take into account the snow, ice or freezing temperature. Driving on snow and ice is much slower and you cannot drive like on an ordinary asphalt road. Snowstorms can dump enough snow to stop traffic in a short time. Visibility can also be limited by snow or by a storm or by condensation or ice on the car windows. On the other hand, snow and ice are normal conditions in many countries and road traffic is almost uninterrupted throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Agarda siz diplomat bo'lmasangiz, xorijda ishlash odatda o'zingiz turgan davlatda daromad solig'i to'lashingiz lozimligini bildiradi. Daromad solig'i turli davlatlarda turlicha tuzilishga ega hamda soliq stavkalari va sinflari davlatga qarab keskin farq qiladi. AQSH va Kanada singari ba'zi federal davlatlarda daromad solig'i ham federal, ham mahalliy darajada undiriladi, shu sababli stavkalar va sinflar hududga qarab farq qilishi mumkin.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad usually requires you to pay taxes to the country you are in. Tax rates and brackets vary widely between countries. In some federal countries such as the United States and Canada, taxes are levied both at the federal and local level, so rates and brackets may vary by region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

AQSH va Kanada singari ba'zi federal davlatlarda daromad solig'i ham federal, ham mahalliy darajada undiriladi, shu sababli stavkalar va sinflar hududga qarab farq qilishi mumkin.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad usually requires you to pay taxes to the country you are in. Tax rates and brackets vary widely between countries. In some federal countries such as the United States and Canada, taxes are levied both at the federal and local level, so rates and brackets may vary by region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Jahon yarmarkasi (odatda Butunjahon ko'rgazmasi yoki, shunchaki Ekspo deb ataladi) — bu yirik xalqaro san'at va fan festivalidir. Ishtirokchi davlatlar dunyo muammolari yoxud o'z davlatlari madaniyati hamda tarixini namoyish etish uchun milliy pavilionlarda san'at va ma'rifiy ko'rgazmalarni taqdim etadilar. Xalqaro bog'dorchilik ko'rgazmalari — gul ko'rgazmalari, botanik bog'lar va o'simliklar bilan bog'liq boshqa narsalarni namoyish etuvchi ixtisoslashgan tadbirlardir. Nazariy jihatdan (agar turli mamlakatlarda bo'lsa) ular har yili o'tkazilishi mumkin esa-da, amalda bunday emas. Bu tadbirlar odatda uch oydan olti oygacha davom etadi hamda ular 50 gektardan kam bo'lmagan maydonlarda o'tkaziladi.
mt: A world fair (usually called a world's fair or, simply, an expo) is a large international exhibition designed as an experiential contrast to the city that hosts it, usually displaying recent discoveries, changes, and improvements to human and cultural life. Participants not only come to see the exhibits, but also to make their own, and they are often held in the context of fairs, such as the 1851 Great Exhibition that was held in Hyde Park, London, in the United Kingdom. The Eiffel Tower was built for the 1889 Exposition Universelle in Paris, France. The 1939 New York World's Fair featured the theme "The World of Tomorrow" and the 1964 New York World's Fair featured the Unisphere. The 1967 International and Universal Exposition in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, was known as Expo 67. The 1974 Oklahoma International Fair was held in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States. The 1984 Louisiana World Exposition was held in New Orleans, Louisiana, United States. The 1986 World Exposition in Tsukuba, Japan, was known as Expo '86. The 1992 Seville Expo was held in Seville, Spain. The 1998 World Exposition in Lisbon, Portugal, was known as Expo '98. The 2000 World Exposition in Hanover, Germany, was known as Expo 2000. The 2005 World Exposition in Aichi, Japan, was known as Expo 2005. The 2010 World Exposition in Shanghai, China, was known as Expo 2010. The 2015 World Exposition in Milan, Italy, was known as Expo 2015. The 2020 World Exposition in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, was known as Expo 2020. The 2025 World Exposition in Osaka, Japan, is known as Expo 2025.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Garchi parkdagi hayvonlarning ko'pchiligi insonlarni ko'rishga odatlangan bo'lsa-da, yovvoyi tabiat shubhasiz yovvoyi bo'lib, ular ovqatlantirilmasligi yoki bezovta qilinmasligi kerak. Istirohat bog'i ma'muriyatiga ko'ra, ayiq hamda bo'rilardan eng kamida 100 yard/metr va boshqa barcha yovvoyi hayvonlardan esa 25 yard/metr uzoqlikda turing! Bizon, elk, los, ayiq va deyarli barcha yirik hayvonlar qanchalar yuvosh ko'rinmasin hujum qilish imkoniyatiga ega. Har yili o'nlab tashrif buyuruvchilar yetarli masofani saqlamagani sababli jarohat oladi. Bu hayvonlar bahaybat, yovvoyi va xavfli bo'lishi mumkin, shuning uchun ularga o'z hududini qoldiring. Shuningdek, iforlar ayiqlar va boshqa yovvoyi hayvonlarni o'ziga jalb qiladi, shu sababli xushbo'y taomlarni olib yurish yoki pishirishdan saqlaning va lagerni toza saqlang.
mt: While most park animals are accustomed to human visitors, wild nature is clearly wild, and they are not to be fed or harassed. According to the park management, stay at least 100 yards from bears and wolves, and 25 yards from all other wild animals! Bison, elk, moose, bear and nearly all large animals look harmless, but are capable of attack. Every year dozens of visitors are injured because they do not keep a safe distance. These animals are wild, dangerous and unpredictable, so leave them their territory. Also, food attracts bears and other wild animals, so avoid carrying or cooking fragrant food, and keep your camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
